33     
34     MapHandler::MapHandler(PinholeStereoCamera* cam_)
35         : cam(cam_), threads_started(false)
36     {
37         // load vocabulary
38         if( SlamConfig::hasPoints() )
39             dbow_voc_p.load( SlamConfig::dbowVocP() );
40         if( SlamConfig::hasLines() )
41             dbow_voc_l.load( SlamConfig::dbowVocL() );
42     
43         lc_state = LC_IDLE;
44     
45     }
46     
47     void MapHandler::initialize( KeyFrame *kf0 )
48     {
49         curr_kf = kf0;
50     
51         Twf = Matrix4d::Identity();
52         DT = Matrix4d::Identity();
53     
54         // reset information from the map
55         map_keyframes.clear();
56         map_points.clear();
57         map_points_kf_idx.clear();
58         map_lines.clear();
59         map_lines_kf_idx.clear();
60         full_graph.clear();
61         conf_matrix.clear();
62         lc_idx_list.clear();
63         lc_pose_list.clear();
64         max_pt_idx = 0;
65         max_ls_idx = 0;
66         max_kf_idx = 0;
67     
68         // initialize graphs
69         full_graph.resize(1);
70         full_graph[0].resize(1);
71         full_graph[0][0] = 0;
72         conf_matrix.resize(1);
73         conf_matrix[0].resize(1);
74         conf_matrix[0][0] = 1.0;
75     
76         // reset indices
77         for (PointFeature* pt : kf0->stereo_frame->stereo_pt)
78             pt->idx = -1;
79         for (LineFeature* ls : kf0->stereo_frame->stereo_ls)
80             ls->idx = -1;
81     
82         // initialize DBoW descriptor vector and LC status
83         vector<Mat> curr_desc;
84         if( SlamConfig::hasPoints() )
85         {
86             curr_desc.reserve( kf0->stereo_frame->pdesc_l.rows );
87             for ( int i = 0; i < kf0->stereo_frame->pdesc_l.rows; i++ )
88                 curr_desc.push_back( kf0->stereo_frame->pdesc_l.row(i) );
89             dbow_voc_p.transform( curr_desc, kf0->descDBoW_P );
90             curr_desc.clear();
91         }
92         if( SlamConfig::hasLines() )
93         {
94             curr_desc.reserve( kf0->stereo_frame->ldesc_l.rows );
95             for ( int i = 0; i < kf0->stereo_frame->ldesc_l.rows; i++ )
96                 curr_desc.push_back( kf0->stereo_frame->ldesc_l.row(i) );
97             dbow_voc_l.transform( curr_desc, kf0->descDBoW_L );
98         }
99     
100         // insert keyframe and add to map of indexes
101         vector<int> aux_vec;
102         map_keyframes.push_back( kf0 );
103         map_points_kf_idx.insert( std::pair<int,vector<int>>(kf0->kf_idx,aux_vec) );
104         map_lines_kf_idx.insert(  std::pair<int,vector<int>>(kf0->kf_idx,aux_vec) );
105     
106         if (SlamConfig::multithreadSLAM())
107             startThreads();
108     
109         time = Vector7f::Zero();
110     }
111     
112     void MapHandler::finishSLAM()
113     {
114         if (SlamConfig::multithreadSLAM())
115             killThreads();
116     }
117     
118     void MapHandler::addKeyFrame( KeyFrame *curr_kf )
119     {
120         Timer timer;
121     
122         
123         this->prev_kf = this->curr_kf;
124         this->curr_kf = curr_kf;
125     
126         if( SlamConfig::multithreadSLAM() )
127         {
128             // expand graphs
129             expandGraphs();
130             // select previous keyframe
131             KeyFrame* prev_kf;
132             prev_kf = map_keyframes.back();
133             max_kf_idx++;
134             curr_kf->kf_idx = max_kf_idx;
135             curr_kf->local  = true;
136             // update pose of current keyframe wrt previous one (in case of LC local closure)
137             //curr_kf->T_kf_w是一个小值
138             Matrix4d T_curr_w = prev_kf->T_kf_w * curr_kf->T_kf_w;
139             
140     //         cout<<"qiao1"<<endl;
141     //         logT(prev_kf->T_kf_w);
142     //         logT(curr_kf->T_kf_w);
143             
144             curr_kf->x_kf_w = logmap_se3(T_curr_w);
145             curr_kf->T_kf_w = expmap_se3(curr_kf->x_kf_w);
146             // Estimates Twf
147             Twf = expmap_se3(logmap_se3(  inverse_se3( curr_kf->T_kf_w ) ));
148             // estimates pose increment
149             DT = expmap_se3(logmap_se3( Twf * prev_kf->T_kf_w ));
150             // reset indices
151             for (PointFeature* pt : curr_kf->stereo_frame->stereo_pt)
152                 pt->idx = -1;
153             for (LineFeature* ls : curr_kf->stereo_frame->stereo_ls)
154                 ls->idx = -1;
155             // insert keyframe and add to map of indexes
156             vector<int> aux_vec;
157             map_keyframes.push_back( curr_kf );
158             map_points_kf_idx.insert( std::make_pair(curr_kf->kf_idx, aux_vec) );
159             map_lines_kf_idx.insert(  std::make_pair(curr_kf->kf_idx, aux_vec) );
160             // call
161             addKeyFrame_multiThread(curr_kf,prev_kf);
162             return;
163         }
164     
165     
166         // reset time variable
167         time = Vector7f::Zero();
168     
169         // expand graphs
170         timer.start();
171         //full graph(int) confusion matrix(float)两个图，都延展一下
172         expandGraphs();
173         time(0) = timer.stop(); //ms
174     
175         // select previous keyframe
176         KeyFrame* prev_kf;
177         //获得map_keyframes 末尾的引用
178         prev_kf = map_keyframes.back();
179         max_kf_idx++;
180         curr_kf->kf_idx = max_kf_idx;
181         curr_kf->local  = true;
182     
183         // update pose of current keyframe wrt previous one (in case of LC)
184         // wrt with respect to
185         Matrix4d T_curr_w = prev_kf->T_kf_w * curr_kf->T_kf_w;
186         
187         curr_kf->x_kf_w = logmap_se3(T_curr_w);
188         curr_kf->T_kf_w = expmap_se3(curr_kf->x_kf_w);
189     
190         // Estimates Twf
191         Twf = expmap_se3(logmap_se3(  inverse_se3( curr_kf->T_kf_w ) ));
192     
193         // estimates pose increment
194         DT = expmap_se3(logmap_se3( Twf * prev_kf->T_kf_w ));
195     
196         // reset indices
197         for (PointFeature* pt : curr_kf->stereo_frame->stereo_pt)
198             pt->idx = -1;
199         for (LineFeature* ls : curr_kf->stereo_frame->stereo_ls)
200             ls->idx = -1;
201     
202         // look for common matches and update the full graph
203         timer.start();
204         lookForCommonMatches( prev_kf, curr_kf );
205         time(1) = timer.stop(); //ms
206     
207         timer.start();
208         if( SlamConfig::hasPoints() && SlamConfig::hasLines() )
209             insertKFBowVectorPL(curr_kf);
210         else if( SlamConfig::hasPoints() )
211             insertKFBowVectorP(curr_kf);
212         else if( SlamConfig::hasLines() )
213             insertKFBowVectorL(curr_kf);
214     
215         time(2) = timer.stop(); //ms
216     
217         // insert keyframe and add to map of indexes
218         vector<int> aux_vec;
219         map_keyframes.push_back( curr_kf );
220         map_points_kf_idx.insert( std::make_pair(curr_kf->kf_idx, aux_vec) );
221         map_lines_kf_idx.insert(  std::make_pair(curr_kf->kf_idx, aux_vec) );
222     
223         // form local map
224         timer.start();
225         formLocalMap();
226         time(3) = timer.stop(); //ms
227     
228         // perform local bundle adjustment
229         timer.start();
230         localBundleAdjustment();
231         time(4) = timer.stop(); //ms
232     
233         // Recent map LMs culling (implement filters for line segments, which seems to be unaccurate)
234         timer.start();
235         removeBadMapLandmarks();
236         time(5) = timer.stop(); //ms
237     
238     
239         // LC
240         timer.start();
241         loopClosure();
242         time(6) = timer.stop(); //ms
243     }
244     
245     int MapHandler::matchKF2KFPoints(KeyFrame *prev_kf, KeyFrame *curr_kf) {
246     
247         int kf1_idx = prev_kf->kf_idx;
248         int kf2_idx = curr_kf->kf_idx;
249     
250         StVO::StereoFrame* prev_frame = prev_kf->stereo_frame;
251         StVO::StereoFrame* curr_frame = curr_kf->stereo_frame;
252     
253         matched_pt.clear();
254         if (!SlamConfig::hasPoints() || curr_frame->stereo_pt.empty() || prev_frame->stereo_pt.empty())
255             return 0;
256     
257         int matches = 0;
258         vector<int> matches_12;
259     
260         // small window; if it fails, run standard matching
261         if (SlamConfig::fastMatching()) {
262             std::vector<point_2d> pj_points;
263             pj_points.reserve(prev_frame->stereo_pt.size());
264     
265             for (PointFeature* pt : prev_frame->stereo_pt) {
266                 Vector2d point = cam->projection( DT.block(0,0,3,3) * pt->P + DT.col(3).head(3) );
267                 pj_points.push_back(std::make_pair(point(0) * curr_frame->inv_width, point(1) * curr_frame->inv_height));
268             }
269     
270             //Fill in grid
271             GridStructure grid(GRID_ROWS, GRID_COLS);
272             for (int idx = 0; idx < curr_frame->stereo_pt.size(); ++idx) {
273                 PointFeature* point = curr_frame->stereo_pt[idx];
274                 grid.at(point->pl(0) * curr_frame->inv_width, point->pl(1) * curr_frame->inv_height).push_back(idx);
275             }
276     
277             GridWindow w;
278             int ws = SlamConfig::matchingF2FWs();
279             w.width = std::make_pair(ws, ws);
280             w.height = std::make_pair(ws, ws);
281     
282             matches = matchGrid(pj_points, prev_frame->pdesc_l, grid, curr_frame->pdesc_l, w, matches_12);
283         }
284     
285         if (curr_frame->stereo_pt.size() > SlamConfig::minPointMatches() &&
286                 prev_frame->stereo_pt.size() > SlamConfig::minPointMatches() &&
287                 matches < SlamConfig::minPointMatches()) {
288             matches = match(prev_frame->pdesc_l, curr_frame->pdesc_l, SlamConfig::minRatio12P(), matches_12);
289         }
290     
291         for (int i1 = 0; i1 < matches_12.size(); ++i1) {
292             const int i2 = matches_12[i1];
293             if (i2 < 0) continue;
294     
295             // this shouldn't happen
296             if (prev_frame->stereo_pt[i1] == nullptr)
297                 throw runtime_error("[MapHandler] NULL stereo point (prev)");
298             if (curr_frame->stereo_pt[i2] == nullptr)
299                 throw runtime_error("[MapHandler] NULL stereo point (curr)");
300     
301             // new 3D landmark
302             if( prev_frame->stereo_pt[i1]->idx == -1 ) {
303                 // assign indices
304                 prev_frame->stereo_pt[i1]->idx = max_pt_idx;
305                 curr_frame->stereo_pt[i2]->idx = max_pt_idx;
306                 // create new 3D landmark with the observation from previous KF
307                 Matrix4d Tfw = ( prev_kf->T_kf_w );
308                 Vector3d P3d = Tfw.block(0,0,3,3) * prev_frame->stereo_pt[i1]->P + Tfw.col(3).head(3);
309                 //Vector3d dir = kf0->stereo_frame->stereo_pt[lr_qdx]->P / kf0->stereo_frame->stereo_pt[lr_qdx]->P.norm();
310                 Vector3d dir = P3d.normalized();
311                 MapPoint* map_point = new MapPoint(max_pt_idx,
312                                                    P3d,
313                                                    prev_frame->pdesc_l.row(i1),
314                                                    kf1_idx,
315                                                    prev_frame->stereo_pt[i1]->pl,
316                                                    dir);
317                 // add new 3D landmark to kf_idx where it was first observed
318                 map_points_kf_idx.at( kf1_idx ).push_back( max_pt_idx );
319                 // add observation of the 3D landmark from current KF
320                 P3d = curr_kf->T_kf_w.block(0,0,3,3) * curr_frame->stereo_pt[i2]->P + curr_kf->T_kf_w.col(3).head(3);
321                 //dir = kf1->stereo_frame->stereo_pt[lr_tdx]->P / kf1->stereo_frame->stereo_pt[lr_tdx]->P.norm();
322                 dir = P3d / P3d.norm();
323                 map_point->addMapPointObservation(curr_frame->pdesc_l.row(i2),
324                                                   kf2_idx,
325                                                   curr_frame->stereo_pt[i2]->pl,
326                                                   dir);
327                 // add 3D landmark to map
328                 map_points.push_back(map_point);
329                 max_pt_idx++;
330                 // update full graph (new feature)
331                 full_graph[kf2_idx][kf1_idx]++;
332                 full_graph[kf1_idx][kf2_idx]++;
333     
334                 // if has refine pose:
335                 if (SlamConfig::hasRefinement()) {
336                     PointFeature* pt = prev_frame->stereo_pt[i1];
337                     pt->pl_obs = curr_frame->stereo_pt[i2]->pl;
338                     pt->inlier = true;
339                     matched_pt.push_back(pt);
340                 }
341             } else { // 3D landmark exists: copy idx && add observation to map landmark
342                 // copy idx
343                 int lm_idx = prev_frame->stereo_pt[i1]->idx;
344                 if (map_points[lm_idx] != nullptr) {
345                     curr_frame->stereo_pt[i2]->idx = lm_idx;
346                     // add observation of the 3D landmark from current KF
347                     Vector3d p3d = curr_kf->T_kf_w.block(0,0,3,3) * curr_frame->stereo_pt[i2]->P + curr_kf->T_kf_w.col(3).head(3);
348                     //Vector3d dir = kf1->stereo_frame->stereo_pt[lr_tdx]->P / kf1->stereo_frame->stereo_pt[lr_tdx]->P.norm();
349                     Vector3d dir = p3d.normalized();
350                     map_points[lm_idx]->addMapPointObservation(curr_frame->pdesc_l.row(i2),
351                                                                kf2_idx,
352                                                                curr_frame->stereo_pt[i2]->pl,
353                                                                dir);
354                     // update full graph (previously observed feature)
355                     for (int obs : map_points[lm_idx]->kf_obs_list) {
356                         if (obs != kf2_idx) {
357                             full_graph[kf2_idx][obs]++;
358                             full_graph[obs][kf2_idx]++;
359                         }
360                     }
361     
362                     // if has refine pose:
363                     if (SlamConfig::hasRefinement()) {
364                         PointFeature* pt = prev_frame->stereo_pt[i1];
365                         pt->pl_obs = curr_frame->stereo_pt[i2]->pl;
366                         pt->inlier = true;
367                         matched_pt.push_back(pt);
368                     }
369                 }
370             }
371         }
372     
373         return matches;
374     }
375     
376     int MapHandler::matchKF2KFLines(KeyFrame *prev_kf, KeyFrame *curr_kf) {
377     
378         matched_ls.clear();
379         if (!SlamConfig::hasLines() || curr_kf->stereo_frame->stereo_ls.empty() || prev_kf->stereo_frame->stereo_ls.empty())
380             return 0;
381     
382         int kf1_idx = prev_kf->kf_idx;
383         int kf2_idx = curr_kf->kf_idx;
384     
385         StVO::StereoFrame* prev_frame = prev_kf->stereo_frame;
386         StVO::StereoFrame* curr_frame = curr_kf->stereo_frame;
387     
388         int matches = 0;
389         vector<int> matches_12;
390     
391         // small window; if it fails, run standard matching
392         if (SlamConfig::fastMatching()) {
393             std::vector<line_2d> pj_lines;
394             pj_lines.reserve(prev_frame->stereo_ls.size());
395     
396             for (LineFeature* ls : prev_frame->stereo_ls) {
397                 Vector3d sP_ = DT.block(0,0,3,3) * ls->sP + DT.col(3).head(3);
398                 Vector2d spl_proj = cam->projection( sP_ );
399     
400                 Vector3d eP_ = DT.block(0,0,3,3) * ls->eP + DT.col(3).head(3);
401                 Vector2d epl_proj = cam->projection( eP_ );
402     
403                 pj_lines.push_back(std::make_pair(std::make_pair(spl_proj(0), spl_proj(1)),
404                                                   std::make_pair(epl_proj(0), epl_proj(1))));
405             }
406     
407             //Fill in grid
408             list<point_2d> line_coords;
409             GridStructure grid(GRID_ROWS, GRID_COLS);
410             std::vector<std::pair<double, double>> directions(curr_frame->stereo_ls.size());
411             for (int idx = 0; idx < curr_frame->stereo_ls.size(); ++idx) {
412                 LineFeature* line = curr_frame->stereo_ls[idx];
413     
414                 std::pair<double, double> &v = directions[idx];
415                 v = std::make_pair((line->epl(0) - line->spl(0)) * curr_frame->inv_width, (line->epl(1) - line->spl(1)) * curr_frame->inv_height);
416                 normalize(v);
417     
418                 getLineCoords(line->spl(0) * curr_frame->inv_width, line->spl(1) * curr_frame->inv_height,
419                               line->epl(0) * curr_frame->inv_width, line->epl(1) * curr_frame->inv_height, line_coords);
420                 for (const point_2d &p : line_coords)
421                     grid.at(p.first, p.second).push_back(idx);
422             }
423     
424             GridWindow w;
425             int ws = SlamConfig::matchingF2FWs();
426             w.width = std::make_pair(ws, ws);
427             w.height = std::make_pair(ws, ws);
428     
429             matches = matchGrid(pj_lines, prev_frame->ldesc_l, grid, curr_frame->ldesc_l, directions, w, matches_12);
430         }
431     
432         if (curr_frame->stereo_ls.size() > SlamConfig::minLineMatches() &&
433                 prev_frame->stereo_ls.size() > SlamConfig::minLineMatches() &&
434                 matches < SlamConfig::minLineMatches()) {
435             matches = match(prev_frame->ldesc_l, curr_frame->ldesc_l, SlamConfig::minRatio12L(), matches_12);
436     //        if (matches < SlamConfig::minLineMatches()) return 0;
437         }
438     
439         for (int i1 = 0; i1 < matches_12.size(); ++i1) {
440             const int i2 = matches_12[i1];
441             if (i2 < 0) continue;
442     
443             // this shouldn't happen
444             if (prev_frame->stereo_ls[i1] == nullptr)
445                 throw runtime_error("[MapHandler] NULL stereo line (prev)");
446             if (curr_frame->stereo_ls[i2] == nullptr)
447                 throw runtime_error("[MapHandler] NULL stereo line (curr)");
448     
449             // new 3D landmark
450             if (prev_frame->stereo_ls[i1]->idx == -1) {
451                 // assign indices
452                 prev_frame->stereo_ls[i1]->idx = max_ls_idx;
453                 curr_frame->stereo_ls[i2]->idx = max_ls_idx;
454                 // create new 3D landmark with the observation from previous KF
455                 Matrix4d Tfw = ( prev_kf->T_kf_w );
456                 Vector3d sP3d = Tfw.block(0,0,3,3) * prev_frame->stereo_ls[i1]->sP + Tfw.col(3).head(3);
457                 Vector3d eP3d = Tfw.block(0,0,3,3) * prev_frame->stereo_ls[i1]->eP + Tfw.col(3).head(3);
458                 Vector6d L3d;
459                 L3d << sP3d, eP3d;
460                 Vector3d mP3d = 0.5*(sP3d+eP3d);
461                 mP3d = mP3d.normalized();
462                 Vector4d pts;
463                 pts << prev_frame->stereo_ls[i1]->spl, prev_frame->stereo_ls[i1]->epl;
464                 MapLine* map_line = new MapLine(max_ls_idx,
465                                                 L3d,
466                                                 prev_frame->ldesc_l.row(i1),
467                                                 kf1_idx,
468                                                 prev_frame->stereo_ls[i1]->le,
469                                                 mP3d,
470                                                 pts);
471                 // add new 3D landmark to kf_idx where it was first observed
472                 map_lines_kf_idx.at( kf1_idx ).push_back( max_ls_idx );
473                 // add observation of the 3D landmark from current KF
474                 mP3d = 0.5*( curr_frame->stereo_ls[i2]->sP + curr_frame->stereo_ls[i2]->eP );
475                 mP3d = curr_kf->T_kf_w.block(0,0,3,3) * mP3d + curr_kf->T_kf_w.col(3).head(3);
476                 mP3d = mP3d.normalized();
477                 pts << curr_frame->stereo_ls[i2]->spl, curr_frame->stereo_ls[i2]->epl;
478                 map_line->addMapLineObservation(curr_frame->ldesc_l.row(i2),
479                                                 kf2_idx,
480                                                 curr_frame->stereo_ls[i2]->le,
481                                                 mP3d,
482                                                 pts);
483                 // add 3D landmark to map
484                 map_lines.push_back(map_line);
485                 max_ls_idx++;
486                 // update full graph (new feature)
487                 full_graph[kf2_idx][kf1_idx]++;
488                 full_graph[kf1_idx][kf2_idx]++;
489     
490                 // if has refine pose:
491                 if (SlamConfig::hasRefinement()) {
492                     LineFeature* ls = prev_frame->stereo_ls[i1];
493                     ls->sdisp_obs   = curr_frame->stereo_ls[i2]->sdisp;
494                     ls->edisp_obs   = curr_frame->stereo_ls[i2]->edisp;
495                     ls->spl_obs     = curr_frame->stereo_ls[i2]->spl;
496                     ls->epl_obs     = curr_frame->stereo_ls[i2]->epl;
497                     ls->le_obs      = curr_frame->stereo_ls[i2]->le;
498                     ls->inlier      = true;
499                     matched_ls.push_back( ls );
500                 }
501             } else { // 3D landmark exists: copy idx && add observation to map landmark
502                 // copy idx
503                 int lm_idx = prev_frame->stereo_ls[i1]->idx;
504                 if (map_lines[lm_idx] != nullptr) {
505                     curr_frame->stereo_ls[i2]->idx = lm_idx;
506                     // add observation of the 3D landmark from current KF
507                     Vector3d mP3d = 0.5*(curr_frame->stereo_ls[i2]->sP+curr_frame->stereo_ls[i2]->eP);
508                     mP3d = curr_kf->T_kf_w.block(0,0,3,3) * mP3d + curr_kf->T_kf_w.col(3).head(3);
509                     mP3d = mP3d.normalized();
510                     Vector4d pts;
511                     pts << curr_frame->stereo_ls[i2]->spl, curr_frame->stereo_ls[i2]->epl;
512                     map_lines[lm_idx]->addMapLineObservation(curr_frame->ldesc_l.row(i2),
513                                                              kf2_idx,
514                                                              curr_frame->stereo_ls[i2]->le,
515                                                              mP3d,
516                                                              pts);
517                     // update full graph (previously observed feature)
518                     for (int obs : map_lines[lm_idx]->kf_obs_list) {
519                         if (obs != kf2_idx) {
520                             full_graph[kf2_idx][obs]++;
521                             full_graph[obs][kf2_idx]++;
522                         }
523                     }
524     
525                     // if has refine pose:
526                     if (SlamConfig::hasRefinement()) {
527                         LineFeature* ls = prev_frame->stereo_ls[i1];
528                         ls->sdisp_obs   = curr_frame->stereo_ls[i2]->sdisp;
529                         ls->edisp_obs   = curr_frame->stereo_ls[i2]->edisp;
530                         ls->spl_obs     = curr_frame->stereo_ls[i2]->spl;
531                         ls->epl_obs     = curr_frame->stereo_ls[i2]->epl;
532                         ls->le_obs      = curr_frame->stereo_ls[i2]->le;
533                         ls->inlier      = true;
534                         matched_ls.push_back( ls );
535                     }
536                 }
537             }
538         }
539     
540         return matches;
541     }
542     
543     int MapHandler::matchMap2KFPoints() {
544     
545         int kf2_idx = curr_kf->kf_idx;
546         StVO::StereoFrame* curr_frame = curr_kf->stereo_frame;
547     
548         // select local map
549         vector<MapPoint*> map_local_points;
550         std::vector<point_2d> pj_points;
551         Mat map_lpt_desc;
552     
553         if (!SlamConfig::hasPoints() || curr_frame->stereo_pt.empty())
554             return 0;
555     
556         for (MapPoint* pt : map_points) {
557             // if it is local and not found in the current KF
558             if (pt != nullptr && pt->local && pt->kf_obs_list.back() != kf2_idx) {
559                 // if the LM is projected inside the current image
560                 Vector3d Pf = Twf.block(0,0,3,3) * pt->point3D + Twf.col(3).head(3);
561                 Vector2d pf = cam->projection(Pf);
562                 if (pf(0) > 0 && pf(0) < cam->getWidth() && pf(1) > 0 && pf(1) < cam->getHeight() && Pf(2) > 0.0) {
563                     // add the point and its representative descriptor
564                     map_local_points.push_back(pt);
565                     pj_points.push_back(std::make_pair(pf(0) * curr_frame->inv_width, pf(1) * curr_frame->inv_height));
566                     map_lpt_desc.push_back(pt->med_desc.row(0));
567                 }
568             }
569         }
570     
571         // select unmatched points
572         vector<PointFeature*> unmatched_points;
573         Mat unmatched_pt_desc;
574         for( int idx = 0; idx < curr_kf->stereo_frame->stereo_pt.size(); ++idx) {
575             PointFeature* pt = curr_kf->stereo_frame->stereo_pt[idx];
576             if (pt != nullptr && pt->idx == -1) {
577                 unmatched_points.push_back(pt);
578                 unmatched_pt_desc.push_back(curr_kf->stereo_frame->pdesc_l.row(idx));
579             }
580         }
581     
582         if (map_local_points.empty() || unmatched_points.empty())
583             return 0;
584     
585         int matches = 0;
586         vector<int> matches_12;
587     
588         // track points from local map (small window; if it fails, run standard matching)
589         if (SlamConfig::fastMatching()) {
590             //Fill in grid
591             GridStructure grid(GRID_ROWS, GRID_COLS);
592             for (int idx = 0; idx < unmatched_points.size(); ++idx) {
593                 PointFeature* point = unmatched_points[idx];
594                 grid.at(point->pl(0) * curr_frame->inv_width, point->pl(1) * curr_frame->inv_height).push_back(idx);
595             }
596     
597             GridWindow w;
598             int ws = SlamConfig::matchingF2FWs();
599             w.width = std::make_pair(ws, ws);
600             w.height = std::make_pair(ws, ws);
601     
602             matches = matchGrid(pj_points, map_lpt_desc, grid, unmatched_pt_desc, w, matches_12);
603         }
604     
605         if (pj_points.size() > SlamConfig::minPointMatches() &&
606                 map_local_points.size() > SlamConfig::minPointMatches() &&
607                 matches < SlamConfig::minPointMatches()) {
608             matches = match(map_lpt_desc, unmatched_pt_desc, SlamConfig::minRatio12P(), matches_12);
609     //        if (matches < SlamConfig::minPointMatches()) return 0;
610         }
611     
612         for (int i1 = 0; i1 < matches_12.size(); ++i1) {
613             const int i2 = matches_12[i1];
614             if (i2 < 0) continue;
615     
616             Vector3d Pf_map = Twf.block(0,0,3,3) * map_local_points[i1]->point3D + Twf.col(3).head(3);
617             Vector3d Pf_kf  = unmatched_points[i2]->P;
618             // check that the viewing direction condition is also satisfied
619             Vector3d dir_kf  = Pf_kf.normalized();
620             // check that the epipolar constraint is satisfied
621             Vector2d pf_map = cam->projection( Pf_map );
622             Vector2d pf_kf  = unmatched_points[i2]->pl;
623             double error_epip = ( pf_map - pf_kf ).norm();
624             if (error_epip < SlamConfig::maxKFEpipP()) {
625                 // copy idx
626                 int lm_idx = map_local_points[i1]->idx;
627                 unmatched_points[i2]->idx = lm_idx;
628                 // add observation of the 3D LM from current KF
629                 dir_kf = curr_kf->T_kf_w.block(0,0,3,3) * dir_kf + curr_kf->T_kf_w.col(3).head(3);
630                 map_points[lm_idx]->addMapPointObservation( unmatched_pt_desc.row(i2), kf2_idx, unmatched_points[i2]->pl, dir_kf );
631                 // update full graph (previously observed feature)
632                 for (int obs : map_points[lm_idx]->kf_obs_list) {
633                     if (obs != kf2_idx) {
634                         full_graph[kf2_idx][obs]++;
635                         full_graph[obs][kf2_idx]++;
636                     }
637                 }
638             }
639             else --matches;
640         }
641     
642         return matches;
643     }
644     
645     int MapHandler::matchMap2KFLines() {
646     
647         int kf2_idx = curr_kf->kf_idx;
648         StVO::StereoFrame* curr_frame = curr_kf->stereo_frame;
649     
650         // select local map
651         vector<MapLine*> map_local_lines;
652         std::vector<line_2d> pj_lines;
653         Mat map_lls_desc;
654     
655         if (!SlamConfig::hasLines() || curr_frame->stereo_ls.empty())
656             return 0;
657     
658         for (MapLine* ls : map_lines) {
659             if (ls != nullptr && ls->local && ls->kf_obs_list.back() != kf2_idx) {
660                 // if the LM is projected inside the current image
661                 Vector3d sPf = Twf.block(0,0,3,3) * ls->line3D.head(3) + Twf.col(3).head(3);
662                 Vector2d spf = cam->projection( sPf );
663                 Vector3d ePf = Twf.block(0,0,3,3) * ls->line3D.tail(3) + Twf.col(3).head(3);
664                 Vector2d epf = cam->projection( ePf );
665                 if (spf(0) > 0 && spf(0) < cam->getWidth() && spf(1) > 0 && spf(1) < cam->getHeight() && sPf(2) > 0.0 &&
666                         epf(0) > 0 && epf(0) < cam->getWidth() && epf(1) > 0 && epf(1) < cam->getHeight() && ePf(2) > 0.0) {
667                     // add the point and its representative descriptor
668                     map_local_lines.push_back( ls );
669                     pj_lines.push_back(std::make_pair(std::make_pair(spf(0) * curr_frame->inv_width, spf(1) * curr_frame->inv_height),
670                                                       std::make_pair(epf(0) * curr_frame->inv_width, epf(1) * curr_frame->inv_height)));
671                     map_lls_desc.push_back( ls->med_desc.row(0) );
672                 }
673             }
674         }
675     
676         // select unmatched line segments
677         vector<LineFeature*> unmatched_lines;
678         Mat unmatched_ls_desc;
679         for( int idx = 0; idx < curr_frame->stereo_ls.size(); ++idx) {
680             LineFeature *ls = curr_frame->stereo_ls[idx];
681             if (ls != nullptr && ls->idx == -1) {
682                 unmatched_lines.push_back( ls );
683                 unmatched_ls_desc.push_back( curr_frame->ldesc_l.row(idx) );
684             }
685         }
686     
687         if (map_local_lines.empty() || unmatched_lines.empty())
688             return 0;
689     
690         int matches = 0;
691         vector<int> matches_12;
692     
693         // track lines from local map (small window; if it fails, run standard matching)
694         if (SlamConfig::fastMatching()) {
695             //Fill in grid
696             list<point_2d> line_coords;
697             GridStructure grid(GRID_ROWS, GRID_COLS);
698             std::vector<std::pair<double, double>> directions(unmatched_lines.size());
699             for (int idx = 0; idx < unmatched_lines.size(); ++idx) {
700                 LineFeature* line = unmatched_lines[idx];
701     
702                 std::pair<double, double> &v = directions[idx];
703                 v = std::make_pair((line->epl(0) - line->spl(0)) * curr_frame->inv_width, (line->epl(1) - line->spl(1)) * curr_frame->inv_height);
704                 normalize(v);
705     
706                 getLineCoords(line->spl(0) * curr_frame->inv_width, line->spl(1) * curr_frame->inv_height,
707                               line->epl(0) * curr_frame->inv_width, line->epl(1) * curr_frame->inv_height, line_coords);
708                 for (const point_2d &p : line_coords)
709                     grid.at(p.first, p.second).push_back(idx);
710             }
711     
712             GridWindow w;
713             int ws = SlamConfig::matchingF2FWs();
714             w.width = std::make_pair(ws, ws);
715             w.height = std::make_pair(ws, ws);
716     
717             matches = matchGrid(pj_lines, map_lls_desc, grid, unmatched_ls_desc, directions, w, matches_12);
718         }
719     
720         if (pj_lines.size() > SlamConfig::minLineMatches() &&
721                 map_local_lines.size() > SlamConfig::minLineMatches() &&
722                 matches < SlamConfig::minLineMatches()) {
723             matches = match(map_lls_desc, unmatched_ls_desc, SlamConfig::minRatio12L(), matches_12);
724     //        if (matches < SlamConfig::minLineMatches()) return 0;
725         }
726     
727         for (int i1 = 0; i1 < matches_12.size(); ++i1) {
728             const int i2 = matches_12[i1];
729             if (i2 < 0) continue;
730     
731             Vector3d sP_ = Twf.block(0,0,3,3) * map_local_lines[i1]->line3D.head(3) + Twf.col(3).head(3);
732             Vector2d spl_proj = cam->projection( sP_ );
733             Vector3d eP_ = Twf.block(0,0,3,3) * map_local_lines[i1]->line3D.tail(3) + Twf.col(3).head(3);
734             Vector2d epl_proj = cam->projection( eP_ );
735             Vector3d l_obs = unmatched_lines[i2]->le;
736             // check the epipolar constraint
737             Vector2d err_ls;
738             err_ls(0) = l_obs(0) * spl_proj(0) + l_obs(1) * spl_proj(1) + l_obs(2);
739             err_ls(1) = l_obs(0) * epl_proj(0) + l_obs(1) * epl_proj(1) + l_obs(2);
740             if( err_ls(0) < SlamConfig::maxKFEpipL() && err_ls(1) < SlamConfig::maxKFEpipL() ) {
741                 // copy idx
742                 int lm_idx = map_local_lines[i1]->idx;
743                 unmatched_lines[i2]->idx = lm_idx;
744                 // add observation of the 3D landmark from current KF
745                 Vector3d mP3d = 0.5*(unmatched_lines[i2]->sP + unmatched_lines[i2]->eP);
746                 mP3d = curr_kf->T_kf_w.block(0,0,3,3) * mP3d + curr_kf->T_kf_w.col(3).head(3);
747                 mP3d = mP3d.normalized();
748                 Vector4d pts;
749                 pts << unmatched_lines[i2]->spl, unmatched_lines[i2]->epl;
750                 map_lines[lm_idx]->addMapLineObservation( unmatched_ls_desc.row(i2), kf2_idx, unmatched_lines[i2]->le, mP3d, pts );
751                 // update full graph (previously observed feature)
752                 for (int obs : map_lines[lm_idx]->kf_obs_list) {
753                     if (obs != kf2_idx) {
754                         full_graph[kf2_idx][obs]++;
755                         full_graph[obs][kf2_idx]++;
756                     }
757                 }
758             }
759             else --matches;
760         }
761     
762         return matches;
763     }
764     
765     void MapHandler::lookForCommonMatches( KeyFrame* kf0, KeyFrame* &kf1 )
766     {
767         // ---------------------------------------------------
768         // find matches between prev_keyframe and curr_frame
769         // ---------------------------------------------------
770         // points f2f tracking
771         int common_pt = matchKF2KFPoints(prev_kf, curr_kf);
772     
773         // line segments f2f tracking
774         int common_ls = matchKF2KFLines(prev_kf, curr_kf);
775     
776         // ---------------------------------------------------
777         // refine pose between kf0 and kf1
778         // ---------------------------------------------------
779         if (SlamConfig::hasRefinement()) {
780             StVO::StereoFrameHandler* stf = new StereoFrameHandler( cam );
781             stf->matched_pt = matched_pt;
782             stf->matched_ls = matched_ls;
783     
784             stf->prev_frame = kf0->stereo_frame;
785             stf->curr_frame = kf1->stereo_frame;
786     
787             stf->n_inliers_pt = stf->matched_pt.size();
788             stf->n_inliers_ls = stf->matched_ls.size();
789             stf->n_inliers    = stf->n_inliers_pt + stf->n_inliers_ls;
790     
791             stf->optimizePose();
792     
793             double inl_ratio_pt = 100.0 * stf->n_inliers_pt / matched_pt.size();
794             double inl_ratio_ls = 100.0 * stf->n_inliers_ls / matched_ls.size();
795     
796             bool condition_pt = true, condition_ls = true;
797             if (SlamConfig::hasPoints())
798                 condition_pt = (inl_ratio_pt >= SlamConfig::kfInlierRatio());
799             if (SlamConfig::hasLines())
800                 condition_ls = (inl_ratio_ls >= SlamConfig::kfInlierRatio());
801             if (!SlamConfig::hasPoints() && !SlamConfig::hasLines()) {
802                 condition_pt = false;
803                 condition_ls = false;
804             }
805     
806             bool inl_ratio_condition = (condition_pt && condition_ls);
807     
808             if (stf->n_inliers > SlamConfig::minFeatures() && inl_ratio_condition) {
809                 Matrix4d DT_ = stf->curr_frame->DT;
810                 kf1->T_kf_w = expmap_se3(logmap_se3( kf0->T_kf_w * DT_ ));
811             } else
812                 kf1->T_kf_w = expmap_se3(logmap_se3( kf0->T_kf_w * inverse_se3(DT) ));
813     
814             // update DT & Twf
815             Twf = expmap_se3(logmap_se3(  inverse_se3( curr_kf->T_kf_w ) ));
816             DT = expmap_se3(logmap_se3( Twf * prev_kf->T_kf_w ));
817     
818             delete stf;
819         }
820     
821         // ---------------------------------------------------
822         // find point matches between local map and curr_frame
823         // ---------------------------------------------------
824         if (SlamConfig::hasPoints())
825             common_pt += matchMap2KFPoints();
826     
827         // ---------------------------------------------------
828         // find line matches between local map and curr_frame
829         // ---------------------------------------------------
830         if (SlamConfig::hasLines())
831             common_ls += matchMap2KFLines();
832     }
833     
834     void MapHandler::expandGraphs()
835     {
836         int g_size = full_graph.size() + 1;
837         // full graph
838         full_graph.resize( g_size );
839         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < g_size; i++ )
840             full_graph[i].resize( g_size );
841         // confusion matrix
842         conf_matrix.resize( g_size );
843         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < g_size; i++ )
844             conf_matrix[i].resize( g_size );
845     }
846     
847     void MapHandler::formLocalMap()
848     {
849     
850         // for the Single Thread version
851     
852         // reset local KFs & LMs
853         for( vector<KeyFrame*>::iterator kf_it = map_keyframes.begin(); kf_it != map_keyframes.end(); kf_it++ )
854         {
855             if( (*kf_it) != NULL )
856                 (*kf_it)->local = false;
857         }
858         for( vector<MapPoint*>::iterator pt_it = map_points.begin(); pt_it != map_points.end(); pt_it++ )
859         {
860             if( (*pt_it) != NULL )
861                 (*pt_it)->local = false;
862         }
863         for( vector<MapLine*>::iterator  ls_it = map_lines.begin(); ls_it != map_lines.end(); ls_it++ )
864         {
865             if( (*ls_it) != NULL )
866                 (*ls_it)->local = false;
867         }
868     
869         // set first KF and their associated LMs as local
870         map_keyframes.back()->local = true;
871         for( vector<PointFeature*>::iterator pt_it = map_keyframes.back()->stereo_frame->stereo_pt.begin(); pt_it != map_keyframes.back()->stereo_frame->stereo_pt.end(); pt_it++ )
872         {
873             if( (*pt_it) != NULL )
874             {
875                 int lm_idx = (*pt_it)->idx;
876                 if( lm_idx != -1 && map_points[lm_idx] != NULL )
877                     map_points[lm_idx]->local = true;
878             }
879         }
880         for( vector<LineFeature*>::iterator ls_it = map_keyframes.back()->stereo_frame->stereo_ls.begin(); ls_it != map_keyframes.back()->stereo_frame->stereo_ls.end(); ls_it++ )
881         {
882             if( (*ls_it) != NULL )
883             {
884                 int lm_idx = (*ls_it)->idx;
885                 if( lm_idx != -1 && map_lines[lm_idx] != NULL )
886                     map_lines[lm_idx]->local = true;
887             }
888         }
889     
890         // loop over covisibility graph / full graph if we want to find more points
891         int g_size = full_graph.size()-1;
892         for( int i = 0; i < g_size; i++ )
893         {
894             if( full_graph[g_size][i] >= SlamConfig::minLMCovGraph() || abs(g_size-i) <= SlamConfig::minKFLocalMap() )
895             {
896                 map_keyframes[i]->local = true;
897                 // loop over the landmarks seen by KF{i}
898                 for( vector<PointFeature*>::iterator pt_it = map_keyframes[i]->stereo_frame->stereo_pt.begin(); pt_it != map_keyframes[i]->stereo_frame->stereo_pt.end(); pt_it++ )
899                 {
900                     int lm_idx = (*pt_it)->idx;
901                     if( lm_idx != -1 && map_points[lm_idx] != NULL )
902                         map_points[lm_idx]->local = true;
903                 }
904                 for( vector<LineFeature*>::iterator ls_it = map_keyframes[i]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls.begin(); ls_it != map_keyframes[i]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls.end(); ls_it++ )
905                 {
906                     int lm_idx = (*ls_it)->idx;
907                     if( lm_idx != -1 && map_lines[lm_idx] != NULL )
908                         map_lines[lm_idx]->local = true;
909                 }
910             }
911         }
912     
913     }
914     
915     void MapHandler::formLocalMap( KeyFrame * kf )
916     {
917     
918         // reset local KFs & LMs
919         for( vector<KeyFrame*>::iterator kf_it = map_keyframes.begin(); kf_it != map_keyframes.end(); kf_it++ )
920         {
921             if( (*kf_it) != NULL )
922                 (*kf_it)->local = false;
923         }
924         for( vector<MapPoint*>::iterator pt_it = map_points.begin(); pt_it != map_points.end(); pt_it++ )
925         {
926             if( (*pt_it) != NULL )
927                 (*pt_it)->local = false;
928         }
929         for( vector<MapLine*>::iterator  ls_it = map_lines.begin(); ls_it != map_lines.end(); ls_it++ )
930         {
931             if( (*ls_it) != NULL )
932                 (*ls_it)->local = false;
933         }
934     
935         // set first KF and their associated LMs as local
936         kf->local = true;
937         for( vector<PointFeature*>::iterator pt_it = kf->stereo_frame->stereo_pt.begin(); pt_it != kf->stereo_frame->stereo_pt.end(); pt_it++ )
938         {
939             if( (*pt_it) != NULL )
940             {
941                 int lm_idx = (*pt_it)->idx;
942                 if( lm_idx != -1 && map_points[lm_idx] != NULL )
943                     map_points[lm_idx]->local = true;
944             }
945         }
946         for( vector<LineFeature*>::iterator ls_it = kf->stereo_frame->stereo_ls.begin(); ls_it != kf->stereo_frame->stereo_ls.end(); ls_it++ )
947         {
948             if( (*ls_it) != NULL )
949             {
950                 int lm_idx = (*ls_it)->idx;
951                 if( lm_idx != -1 && map_lines[lm_idx] != NULL )
952                     map_lines[lm_idx]->local = true;
953             }
954         }
955     
956         // loop over covisibility graph / full graph if we want to find more points
957         int g_size = full_graph.size()-1;
958         for( int i = 0; i < g_size; i++ )
959         {
960             if( full_graph[g_size][i] >= SlamConfig::minLMCovGraph() || abs(g_size-i) <= SlamConfig::minKFLocalMap() )
961             {
962                 map_keyframes[i]->local = true;
963                 // loop over the landmarks seen by KF{i}
964                 for( vector<PointFeature*>::iterator pt_it = map_keyframes[i]->stereo_frame->stereo_pt.begin(); pt_it != map_keyframes[i]->stereo_frame->stereo_pt.end(); pt_it++ )
965                 {
966                     int lm_idx = (*pt_it)->idx;
967                     if( lm_idx != -1 && map_points[lm_idx] != NULL )
968                         map_points[lm_idx]->local = true;
969                 }
970                 for( vector<LineFeature*>::iterator ls_it = map_keyframes[i]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls.begin(); ls_it != map_keyframes[i]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls.end(); ls_it++ )
971                 {
972                     int lm_idx = (*ls_it)->idx;
973                     if( lm_idx != -1 && map_lines[lm_idx] != NULL )
974                         map_lines[lm_idx]->local = true;
975                 }
976             }
977         }
978     
979     }
980     
981     // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
982     // Parallelization functions
983     // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
984     
985     void MapHandler::addKeyFrame_multiThread(KeyFrame *curr_kf , KeyFrame *prev_kf) {
986     
987         if (!threads_started) return;
988     
989         {
990             std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lk(kf_queue_mutex);
991             kf_queue.push_back(std::make_pair(curr_kf,prev_kf));
992         }
993         new_kf.notify_one();
994     }
995     
996     void MapHandler::handlerThread() {
997     
998         if (!threads_started) return;
999     
1000         while (true) {
1001     
1002             std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lk(kf_queue_mutex);
1003             if (kf_queue.empty())
1004                 new_kf.wait(lk, [this]{return !kf_queue.empty();});
1005     
1006             curr_kf_mt = kf_queue.front().first;
1007             prev_kf_mt = kf_queue.front().second;
1008             kf_queue.pop_front();
1009     
1010             lk.unlock();
1011     
1012             // notify threads
1013             {
1014                 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lk(lba_mutex);
1015                 lba_thread_status = LBA_ACTIVE;
1016             }
1017             lba_start.notify_one();
1018     
1019             {
1020                 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lk(lc_mutex);
1021                 lc_thread_status = LC_ACTIVE;
1022             }
1023             lc_start.notify_one();
1024     
1025             if( curr_kf_mt == nullptr || prev_kf_mt == nullptr ) return;
1026     
1027             // join localMapping and loopClosure threads
1028             std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lba_lk(lba_mutex);
1029             if( lba_thread_status != LBA_IDLE )
1030                 lba_join.wait(lba_lk, [this]{return (lba_thread_status == LBA_IDLE);});
1031     
1032             std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lc_lk(lc_mutex);
1033             if ( lc_thread_status != LC_IDLE )
1034                 lc_join.wait(lc_lk, [this]{return (lc_thread_status == LC_IDLE);});
1035     
1036             // loop closure
1037             if( lc_state == LC_READY )
1038             {
1039                 loopClosureOptimizationCovGraphG2O();
1040                 lc_state = LC_IDLE;
1041             }
1042     
1043         }
1044     
1045     
1046     }
1047     
1048     void MapHandler::startThreads() {
1049     
1050         if (threads_started) return;
1051         threads_started = true;
1052     
1053         std::thread handler(&MapHandler::handlerThread, this);
1054         handler.detach();
1055     
1056         {
1057             std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lk(lba_mutex);
1058             lba_thread_status = LBA_IDLE;
1059         }
1060         std::thread localMapping(&MapHandler::localMappingThread, this);
1061         localMapping.detach();
1062     
1063         {
1064             std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lk(lc_mutex);
1065             lc_thread_status = LC_IDLE;
1066         }
1067         std::thread loopClosure(&MapHandler::loopClosureThread, this);
1068         loopClosure.detach();
1069     }
1070     
1071     void MapHandler::killThreads() {
1072     
1073         if (!threads_started) return;
1074         threads_started = false;
1075     
1076         {
1077             std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lk(kf_queue_mutex);
1078             kf_queue.push_back(std::make_pair(nullptr,nullptr));
1079         }
1080         new_kf.notify_one();
1081     
1082         print_msg("[Waiting for threads to finish...");
1083     
1084         std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lba_lk(lba_mutex);
1085         if (lba_thread_status != LBA_TERMINATED)
1086             lba_join.wait(lba_lk, [this]{return (lba_thread_status == LBA_TERMINATED);});
1087     
1088         std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lc_lk(lc_mutex);
1089         if (lc_thread_status != LC_TERMINATED)
1090             lc_join.wait(lc_lk, [this]{return (lc_thread_status == LC_TERMINATED);});
1091     }
1092     
1093     void MapHandler::localMappingThread() {
1094     
1095         if (!threads_started) return;
1096     
1097         std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lk(lba_mutex, std::defer_lock);
1098         while (true) {
1099     
1100             lk.lock();
1101             if (lba_thread_status != LBA_ACTIVE)
1102                 lba_start.wait(lk, [this]{return (lba_thread_status == LBA_ACTIVE);});
1103             lk.unlock();
1104     
1105             if (curr_kf_mt == nullptr || prev_kf_mt == nullptr) break;
1106     
1107             // reset indices
1108             for (PointFeature* pt : curr_kf_mt->stereo_frame->stereo_pt)
1109                 pt->idx = -1;
1110             for (LineFeature* ls : curr_kf_mt->stereo_frame->stereo_ls)
1111                 ls->idx = -1;
1112     
1113             // look for common matches and update the full graph
1114             lookForCommonMatches( prev_kf_mt, curr_kf_mt );
1115     
1116             // form local map
1117             formLocalMap(curr_kf_mt);
1118     
1119             // perform local bundle adjustment
1120             int lba = localBundleAdjustment();
1121     
1122             // recent map LMs culling (implement filters for line segments, which seems to be unaccurate)
1123             removeBadMapLandmarks();
1124     
1125             lk.lock();
1126             lba_thread_status = LBA_IDLE;
1127             lk.unlock();
1128     
1129             lba_join.notify_one();
1130         }
1131     
1132         lk.lock();
1133         lba_thread_status = LBA_TERMINATED;
1134         lk.unlock();
1135     
1136         lba_join.notify_one();
1137     
1138         print_msg("[localMappingThread] terminated.");
1139     }
1140     
1141     void MapHandler::loopClosureThread() {
1142     
1143         if (!threads_started) return;
1144     
1145         std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lk(lc_mutex, std::defer_lock);
1146         while (true) {
1147     
1148             lk.lock();
1149             if (lc_thread_status != LC_ACTIVE)
1150                 lc_start.wait(lk, [this]{return (lc_thread_status == LC_ACTIVE);});
1151             lk.unlock();
1152     
1153             if ( curr_kf_mt == nullptr && prev_kf_mt == nullptr ) break; // stop loop closure thread
1154     
1155             // insert BOW vector
1156             if( SlamConfig::hasPoints() && SlamConfig::hasLines() )
1157                 insertKFBowVectorPL(curr_kf_mt);
1158             else if( SlamConfig::hasPoints() && !SlamConfig::hasLines() )
1159                 insertKFBowVectorP(curr_kf_mt);
1160             else if( !SlamConfig::hasPoints() && SlamConfig::hasLines() )
1161                 insertKFBowVectorL(curr_kf_mt);
1162     
1163             // look for loop closure candidates
1164             int lc_kf_idx = -1;
1165             lookForLoopCandidates(curr_kf_mt->kf_idx, lc_kf_idx);
1166             //bool inl_ratio_condition = false;
1167             if( lc_kf_idx >= 0 )
1168             {
1169     
1170                 vector<Vector4i> lc_pt_idx, lc_ls_idx;
1171                 vector<PointFeature*> lc_points;
1172                 vector<LineFeature*>  lc_lines;
1173                 Vector6d pose_inc;
1174     
1175                 bool isLC = isLoopClosure( map_keyframes[lc_kf_idx], curr_kf_mt, pose_inc, lc_pt_idx, lc_ls_idx, lc_points, lc_lines );
1176     
1177                 // if it is loop closure, add information and update status
1178                 if( isLC )
1179                 {
1180                     lc_pt_idxs.push_back( lc_pt_idx );
1181                     lc_ls_idxs.push_back( lc_ls_idx );
1182                     lc_poses.push_back( pose_inc );
1183                     lc_pose_list.push_back( pose_inc );
1184                     Vector3i lc_idx;
1185                     lc_idx(0) = map_keyframes[lc_kf_idx]->kf_idx;
1186                     lc_idx(1) = curr_kf_mt->kf_idx;
1187                     lc_idx(2) = 1;
1188                     lc_idxs.push_back( lc_idx );
1189                     lc_idx_list.push_back(lc_idx);
1190                     if( lc_state == LC_IDLE )
1191                         lc_state = LC_ACTIVE;
1192                 }
1193                 else
1194                 {
1195                     if( lc_state == LC_ACTIVE )
1196                         lc_state = LC_READY;
1197                 }
1198     
1199                 for (PointFeature* pt : lc_points)
1200                     delete pt;
1201                 for (LineFeature* ls : lc_lines)
1202                     delete ls;
1203             }
1204             else
1205             {
1206                 if( lc_state == LC_ACTIVE )
1207                     lc_state = LC_READY;
1208             }
1209     
1210             lk.lock();
1211             lc_thread_status = LC_IDLE;
1212             lk.unlock();
1213     
1214             lc_join.notify_one();
1215     
1216         }
1217     
1218         lk.lock();
1219         lc_thread_status = LC_TERMINATED;
1220         lk.unlock();
1221     
1222         lc_join.notify_one();
1223     
1224         print_msg("[LoopClosureThread] terminated.");
1225     }
1226     
1227     // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1228     // Local Bundle Adjustment functions
1229     // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1230     
1231     int MapHandler::localBundleAdjustment()
1232     {
1233     
1234         vector<double> X_aux;
1235     
1236         // create list of local keyframes
1237         vector<int> kf_list;
1238         for( vector<KeyFrame*>::iterator kf_it = map_keyframes.begin(); kf_it != map_keyframes.end(); kf_it++)
1239         {
1240             if( (*kf_it)!= NULL )
1241             {
1242                 if( (*kf_it)->local && (*kf_it)->kf_idx != 0 )
1243                 {
1244                     Vector6d pose_aux = (*kf_it)->x_kf_w;
1245                     for(int i = 0; i < 6; i++)
1246                         X_aux.push_back( pose_aux(i) );
1247                     kf_list.push_back( (*kf_it)->kf_idx );
1248                 }
1249             }
1250         }
1251     
1252         // create list of local point landmarks
1253         vector<Vector6i> pt_obs_list;
1254         vector<int> pt_list;
1255         int lm_local_idx = 0;
1256         for( vector<MapPoint*>::iterator pt_it = map_points.begin(); pt_it != map_points.end(); pt_it++)
1257         {
1258             if( (*pt_it)!= NULL )
1259             {
1260                 if( (*pt_it)->local )
1261                 {
1262                     Vector3d point_aux = (*pt_it)->point3D;
1263                     for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
1264                         X_aux.push_back( point_aux(i) );
1265                     // gather all observations
1266                     for( int i = 0; i < (*pt_it)->obs_list.size(); i++)
1267                     {
1268                         Vector6i obs_aux;
1269                         obs_aux(0) = (*pt_it)->idx; // LM idx
1270                         obs_aux(1) = lm_local_idx;  // LM local idx
1271                         obs_aux(2) = i;             // LM obs idx
1272                         int kf_obs_list_ = (*pt_it)->kf_obs_list[i];
1273                         obs_aux(3) = kf_obs_list_;  // KF idx
1274                         obs_aux(4) = -1;            // KF local idx (-1 if not local)
1275                         obs_aux(5) = 1;             // 1 if the observation is an inlier
1276                         for( int j = 0; j < kf_list.size(); j++ )
1277                         {
1278                             if( kf_list[j] == kf_obs_list_ )
1279                             {
1280                                 obs_aux(4) = j;
1281                                 break;
1282                             }
1283                         }
1284                         pt_obs_list.push_back( obs_aux );
1285                     }
1286                     lm_local_idx++;
1287                     // pt_list
1288                     pt_list.push_back( (*pt_it)->idx );
1289                 }
1290             }
1291         }
1292     
1293         // create list of local line segment landmarks
1294         vector<Vector6i> ls_obs_list;
1295         vector<int> ls_list;
1296         lm_local_idx = 0;
1297         for( vector<MapLine*>::iterator ls_it = map_lines.begin(); ls_it != map_lines.end(); ls_it++)
1298         {
1299             if( (*ls_it)!= NULL )
1300             {
1301                 if( (*ls_it)->local )
1302                 {
1303                     Vector6d line_aux = (*ls_it)->line3D;
1304                     for(int i = 0; i < 6; i++)
1305                         X_aux.push_back( line_aux(i) );
1306                     // gather all observations
1307                     for( int i = 0; i < (*ls_it)->obs_list.size(); i++)
1308                     {
1309                         Vector6i obs_aux;
1310                         obs_aux(0) = (*ls_it)->idx; // LM idx
1311                         obs_aux(1) = lm_local_idx;  // LM local idx
1312                         obs_aux(2) = i;             // LM obs idx
1313                         int kf_obs_list_ = (*ls_it)->kf_obs_list[i];
1314                         obs_aux(3) = kf_obs_list_;  // KF idx
1315                         obs_aux(4) = -1;            // KF local idx (-1 if not local)
1316                         obs_aux(5) = 1;             // 1 if the observation is an inlier
1317                         for( int j = 0; j < kf_list.size(); j++ )
1318                         {
1319                             if( kf_list[j] == kf_obs_list_ )
1320                             {
1321                                 obs_aux(4) = j;
1322                                 break;
1323                             }
1324                         }
1325                         ls_obs_list.push_back( obs_aux );
1326                     }
1327                     lm_local_idx++;
1328                     // ls_list
1329                     ls_list.push_back( (*ls_it)->idx );
1330                 }
1331             }
1332         }
1333     
1334         // Levenberg-Marquardt optimization of the local map
1335         if( pt_obs_list.size() + ls_obs_list.size() != 0 )
1336             //return levMarquardtOptimizationPoseOnlyLBA(X_aux,kf_list,pt_list,ls_list,pt_obs_list,ls_obs_list);
1337             return levMarquardtOptimizationLBA(X_aux,kf_list,pt_list,ls_list,pt_obs_list,ls_obs_list);
1338         else
1339             return -1;
1340     
1341     }
1342     
1343     int MapHandler::levMarquardtOptimizationLBA( vector<double> X_aux, vector<int> kf_list, vector<int> pt_list, vector<int> ls_list, vector<Vector6i> pt_obs_list, vector<Vector6i> ls_obs_list  )
1344     {
1345     
1346         // create Levenberg-Marquardt variables
1347         int    Nkf = kf_list.size();
1348         int      N = X_aux.size();
1349     
1350         VectorXd X = VectorXd::Zero(N), DX = VectorXd::Zero(N);
1351         VectorXd g = VectorXd::Zero(N);
1352         MatrixXd H = MatrixXd::Zero(N,N);
1353     
1354         for(int i = 0; i < N; i++)
1355             X(i) = X_aux[i];
1356         SparseMatrix<double> H_(N,N);
1357     
1358         // create Levenberg-Marquardt parameters
1359         double err = 0.0, err_prev = 999999999.9;
1360         double lambda = SlamConfig::lambdaLbaLM(), lambda_k = SlamConfig::lambdaLbaK();
1361         int    max_iters = SlamConfig::maxItersLba();
1362     
1363         // estimate H and g to precalculate lambda
1364         //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1365         // point observations
1366         int Npt = 0, Npt_obs = 0;
1367         if( pt_obs_list.size() != 0 )
1368             Npt = pt_obs_list.back()(1)+1;
1369         for( vector<Vector6i>::iterator pt_it = pt_obs_list.begin(); pt_it != pt_obs_list.end(); pt_it++ )
1370         {
1371             int lm_idx_map = (*pt_it)(0);
1372             int lm_idx_loc = (*pt_it)(1);
1373             int lm_idx_obs = (*pt_it)(2);
1374             int kf_idx_map = (*pt_it)(3);
1375             int kf_idx_loc = (*pt_it)(4);
1376             if( map_points[lm_idx_map] != NULL && map_keyframes[kf_idx_map] != NULL)
1377             {
1378                 // grab 3D LM (Xwj)
1379                 Vector3d Xwj   = map_points[lm_idx_map]->point3D;
1380                 // grab 6DoF KF (Tiw)
1381                 Matrix4d Tiw   = map_keyframes[kf_idx_map]->T_kf_w;
1382                 // projection error
1383                 Tiw = inverse_se3( Tiw );
1384                 Vector3d Xwi   = Tiw.block(0,0,3,3) * Xwj + Tiw.block(0,3,3,1);
1385                 Vector2d p_prj = cam->projection( Xwi );
1386                 Vector2d p_obs = map_points[lm_idx_map]->obs_list[lm_idx_obs];
1387                 Vector2d p_err    = p_obs - p_prj;
1388                 double p_err_norm = p_err.norm();
1389                 // estimate useful variables
1390                 double gx   = Xwi(0);
1391                 double gy   = Xwi(1);
1392                 double gz   = Xwi(2);
1393                 double gz2  = gz*gz;
1394                 gz2         = 1.0 / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),gz2);
1395                 double fx   = cam->getFx();
1396                 double fy   = cam->getFy();
1397                 double dx   = p_err(0);
1398                 double dy   = p_err(1);
1399                 double fxdx = fx*dx;
1400                 double fydy = fy*dy;
1401                 // estimate Jacobian wrt KF pose
1402                 Vector6d Jij_Tiw = Vector6d::Zero();
1403                 Jij_Tiw << + gz2 * fxdx * gz,
1404                            + gz2 * fydy * gz,
1405                            - gz2 * ( fxdx*gx + fydy*gy ),
1406                            - gz2 * ( fxdx*gx*gy + fydy*gy*gy + fydy*gz*gz ),
1407                            + gz2 * ( fxdx*gx*gx + fxdx*gz*gz + fydy*gx*gy ),
1408                            + gz2 * ( fydy*gx*gz - fxdx*gy*gz );
1409                 Jij_Tiw = Jij_Tiw / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),p_err_norm);
1410                 // estimate Jacobian wrt LM
1411                 Vector3d Jij_Xwj = Vector3d::Zero();
1412                 Jij_Xwj << + gz2 * fxdx * gz,
1413                            + gz2 * fydy * gz,
1414                            - gz2 * ( fxdx*gx + fydy*gy );
1415                 Jij_Xwj = Jij_Xwj.transpose() * Tiw.block(0,0,3,3) / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),p_err_norm);
1416                 // if employing robust cost function            
1417                 double w = 1.0;
1418                 w = robustWeightCauchy(p_err_norm) ;
1419     
1420                 // update hessian, gradient, and error
1421                 MatrixXd Haux  = MatrixXd::Zero(3,6);
1422                 int idx = 6 * kf_idx_loc;
1423                 int jdx = 6*Nkf + 3*lm_idx_loc;
1424                 if( kf_idx_loc == -1 )
1425                 {
1426                     g.block(jdx,0,3,1) += Jij_Xwj * p_err_norm * w ;
1427                     err += p_err_norm * p_err_norm * w ;
1428                     H.block(jdx,jdx,3,3) += Jij_Xwj * Jij_Xwj.transpose() * w ;
1429                 }
1430                 else
1431                 {
1432                     g.block(idx,0,6,1) += Jij_Tiw * p_err_norm * w;
1433                     g.block(jdx,0,3,1) += Jij_Xwj * p_err_norm * w;
1434                     err += p_err_norm * p_err_norm * w;
1435                     Haux = Jij_Xwj * Jij_Tiw.transpose() * w ;
1436                     H.block(idx,idx,6,6) += Jij_Tiw * Jij_Tiw.transpose() * w;
1437                     H.block(jdx,idx,3,6) += Haux;
1438                     H.block(idx,jdx,6,3) += Haux.transpose();
1439                     H.block(jdx,jdx,3,3) += Jij_Xwj * Jij_Xwj.transpose() * w;
1440                 }
1441             }
1442         }
1443         // line segment observations
1444         int Nls = 0, Nls_obs = 0;
1445         if( ls_obs_list.size() != 0 )
1446             Nls = ls_obs_list.back()(1)+1;
1447         for( vector<Vector6i>::iterator ls_it = ls_obs_list.begin(); ls_it != ls_obs_list.end(); ls_it++ )
1448         {
1449             int lm_idx_map = (*ls_it)(0);
1450             int lm_idx_loc = (*ls_it)(1);
1451             int lm_idx_obs = (*ls_it)(2);
1452             int kf_idx_map = (*ls_it)(3);
1453             int kf_idx_loc = (*ls_it)(4);
1454             if( map_lines[lm_idx_map] != NULL && map_keyframes[kf_idx_map] != NULL)
1455             {
1456                 // grab 3D LM (Pwj and Qwj)
1457                 Vector3d Pwj   = map_lines[lm_idx_map]->line3D.head(3);
1458                 Vector3d Qwj   = map_lines[lm_idx_map]->line3D.tail(3);
1459                 // grab 6DoF KF (Tiw)
1460                 Matrix4d Tiw   = map_keyframes[kf_idx_map]->T_kf_w;
1461                 // projection error
1462                 Tiw = inverse_se3( Tiw );
1463                 Vector3d Pwi   = Tiw.block(0,0,3,3) * Pwj + Tiw.block(0,3,3,1);
1464                 Vector3d Qwi   = Tiw.block(0,0,3,3) * Qwj + Tiw.block(0,3,3,1);
1465                 Vector2d p_prj = cam->projection( Pwi );
1466                 Vector2d q_prj = cam->projection( Qwi );
1467                 Vector3d l_obs = map_lines[lm_idx_map]->obs_list[lm_idx_obs];
1468                 Vector2d l_err;
1469                 l_err(0) = l_obs(0) * p_prj(0) + l_obs(1) * p_prj(1) + l_obs(2);
1470                 l_err(1) = l_obs(0) * q_prj(0) + l_obs(1) * q_prj(1) + l_obs(2);
1471                 double l_err_norm = l_err.norm();
1472                 // start point
1473                 double gx   = Pwi(0);
1474                 double gy   = Pwi(1);
1475                 double gz   = Pwi(2);
1476                 double gz2  = gz*gz;
1477                 gz2         = 1.0 / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),gz2);
1478                 double fx   = cam->getFx();
1479                 double fy   = cam->getFy();
1480                 double lx   = l_err(0);
1481                 double ly   = l_err(1);
1482                 double fxlx = fx*lx;
1483                 double fyly = fy*ly;
1484                 // - jac. wrt. KF pose
1485                 Vector6d Jij_Piw = Vector6d::Zero();
1486                 Jij_Piw << + gz2 * fxlx * gz,
1487                            + gz2 * fyly * gz,
1488                            - gz2 * ( fxlx*gx + fyly*gy ),
1489                            - gz2 * ( fxlx*gx*gy + fyly*gy*gy + fyly*gz*gz ),
1490                            + gz2 * ( fxlx*gx*gx + fxlx*gz*gz + fyly*gx*gy ),
1491                            + gz2 * ( fyly*gx*gz - fxlx*gy*gz );
1492                 // - jac. wrt. LM
1493                 Vector3d Jij_Pwj = Vector3d::Zero();
1494                 Jij_Pwj << + gz2 * fxlx * gz,
1495                            + gz2 * fyly * gz,
1496                            - gz2 * ( fxlx*gx + fyly*gy );
1497                 Jij_Pwj = Jij_Pwj.transpose() * Tiw.block(0,0,3,3) * l_err(0) / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),l_err_norm);
1498                 // end point
1499                 gx   = Qwi(0);
1500                 gy   = Qwi(1);
1501                 gz   = Qwi(2);
1502                 gz2  = gz*gz;
1503                 gz2         = 1.0 / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),gz2);
1504                 // - jac. wrt. KF pose
1505                 Vector6d Jij_Qiw = Vector6d::Zero();
1506                 Jij_Qiw << + gz2 * fxlx * gz,
1507                            + gz2 * fyly * gz,
1508                            - gz2 * ( fxlx*gx + fyly*gy ),
1509                            - gz2 * ( fxlx*gx*gy + fyly*gy*gy + fyly*gz*gz ),
1510                            + gz2 * ( fxlx*gx*gx + fxlx*gz*gz + fyly*gx*gy ),
1511                            + gz2 * ( fyly*gx*gz - fxlx*gy*gz );
1512                 // - jac. wrt. LM
1513                 Vector3d Jij_Qwj = Vector3d::Zero();
1514                 Jij_Qwj << + gz2 * fxlx * gz,
1515                            + gz2 * fyly * gz,
1516                            - gz2 * ( fxlx*gx + fyly*gy );
1517                 Jij_Qwj = Jij_Qwj.transpose() * Tiw.block(0,0,3,3) * l_err(1) / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),l_err_norm);
1518                 // estimate Jacobian wrt KF pose
1519                 Vector6d Jij_Tiw = Vector6d::Zero();
1520                 Jij_Tiw = ( Jij_Piw * l_err(0) + Jij_Qiw * l_err(1) ) / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),l_err_norm);
1521                 // estimate Jacobian wrt LM
1522                 Vector6d Jij_Lwj = Vector6d::Zero();
1523                 Jij_Lwj.head(3) = Jij_Pwj;
1524                 Jij_Lwj.tail(3) = Jij_Qwj;
1525                 // if employing robust cost function
1526                 double w  = 1.0;
1527                 w = robustWeightCauchy(l_err_norm) ;
1528     
1529                 // update hessian, gradient, and error
1530                 MatrixXd Haux  = MatrixXd::Zero(3,6);
1531                 int idx = 6 * kf_idx_loc;
1532                 int jdx = 6*Nkf + 3*Npt + 6*lm_idx_loc;
1533                 if( kf_idx_loc == -1 )
1534                 {
1535                     g.block(jdx,0,6,1) += Jij_Lwj * l_err_norm * w;
1536                     err += l_err_norm * l_err_norm * w;
1537                     H.block(jdx,jdx,6,6) += Jij_Lwj * Jij_Lwj.transpose() * w;
1538                 }
1539                 else
1540                 {
1541                     g.block(idx,0,6,1) += Jij_Tiw * l_err_norm * w;
1542                     g.block(jdx,0,6,1) += Jij_Lwj * l_err_norm * w;
1543                     err += l_err_norm * l_err_norm * w;
1544                     Haux = Jij_Lwj * Jij_Tiw.transpose() * w;
1545                     H.block(idx,idx,6,6) += Jij_Tiw * Jij_Tiw.transpose() * w;
1546                     H.block(jdx,idx,6,6) += Haux;
1547                     H.block(idx,jdx,6,6) += Haux.transpose();
1548                     H.block(jdx,jdx,6,6) += Jij_Lwj * Jij_Lwj.transpose() * w;
1549                 }
1550             }
1551         }
1552         err /= (Npt_obs+Nls_obs);
1553     
1554         // initial guess of lambda
1555         double Hmax = 0.0;
1556         for( int i = 0; i < N; i++)
1557         {
1558             if( H(i,i) > Hmax || H(i,i) < -Hmax )
1559                 Hmax = fabs( H(i,i) );
1560         }
1561         lambda *= Hmax;
1562     
1563         // solve the first iteration
1564         for(int i = 0; i < N; i++)
1565             H(i,i) += lambda * H(i,i) ;
1566         H_ = H.sparseView();
1567         SimplicialLDLT< SparseMatrix<double> > solver1(H_);
1568         DX = solver1.solve( g );
1569     
1570         // update KFs
1571         for( int i = 0; i < Nkf; i++)
1572         {
1573             Matrix4d Tprev = expmap_se3( X.block(6*i,0,6,1) );
1574             Matrix4d Tcurr = Tprev * inverse_se3( expmap_se3( DX.block(6*i,0,6,1) ) );
1575             X.block(6*i,0,6,1) = logmap_se3( Tcurr );
1576         }
1577         // update point LMs
1578         for( int i = 6*Nkf; i < 6*Nkf+3*Npt; i++)
1579             X(i) += DX(i);
1580         // update line LMs
1581         for( int i = 6*Nkf+3*Npt; i < N; i++)
1582             X(i) += DX(i);
1583     
1584         // update error
1585         err_prev = err;
1586     
1587         // LM iterations
1588         //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1589         int iters;
1590         for( iters = 1; iters < max_iters; iters++)
1591         {
1592             // estimate hessian and gradient (reset)
1593             DX = VectorXd::Zero(N);
1594             g  = VectorXd::Zero(N);
1595             H  = MatrixXd::Zero(N,N);
1596             err = 0.0;        
1597             // - point observations
1598             for( vector<Vector6i>::iterator pt_it = pt_obs_list.begin(); pt_it != pt_obs_list.end(); pt_it++ )
1599             {
1600                 int lm_idx_map = (*pt_it)(0);
1601                 int lm_idx_loc = (*pt_it)(1);
1602                 int lm_idx_obs = (*pt_it)(2);
1603                 int kf_idx_map = (*pt_it)(3);
1604                 int kf_idx_loc = (*pt_it)(4);
1605                 if( map_points[lm_idx_map] != NULL && map_keyframes[kf_idx_map] != NULL)
1606                 {
1607                     // grab 3D LM (Xwj)
1608                     Vector3d Xwj = X.block(6*Nkf+3*lm_idx_loc,0,3,1);
1609                     // grab 6DoF KF (Tiw)
1610                     Matrix4d Tiw;
1611                     if( kf_idx_loc != -1 )
1612                         Tiw = expmap_se3( X.block( 6*kf_idx_loc,0,6,1 ) );
1613                     else
1614                         Tiw = map_keyframes[kf_idx_map]->T_kf_w;
1615                     // projection error
1616                     Tiw = inverse_se3( Tiw );
1617                     Vector3d Xwi   = Tiw.block(0,0,3,3) * Xwj + Tiw.block(0,3,3,1);
1618                     Vector2d p_prj = cam->projection( Xwi );
1619                     Vector2d p_obs = map_points[lm_idx_map]->obs_list[lm_idx_obs];
1620                     Vector2d p_err    = p_obs - p_prj;
1621                     double p_err_norm = p_err.norm();
1622                     // useful variables
1623                     double gx   = Xwi(0);
1624                     double gy   = Xwi(1);
1625                     double gz   = Xwi(2);
1626                     double gz2  = gz*gz;
1627                     gz2         = 1.0 / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),gz2);
1628                     double fx   = cam->getFx();
1629                     double fy   = cam->getFy();
1630                     double dx   = p_err(0);
1631                     double dy   = p_err(1);
1632                     double fxdx = fx*dx;
1633                     double fydy = fy*dy;
1634                     // estimate Jacobian wrt KF pose
1635                     Vector6d Jij_Tiw = Vector6d::Zero();
1636                     Jij_Tiw << + gz2 * fxdx * gz,
1637                                + gz2 * fydy * gz,
1638                                - gz2 * ( fxdx*gx + fydy*gy ),
1639                                - gz2 * ( fxdx*gx*gy + fydy*gy*gy + fydy*gz*gz ),
1640                                + gz2 * ( fxdx*gx*gx + fxdx*gz*gz + fydy*gx*gy ),
1641                                + gz2 * ( fydy*gx*gz - fxdx*gy*gz );
1642                     Jij_Tiw = Jij_Tiw / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),p_err_norm);
1643                     // estimate Jacobian wrt LM
1644                     Vector3d Jij_Xwj = Vector3d::Zero();
1645                     Jij_Xwj << + gz2 * fxdx * gz,
1646                                + gz2 * fydy * gz,
1647                                - gz2 * ( fxdx*gx + fydy*gy );
1648                     Jij_Xwj = Jij_Xwj.transpose() * Tiw.block(0,0,3,3) / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),p_err_norm);
1649                     // if employing robust cost function
1650                     double w  = 1.0;
1651                     double s2 = map_points[lm_idx_map]->sigma_list[lm_idx_obs];
1652                     //double w = 1.0 / ( 1.0 + p_err_norm * p_err_norm * s2 );
1653                     w = robustWeightCauchy(p_err_norm) ;
1654     
1655                     // update hessian, gradient, and error
1656                     MatrixXd Haux  = MatrixXd::Zero(3,6);
1657                     int idx = 6 * kf_idx_loc;
1658                     int jdx = 6*Nkf + 3*lm_idx_loc;
1659                     if( kf_idx_loc == -1 )
1660                     {
1661                         g.block(jdx,0,3,1) += Jij_Xwj * p_err_norm * w;
1662                         err += p_err_norm * p_err_norm * w;
1663                         H.block(jdx,jdx,3,3) += Jij_Xwj * Jij_Xwj.transpose() * w;
1664                     }
1665                     else
1666                     {
1667                         g.block(idx,0,6,1) += Jij_Tiw * p_err_norm * w;
1668                         g.block(jdx,0,3,1) += Jij_Xwj * p_err_norm * w;
1669                         err += p_err_norm * p_err_norm * w;
1670                         Haux = Jij_Xwj * Jij_Tiw.transpose() * w ;
1671                         H.block(idx,idx,6,6) += Jij_Tiw * Jij_Tiw.transpose() * w ;
1672                         H.block(jdx,idx,3,6) += Haux;
1673                         H.block(idx,jdx,6,3) += Haux.transpose();
1674                         H.block(jdx,jdx,3,3) += Jij_Xwj * Jij_Xwj.transpose() * w ;
1675                     }
1676                 }
1677             }
1678             // - line segment observations
1679             for( vector<Vector6i>::iterator ls_it = ls_obs_list.begin(); ls_it != ls_obs_list.end(); ls_it++ )
1680             {
1681                 int lm_idx_map = (*ls_it)(0);
1682                 int lm_idx_loc = (*ls_it)(1);
1683                 int lm_idx_obs = (*ls_it)(2);
1684                 int kf_idx_map = (*ls_it)(3);
1685                 int kf_idx_loc = (*ls_it)(4);
1686                 if( map_lines[lm_idx_map] != NULL && map_keyframes[kf_idx_map] != NULL)
1687                 {
1688                     // grab 3D LM (Pwj and Qwj)
1689                     Vector3d Pwj = X.block(6*Nkf+3*Npt+3*lm_idx_loc,0,3,1);
1690                     Vector3d Qwj = X.block(6*Nkf+3*Npt+3*lm_idx_loc,0,3,1);
1691                     // grab 6DoF KF (Tiw)
1692                     Matrix4d Tiw   = map_keyframes[kf_idx_map]->T_kf_w;
1693                     // projection error
1694                     Tiw = inverse_se3( Tiw );
1695                     Vector3d Pwi   = Tiw.block(0,0,3,3) * Pwj + Tiw.block(0,3,3,1);
1696                     Vector3d Qwi   = Tiw.block(0,0,3,3) * Qwj + Tiw.block(0,3,3,1);
1697                     Vector2d p_prj = cam->projection( Pwi );
1698                     Vector2d q_prj = cam->projection( Qwi );
1699                     Vector3d l_obs = map_lines[lm_idx_map]->obs_list[lm_idx_obs];
1700                     Vector2d l_err;
1701                     l_err(0) = l_obs(0) * p_prj(0) + l_obs(1) * p_prj(1) + l_obs(2);
