1702                     l_err(1) = l_obs(0) * q_prj(0) + l_obs(1) * q_prj(1) + l_obs(2);
1703                     double l_err_norm = l_err.norm();
1704                     // start point
1705                     double gx   = Pwi(0);
1706                     double gy   = Pwi(1);
1707                     double gz   = Pwi(2);
1708                     double gz2  = gz*gz;
1709                     gz2         = 1.0 / std::max(0.0000001,gz2);
1710                     double fx   = cam->getFx();
1711                     double fy   = cam->getFy();
1712                     double lx   = l_err(0);
1713                     double ly   = l_err(1);
1714                     double fxlx = fx*lx;
1715                     double fyly = fy*ly;
1716                     // - jac. wrt. KF pose
1717                     Vector6d Jij_Piw = Vector6d::Zero();
1718                     Jij_Piw << + gz2 * fxlx * gz,
1719                                + gz2 * fyly * gz,
1720                                - gz2 * ( fxlx*gx + fyly*gy ),
1721                                - gz2 * ( fxlx*gx*gy + fyly*gy*gy + fyly*gz*gz ),
1722                                + gz2 * ( fxlx*gx*gx + fxlx*gz*gz + fyly*gx*gy ),
1723                                + gz2 * ( fyly*gx*gz - fxlx*gy*gz );
1724                     // - jac. wrt. LM
1725                     Vector3d Jij_Pwj = Vector3d::Zero();
1726                     Jij_Pwj << + gz2 * fxlx * gz,
1727                                + gz2 * fyly * gz,
1728                                - gz2 * ( fxlx*gx + fyly*gy );
1729                     Jij_Pwj = Jij_Pwj.transpose() * Tiw.block(0,0,3,3) * l_err(0) / std::max(0.0000001,l_err_norm);
1730                     // end point
1731                     gx   = Qwi(0);
1732                     gy   = Qwi(1);
1733                     gz   = Qwi(2);
1734                     gz2  = gz*gz;
1735                     gz2         = 1.0 / std::max(0.0000001,gz2);
1736                     // - jac. wrt. KF pose
1737                     Vector6d Jij_Qiw = Vector6d::Zero();
1738                     Jij_Qiw << + gz2 * fxlx * gz,
1739                                + gz2 * fyly * gz,
1740                                - gz2 * ( fxlx*gx + fyly*gy ),
1741                                - gz2 * ( fxlx*gx*gy + fyly*gy*gy + fyly*gz*gz ),
1742                                + gz2 * ( fxlx*gx*gx + fxlx*gz*gz + fyly*gx*gy ),
1743                                + gz2 * ( fyly*gx*gz - fxlx*gy*gz );
1744                     // - jac. wrt. LM
1745                     Vector3d Jij_Qwj = Vector3d::Zero();
1746                     Jij_Qwj << + gz2 * fxlx * gz,
1747                                + gz2 * fyly * gz,
1748                                - gz2 * ( fxlx*gx + fyly*gy );
1749                     Jij_Qwj = Jij_Qwj.transpose() * Tiw.block(0,0,3,3) * l_err(1) / std::max(0.0000001,l_err_norm);
1750                     // estimate Jacobian wrt KF pose
1751                     Vector6d Jij_Tiw = Vector6d::Zero();
1752                     Jij_Tiw = ( Jij_Piw * l_err(0) + Jij_Qiw * l_err(1) ) / std::max(0.0000001,l_err_norm);
1753                     // estimate Jacobian wrt LM
1754                     Vector6d Jij_Lwj = Vector6d::Zero();
1755                     Jij_Lwj.head(3) = Jij_Pwj;
1756                     Jij_Lwj.tail(3) = Jij_Qwj;
1757                     // if employing robust cost function
1758                     double w  = 1.0;
1759                     w = robustWeightCauchy(l_err_norm) ;
1760     
1761                     // update hessian, gradient, and error
1762                     MatrixXd Haux  = MatrixXd::Zero(3,6);
1763                     int idx = 6 * kf_idx_loc;
1764                     int jdx = 6*Nkf + 3*Npt + 6*lm_idx_loc;
1765                     if( kf_idx_loc == -1 )
1766                     {
1767                         g.block(jdx,0,6,1) += Jij_Lwj * l_err_norm * w;
1768                         err += l_err_norm * l_err_norm * w;
1769                         H.block(jdx,jdx,6,6) += Jij_Lwj * Jij_Lwj.transpose() * w;
1770                     }
1771                     else
1772                     {
1773                         g.block(idx,0,6,1) += Jij_Tiw * l_err_norm * w;
1774                         g.block(jdx,0,6,1) += Jij_Lwj * l_err_norm * w;
1775                         err += l_err_norm * l_err_norm * w;
1776                         Haux = Jij_Lwj * Jij_Tiw.transpose() * w;
1777                         H.block(idx,idx,6,6) += Jij_Tiw * Jij_Tiw.transpose() * w;
1778                         H.block(jdx,idx,6,6) += Haux;
1779                         H.block(idx,jdx,6,6) += Haux.transpose();
1780                         H.block(jdx,jdx,6,6) += Jij_Lwj * Jij_Lwj.transpose() * w;
1781                     }
1782                 }
1783             }
1784             err /= (Npt+Nls);
1785             // if the difference is very small stop
1786             if( abs(err-err_prev) < Config::minErrorChange() || err < Config::minError() )
1787                 break;
1788             // add lambda to hessian
1789             for(int i = 0; i < N; i++)
1790                 H(i,i) += lambda * H(i,i) ;
1791             // solve iteration
1792             H_ = H.sparseView();
1793             SimplicialLDLT< SparseMatrix<double> > solver1(H_);
1794             DX = solver1.solve( g );
1795     
1796             // update lambda
1797             if( err > err_prev ){
1798                 lambda /= lambda_k;
1799             }
1800             else
1801             {
1802                 lambda *= lambda_k;
1803                 // update KFs
1804                 for( int i = 0; i < Nkf; i++)
1805                 {
1806                     Matrix4d Tprev = expmap_se3( X.block(6*i,0,6,1) );
1807                     Matrix4d Tcurr = Tprev * inverse_se3( expmap_se3( DX.block(6*i,0,6,1) ) );
1808                     X.block(6*i,0,6,1) = logmap_se3( Tcurr );
1809                 }
1810                 // update point LMs
1811                 for( int i = 6*Nkf; i < 6*Nkf+3*Npt; i++)
1812                     X(i) += DX(i);
1813                 // update line LMs
1814                 for( int i = 6*Nkf+3*Npt; i < N; i++)
1815                     X(i) += DX(i);
1816             }
1817             // if the parameter change is small stop
1818             if( DX.norm() < Config::minErrorChange() )
1819                 break;
1820             // update previous values
1821             err_prev = err;
1822     
1823         }
1824     
1825         if( vo_status != VO_INSERTING_KF )
1826         {
1827     
1828         m_insert_kf.lock();
1829     
1830         // Update KFs and LMs
1831         //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1832         // update KFs
1833         for( int i = 0; i < Nkf; i++)
1834         {
1835             Matrix4d Test = expmap_se3( X.block( 6*i,0,6,1 ) );
1836             map_keyframes[ kf_list[i] ]->T_kf_w = Test;
1837         }
1838         // update point LMs
1839         for( int i = 0; i < Npt; i++)
1840         {
1841     
1842             Vector3d DX = X.block(6*Nkf+3*i,0,3,1) - map_points[ pt_list[i] ]->point3D;
1843             if( DX.norm() > 0.01 )
1844                 map_points[ pt_list[i] ]->inlier = false;
1845     
1846             map_points[ pt_list[i] ]->point3D(0) = X(6*Nkf+3*i);
1847             map_points[ pt_list[i] ]->point3D(1) = X(6*Nkf+3*i+1);
1848             map_points[ pt_list[i] ]->point3D(2) = X(6*Nkf+3*i+2);
1849     
1850         }
1851         // update line segment LMs
1852         for( int i = 0; i < Nls; i++)
1853         {
1854     
1855             Vector6d DX = X.block(6*Nkf+3*Npt+6*i,0,6,1) - map_lines[ ls_list[i] ]->line3D;
1856             if( DX.norm() > 0.01 )
1857                 map_lines[ ls_list[i] ]->inlier = false;
1858     
1859             map_lines[ ls_list[i] ]->line3D(0) = X(6*Nkf+3*Npt+6*i);
1860             map_lines[ ls_list[i] ]->line3D(1) = X(6*Nkf+3*Npt+6*i+1);
1861             map_lines[ ls_list[i] ]->line3D(2) = X(6*Nkf+3*Npt+6*i+2);
1862             map_lines[ ls_list[i] ]->line3D(3) = X(6*Nkf+3*Npt+6*i+3);
1863             map_lines[ ls_list[i] ]->line3D(4) = X(6*Nkf+3*Npt+6*i+4);
1864             map_lines[ ls_list[i] ]->line3D(5) = X(6*Nkf+3*Npt+6*i+5);
1865     
1866         }
1867     
1868         // Remove bad observations
1869         //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1870         for( vector<Vector6i>::reverse_iterator pt_it = pt_obs_list.rbegin(); pt_it != pt_obs_list.rend(); ++pt_it )
1871         {
1872             if( (*pt_it)(5) == -1 )
1873             {
1874                 int lm_idx_map = (*pt_it)(0);
1875                 int lm_idx_obs = (*pt_it)(2);
1876                 if( map_points[lm_idx_map] != NULL )
1877                 {
1878                     int kf_obs = map_points[lm_idx_map]->kf_obs_list[lm_idx_obs];
1879                     // remove observations from map_points
1880                     if( map_points[lm_idx_map]->obs_list.size() > 1 )
1881                     {
1882                         // if it is the first observation, update it from map_points_kf_idx
1883                         if( lm_idx_obs == 0 )
1884                         {
1885                             // delete observation from map_points_kf_idx
1886                             for( auto it = map_points_kf_idx.at(kf_obs).begin(); it != map_points_kf_idx.at(kf_obs).end(); it++)
1887                             {
1888                                 if( (*it) == lm_idx_map )
1889                                 {
1890                                     int new_kf_base = map_points[(*it)]->kf_obs_list[1];
1891                                     map_points_kf_idx.at(new_kf_base).push_back( (*it) );
1892                                     break;
1893                                 }
1894                             }
1895                         }
1896                         // remove observations from map points
1897                         map_points[lm_idx_map]->desc_list.erase( map_points[lm_idx_map]->desc_list.begin() + lm_idx_obs );
1898                         map_points[lm_idx_map]->obs_list.erase( map_points[lm_idx_map]->obs_list.begin() + lm_idx_obs );
1899                         map_points[lm_idx_map]->dir_list.erase( map_points[lm_idx_map]->dir_list.begin() + lm_idx_obs );
1900                         map_points[lm_idx_map]->kf_obs_list.erase( map_points[lm_idx_map]->kf_obs_list.begin() + lm_idx_obs );
1901                         // remove idx from KeyFrame stereo points
1902                         for(vector<PointFeature*>::iterator st_pt = map_keyframes[kf_obs]->stereo_frame->stereo_pt.begin();
1903                             st_pt != map_keyframes[kf_obs]->stereo_frame->stereo_pt.end(); st_pt++ )
1904                         {
1905                             if( (*st_pt)->idx == lm_idx_map )
1906                             {
1907                                 (*st_pt)->idx = -1;
1908                                 st_pt = map_keyframes[kf_obs]->stereo_frame->stereo_pt.end()-1;
1909                             }
1910                         }
1911                         // update main descriptor and direction
1912                         map_points[lm_idx_map]->updateAverageDescDir();
1913                         // update graphs
1914                         for( int i = 0; i < map_points[lm_idx_map]->kf_obs_list.size(); i++ )
1915                         {
1916                             int idx = map_points[lm_idx_map]->kf_obs_list[i];
1917                             if( kf_obs != idx )
1918                             {
1919                                 full_graph[kf_obs][idx]--;
1920                                 full_graph[idx][kf_obs]--;
1921                             }
1922                         }
1923                     }
1924                     else
1925                         map_points[lm_idx_map]->inlier = false;
1926                 }
1927             }
1928         }
1929     
1930         for( vector<Vector6i>::reverse_iterator ls_it = ls_obs_list.rbegin(); ls_it != ls_obs_list.rend(); ++ls_it )
1931         {
1932             if( (*ls_it)(5) == -1 )
1933             {
1934                 int lm_idx_map = (*ls_it)(0);
1935                 int lm_idx_obs = (*ls_it)(2);
1936                 if( map_lines[lm_idx_map] != NULL )
1937                 {
1938                     int kf_obs = map_lines[lm_idx_map]->kf_obs_list[lm_idx_obs];
1939                     // remove observations from map_points
1940                     if( map_lines[lm_idx_map]->obs_list.size() > 1 )
1941                     {
1942                         // if it is the first observation, update it from map_points_kf_idx
1943                         if( lm_idx_obs == 0 )
1944                         {
1945                             // delete observation from map_points_kf_idx
1946                             for( auto it = map_lines_kf_idx.at(kf_obs).begin(); it != map_lines_kf_idx.at(kf_obs).end(); it++)
1947                             {
1948                                 if( (*it) == lm_idx_map )
1949                                 {
1950                                     int new_kf_base = map_lines[(*it)]->kf_obs_list[1];
1951                                     map_lines_kf_idx.at(new_kf_base).push_back( (*it) );
1952                                     break;
1953                                 }
1954                             }
1955                         }
1956                         // remove observations
1957                         map_lines[lm_idx_map]->desc_list.erase( map_lines[lm_idx_map]->desc_list.begin() + lm_idx_obs );
1958                         map_lines[lm_idx_map]->obs_list.erase( map_lines[lm_idx_map]->obs_list.begin() + lm_idx_obs );
1959                         map_lines[lm_idx_map]->pts_list.erase( map_lines[lm_idx_map]->pts_list.begin() + lm_idx_obs );
1960                         map_lines[lm_idx_map]->dir_list.erase( map_lines[lm_idx_map]->dir_list.begin() + lm_idx_obs );
1961                         map_lines[lm_idx_map]->kf_obs_list.erase( map_lines[lm_idx_map]->kf_obs_list.begin() + lm_idx_obs );
1962                         // remove idx from KeyFrame stereo lines
1963                         for(vector<LineFeature*>::iterator st_ls = map_keyframes[kf_obs]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls.begin();
1964                             st_ls != map_keyframes[kf_obs]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls.end(); st_ls++ )
1965                         {
1966                             if( (*st_ls)->idx == lm_idx_map )
1967                             {
1968                                 (*st_ls)->idx = -1;
1969                                 st_ls = map_keyframes[kf_obs]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls.end()-1;
1970                             }
1971                         }
1972                         // update main descriptor and direction
1973                         map_lines[lm_idx_map]->updateAverageDescDir();
1974                         // update graphs
1975                         for( int i = 0; i < map_lines[lm_idx_map]->kf_obs_list.size(); i++ )
1976                         {
1977                             int idx = map_lines[lm_idx_map]->kf_obs_list[i];
1978                             if( kf_obs != idx )
1979                             {
1980                                 full_graph[kf_obs][idx]--;
1981                                 full_graph[idx][kf_obs]--;
1982                             }
1983                         }
1984                     }
1985                     else
1986                         map_lines[lm_idx_map]->inlier = false;
1987                 }
1988     
1989             }
1990         }
1991     
1992         m_insert_kf.unlock();
1993     
1994         }
1995         else
1996             return -1;
1997     
1998         return 0;
1999     
2000     }
2001     
2002     // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2003     // Global Bundle Adjustment functions
2004     // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2005     
2006     void MapHandler::globalBundleAdjustment()
2007     {
2008     
2009         vector<double> X_aux;
2010     
2011         // create list of keyframes
2012         vector<int> kf_list;
2013         for( vector<KeyFrame*>::iterator kf_it = map_keyframes.begin(); kf_it != map_keyframes.end(); kf_it++)
2014         {
2015             if( (*kf_it)!= NULL )
2016             {
2017                 if( (*kf_it)->kf_idx != 0 )
2018                 {
2019                     Vector6d pose_aux = (*kf_it)->x_kf_w;
2020                     for(int i = 0; i < 6; i++)
2021                         X_aux.push_back( pose_aux(i) );
2022                     kf_list.push_back( (*kf_it)->kf_idx );
2023                 }
2024             }
2025         }
2026     
2027         // create list of point landmarks
2028         vector<Vector6i> pt_obs_list;
2029         vector<int> pt_list;
2030         int lm_local_idx = 0;
2031         for( vector<MapPoint*>::iterator pt_it = map_points.begin(); pt_it != map_points.end(); pt_it++)
2032         {
2033             if( (*pt_it)!= NULL )
2034             {
2035                 Vector3d point_aux = (*pt_it)->point3D;
2036                 for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
2037                     X_aux.push_back( point_aux(i) );
2038                 // gather all observations
2039                 for( int i = 0; i < (*pt_it)->obs_list.size(); i++)
2040                 {
2041                     Vector6i obs_aux;
2042                     obs_aux(0) = (*pt_it)->idx; // LM idx
2043                     obs_aux(1) = lm_local_idx;  // LM local idx
2044                     obs_aux(2) = i;             // LM obs idx
2045                     int kf_obs_list_ = (*pt_it)->kf_obs_list[i];
2046                     obs_aux(3) = kf_obs_list_;  // KF idx
2047                     obs_aux(4) = -1;            // KF local idx (-1 if not local)
2048                     obs_aux(5) = 1;             // 1 if the observation is an inlier
2049                     for( int j = 0; j < kf_list.size(); j++ )
2050                     {
2051                         if( kf_list[j] == kf_obs_list_ )
2052                         {
2053                             obs_aux(4) = j;
2054                             break;
2055                         }
2056                     }
2057                     pt_obs_list.push_back( obs_aux );
2058                 }
2059                 lm_local_idx++;
2060                 // pt_list
2061                 pt_list.push_back( (*pt_it)->idx );
2062             }
2063         }
2064     
2065         // create list of line segment landmarks
2066         vector<Vector6i> ls_obs_list;
2067         vector<int> ls_list;
2068         lm_local_idx = 0;
2069         for( vector<MapLine*>::iterator ls_it = map_lines.begin(); ls_it != map_lines.end(); ls_it++)
2070         {
2071             if( (*ls_it)!= NULL )
2072             {
2073                 Vector6d line_aux = (*ls_it)->line3D;
2074                 for(int i = 0; i < 6; i++)
2075                     X_aux.push_back( line_aux(i) );
2076                 // gather all observations
2077                 for( int i = 0; i < (*ls_it)->obs_list.size(); i++)
2078                 {
2079                     Vector6i obs_aux;
2080                     obs_aux(0) = (*ls_it)->idx; // LM idx
2081                     obs_aux(1) = lm_local_idx;  // LM local idx
2082                     obs_aux(2) = i;             // LM obs idx
2083                     int kf_obs_list_ = (*ls_it)->kf_obs_list[i];
2084                     obs_aux(3) = kf_obs_list_;  // KF idx
2085                     obs_aux(4) = -1;            // KF local idx (-1 if not local)
2086                     obs_aux(5) = 1;             // 1 if the observation is an inlier
2087                     for( int j = 0; j < kf_list.size(); j++ )
2088                     {
2089                         if( kf_list[j] == kf_obs_list_ )
2090                         {
2091                             obs_aux(4) = j;
2092                             break;
2093                         }
2094                     }
2095                     ls_obs_list.push_back( obs_aux );
2096                 }
2097                 lm_local_idx++;
2098                 // ls_list
2099                 ls_list.push_back( (*ls_it)->idx );
2100             }
2101         }
2102     
2103         // Levenberg-Marquardt optimization
2104         levMarquardtOptimizationGBA(X_aux,kf_list,pt_list,ls_list,pt_obs_list,ls_obs_list);
2105     
2106         // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2107     
2108         // Recent map LMs culling (implement filters for line segments, which seems to be unaccurate)
2109         // Recent KFs culling
2110     }
2111     
2112     void MapHandler::levMarquardtOptimizationGBA( vector<double> X_aux, vector<int> kf_list, vector<int> pt_list, vector<int> ls_list, vector<Vector6i> pt_obs_list, vector<Vector6i> ls_obs_list  )
2113     {
2114     
2115         // create Levenberg-Marquardt variables
2116         int    Nkf = kf_list.size();
2117         int      N = X_aux.size();
2118         VectorXd DX, X(N), gdense(N);
2119         SparseVector<double> g(N);
2120         SparseMatrix<double> H(N,N);
2121         for(int i = 0; i < N; i++)
2122             X.coeffRef(i) = X_aux[i];
2123         H.reserve( VectorXi::Constant(N,5000) );
2124     
2125         // create Levenberg-Marquardt parameters
2126         double err, err_prev = 999999999.9;
2127         double lambda = SlamConfig::lambdaLbaLM(), lambda_k = SlamConfig::lambdaLbaK();
2128     
2129         // estimate H and g to precalculate lambda
2130         //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2131         // point observations
2132         int Npt = 0, Npt_obs = 0;
2133         if( pt_obs_list.size() != 0 )
2134             Npt = pt_obs_list.back()(1)+1;
2135         for( vector<Vector6i>::iterator pt_it = pt_obs_list.begin(); pt_it != pt_obs_list.end(); pt_it++ )
2136         {
2137             int lm_idx_map = (*pt_it)(0);
2138             int lm_idx_loc = (*pt_it)(1);
2139             int lm_idx_obs = (*pt_it)(2);
2140             int kf_idx_map = (*pt_it)(3);
2141             int kf_idx_loc = (*pt_it)(4);
2142             if( map_points[lm_idx_map] != NULL && map_keyframes[kf_idx_map] != NULL)
2143             {
2144                 // grab 3D LM (Xwj)
2145                 Vector3d Xwj   = map_points[lm_idx_map]->point3D;
2146                 // grab 6DoF KF (Tiw)
2147                 Matrix4d Tiw   = map_keyframes[kf_idx_map]->T_kf_w;
2148                 // projection error
2149                 Tiw = inverse_se3( Tiw );
2150                 Vector3d Xwi   = Tiw.block(0,0,3,3) * Xwj + Tiw.block(0,3,3,1);
2151                 Vector2d p_prj = cam->projection( Xwi );
2152                 Vector2d p_obs = map_points[lm_idx_map]->obs_list[lm_idx_obs];
2153                 Vector2d p_err    = p_obs - p_prj;
2154                 double p_err_norm = p_err.norm();
2155                 double gx   = Xwi(0);
2156                 double gy   = Xwi(1);
2157                 double gz   = Xwi(2);
2158                 double gz2  = gz*gz;
2159                 gz2         = 1.0 / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),gz2);
2160                 double fx   = cam->getFx();
2161                 double fy   = cam->getFy();
2162                 double dx   = p_err(0);
2163                 double dy   = p_err(1);
2164                 double fxdx = fx*dx;
2165                 double fydy = fy*dy;
2166                 // estimate Jacobian wrt KF pose
2167                 Vector6d Jij_Tiw = Vector6d::Zero();
2168                 Jij_Tiw << + gz2 * fxdx * gz,
2169                            + gz2 * fydy * gz,
2170                            - gz2 * ( fxdx*gx + fydy*gy ),
2171                            - gz2 * ( fxdx*gx*gy + fydy*gy*gy + fydy*gz*gz ),
2172                            + gz2 * ( fxdx*gx*gx + fxdx*gz*gz + fydy*gx*gy ),
2173                            + gz2 * ( fydy*gx*gz - fxdx*gy*gz );
2174                 Jij_Tiw = Jij_Tiw / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),p_err_norm);
2175                 // estimate Jacobian wrt LM
2176                 Vector3d Jij_Xwj = Vector3d::Zero();
2177                 Jij_Xwj << + gz2 * fxdx * gz,
2178                            + gz2 * fydy * gz,
2179                            - gz2 * ( fxdx*gx + fydy*gy );
2180                 Jij_Xwj = Jij_Xwj.transpose() * Tiw.block(0,0,3,3) / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),p_err_norm);
2181                 // if employing robust cost function
2182                 double w  = 1.0;
2183                 double s2 = map_points[lm_idx_map]->sigma_list[lm_idx_obs];
2184                 //double w = 1.0 / ( 1.0 + p_err_norm * p_err_norm * s2 );
2185                 w = robustWeightCauchy(p_err_norm) ;
2186     
2187                 // update hessian, gradient, and error
2188                 int idx = 6 * kf_idx_loc;
2189                 int jdx = 6*Nkf + 3*lm_idx_loc;
2190                 if( kf_idx_loc == -1 )
2191                 {
2192                     err += p_err_norm * p_err_norm * w;
2193                     Vector3d gi;
2194                     Matrix3d Hjj;
2195                     Hjj = Jij_Xwj * Jij_Xwj.transpose() * w;
2196                     gi  = Jij_Xwj * p_err_norm * w;
2197                     for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
2198                     {
2199                         g.coeffRef(jdx+i) += gi(i);
2200                         for(int j = 0; j < 3; j++)
2201                             H.coeffRef(i+jdx,j+jdx) += Hjj(i,j);
2202                     }
2203                 }
2204                 else
2205                 {
2206                     err += p_err_norm * p_err_norm * w;
2207                     Vector3d gj;
2208                     Vector6d gi;
2209                     Matrix6d Hii;
2210                     gi = Jij_Tiw * p_err_norm * w;
2211                     gj = Jij_Xwj * p_err_norm * w;
2212                     Hii = Jij_Tiw * Jij_Tiw.transpose() * w;
2213                     for(int i = 0; i < 6; i++)
2214                     {
2215                         g.coeffRef(i+idx) += gi(i);
2216                         for(int j = 0; j < 6; j++)
2217                             H.coeffRef(i+idx,j+idx) += Hii(i,j);
2218                     }
2219                     Matrix3d Hjj;
2220                     Hjj = Jij_Xwj * Jij_Xwj.transpose() * w;
2221                     for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
2222                     {
2223                         g.coeffRef(i+jdx) += gj(i);
2224                         for(int j = 0; j < 3; j++)
2225                             H.coeffRef(i+jdx,j+jdx) += Hjj(i,j);
2226                     }
2227                     MatrixXd Hij  = MatrixXd::Zero(3,6);
2228                     Hij = Jij_Xwj * Jij_Tiw.transpose() * w;
2229                     for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
2230                     {
2231                         for(int j = 0; j < 6; j++)
2232                         {
2233                             H.coeffRef(i+jdx,j+idx) += Hij(i,j);
2234                             H.coeffRef(j+idx,i+jdx) += Hij(i,j);
2235                         }
2236                     }
2237                 }
2238             }
2239         }
2240         // line segment observations
2241         int Nls = 0, Nls_obs = 0;
2242         if( ls_obs_list.size() != 0 )
2243             Nls = ls_obs_list.back()(1)+1;
2244         for( vector<Vector6i>::iterator ls_it = ls_obs_list.begin(); ls_it != ls_obs_list.end(); ls_it++ )
2245         {
2246             int lm_idx_map = (*ls_it)(0);
2247             int lm_idx_loc = (*ls_it)(1);
2248             int lm_idx_obs = (*ls_it)(2);
2249             int kf_idx_map = (*ls_it)(3);
2250             int kf_idx_loc = (*ls_it)(4);
2251             if( map_lines[lm_idx_map] != NULL && map_keyframes[kf_idx_map] != NULL)
2252             {
2253                 // grab 3D LM (Pwj and Qwj)
2254                 Vector3d Pwj   = map_lines[lm_idx_map]->line3D.head(3);
2255                 Vector3d Qwj   = map_lines[lm_idx_map]->line3D.tail(3);
2256                 // grab 6DoF KF (Tiw)
2257                 Matrix4d Tiw   = map_keyframes[kf_idx_map]->T_kf_w;
2258                 // projection error
2259                 Tiw = inverse_se3( Tiw );
2260                 Vector3d Pwi   = Tiw.block(0,0,3,3) * Pwj + Tiw.block(0,3,3,1);
2261                 Vector3d Qwi   = Tiw.block(0,0,3,3) * Qwj + Tiw.block(0,3,3,1);
2262                 Vector2d p_prj = cam->projection( Pwi );
2263                 Vector2d q_prj = cam->projection( Qwi );
2264                 Vector3d l_obs = map_lines[lm_idx_map]->obs_list[lm_idx_obs];
2265                 Vector2d l_err;
2266                 l_err(0) = l_obs(0) * p_prj(0) + l_obs(1) * p_prj(1) + l_obs(2);
2267                 l_err(1) = l_obs(0) * q_prj(0) + l_obs(1) * q_prj(1) + l_obs(2);
2268                 double l_err_norm = l_err.norm();
2269                 // start point
2270                 double gx   = Pwi(0);
2271                 double gy   = Pwi(1);
2272                 double gz   = Pwi(2);
2273                 double gz2  = gz*gz;
2274                 gz2         = 1.0 / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),gz2);
2275                 double fx   = cam->getFx();
2276                 double fy   = cam->getFy();
2277                 double lx   = l_err(0);
2278                 double ly   = l_err(1);
2279                 double fxlx = fx*lx;
2280                 double fyly = fy*ly;
2281                 // - jac. wrt. KF pose
2282                 Vector6d Jij_Piw = Vector6d::Zero();
2283                 Jij_Piw << + gz2 * fxlx * gz,
2284                            + gz2 * fyly * gz,
2285                            - gz2 * ( fxlx*gx + fyly*gy ),
2286                            - gz2 * ( fxlx*gx*gy + fyly*gy*gy + fyly*gz*gz ),
2287                            + gz2 * ( fxlx*gx*gx + fxlx*gz*gz + fyly*gx*gy ),
2288                            + gz2 * ( fyly*gx*gz - fxlx*gy*gz );
2289                 // - jac. wrt. LM
2290                 Vector3d Jij_Pwj = Vector3d::Zero();
2291                 Jij_Pwj << + gz2 * fxlx * gz,
2292                            + gz2 * fyly * gz,
2293                            - gz2 * ( fxlx*gx + fyly*gy );
2294                 Jij_Pwj = Jij_Pwj.transpose() * Tiw.block(0,0,3,3) * l_err(0) / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),l_err_norm);
2295                 // end point
2296                 gx   = Qwi(0);
2297                 gy   = Qwi(1);
2298                 gz   = Qwi(2);
2299                 gz2  = gz*gz;
2300                 gz2  = 1.0 / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),gz2);
2301                 // - jac. wrt. KF pose
2302                 Vector6d Jij_Qiw = Vector6d::Zero();
2303                 Jij_Qiw << + gz2 * fxlx * gz,
2304                            + gz2 * fyly * gz,
2305                            - gz2 * ( fxlx*gx + fyly*gy ),
2306                            - gz2 * ( fxlx*gx*gy + fyly*gy*gy + fyly*gz*gz ),
2307                            + gz2 * ( fxlx*gx*gx + fxlx*gz*gz + fyly*gx*gy ),
2308                            + gz2 * ( fyly*gx*gz - fxlx*gy*gz );
2309                 // - jac. wrt. LM
2310                 Vector3d Jij_Qwj = Vector3d::Zero();
2311                 Jij_Qwj << + gz2 * fxlx * gz,
2312                            + gz2 * fyly * gz,
2313                            - gz2 * ( fxlx*gx + fyly*gy );
2314                 Jij_Qwj = Jij_Qwj.transpose() * Tiw.block(0,0,3,3) * l_err(1) / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),l_err_norm);
2315                 // estimate Jacobian wrt KF pose
2316                 Vector6d Jij_Tiw = Vector6d::Zero();
2317                 Jij_Tiw = ( Jij_Piw * l_err(0) + Jij_Qiw * l_err(1) ) / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),l_err_norm);
2318                 // estimate Jacobian wrt LM
2319                 Vector6d Jij_Lwj = Vector6d::Zero();
2320                 Jij_Lwj.head(3) = Jij_Pwj;
2321                 Jij_Lwj.tail(3) = Jij_Qwj;
2322                 // if employing robust cost function
2323                 double w  = 1.0;
2324                 w = robustWeightCauchy(l_err_norm) ;
2325                 // update hessian, gradient, and error
2326                 VectorXd gi = VectorXd::Zero(N), gj = VectorXd::Zero(N);
2327                 int idx = 6 * kf_idx_loc;
2328                 int jdx = 6*Nkf + 3*Npt + 6*lm_idx_loc;
2329                 if( kf_idx_loc == -1 )
2330                 {
2331                     gj = Jij_Lwj * l_err_norm * w;
2332                     err += l_err_norm * l_err_norm * w;
2333                     Matrix6d Hjj;
2334                     Hjj = Jij_Lwj * Jij_Lwj.transpose() * w;
2335                     for(int i = 0; i < 6; i++)
2336                     {
2337                         g.coeffRef(jdx+i) += gj(i);
2338                         for(int j = 0; j < 6; j++)
2339                             H.coeffRef(i+jdx,j+jdx) += Hjj(i,j);
2340                     }
2341                 }
2342                 else
2343                 {
2344                     gi = Jij_Tiw * l_err_norm * w;
2345                     gj = Jij_Lwj * l_err_norm * w;
2346                     err += l_err_norm * l_err_norm * w;
2347                     Matrix6d Hii, Hjj;
2348                     MatrixXd Hij   = MatrixXd::Zero(3,6);
2349                     Hii = Jij_Tiw * Jij_Tiw.transpose() * w;
2350                     Hjj = Jij_Lwj * Jij_Lwj.transpose() * w;
2351                     Hij = Jij_Lwj * Jij_Tiw.transpose() * w;
2352                     for(int i = 0; i < 6; i++)
2353                     {
2354                         g.coeffRef(i+idx) += gi(i);
2355                         g.coeffRef(i+jdx) += gj(i);
2356                         for(int j = 0; j < 6; j++)
2357                         {
2358                             H.coeffRef(idx+i,idx+j) += Hii(i,j);
2359                             H.coeffRef(jdx+i,jdx+j) += Hjj(i,j);
2360                             H.coeffRef(idx+i,jdx+j) += Hij(i,j);
2361                             H.coeffRef(jdx+j,idx+i) += Hij(i,j);
2362                         }
2363                     }
2364                 }
2365             }
2366         }
2367         err /= (Npt_obs+Nls_obs);
2368     
2369         // initial guess of lambda
2370         int Hmax = 0.0;
2371         for( int i = 0; i < N; i++)
2372         {
2373             if( H.coeffRef(i,i) > Hmax || H.coeffRef(i,i) < -Hmax )
2374                 Hmax = fabs( H.coeffRef(i,i) );
2375         }
2376         lambda *= Hmax;
2377         // solve the first iteration
2378         H.makeCompressed();
2379         for(int i = 0; i < N; i++)
2380         {
2381             H.coeffRef(i,i) += lambda * H.coeffRef(i,i);
2382             gdense(i) = g.coeffRef(i);
2383         }
2384         SimplicialLDLT< SparseMatrix<double> > solver1(H);
2385         DX = solver1.solve( gdense );
2386         // update KFs
2387         for( int i = 0; i < Nkf; i++)
2388         {
2389             Matrix4d Tprev = expmap_se3( X.block(6*i,0,6,1) );
2390             Matrix4d Tcurr = Tprev * inverse_se3( expmap_se3( DX.block(6*i,0,6,1) ) );       
2391             X.block(6*i,0,6,1) = logmap_se3( Tcurr );
2392         }
2393         // update LMs
2394         for( int i = 6*Nkf; i < N; i++)
2395             X(i) += DX(i);
2396         // update error
2397         err_prev = err;
2398     
2399         // LM iterations
2400         //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2401         int iters;
2402         for( iters = 1; iters < SlamConfig::maxItersLba(); iters++ )
2403         {
2404             // estimate hessian and gradient (reset)
2405             DX.setZero();
2406             g.setZero();
2407             H.setZero();
2408             H.reserve( VectorXi::Constant(N,5000) );
2409             err = 0.0;
2410             // - point observations
2411             for( vector<Vector6i>::iterator pt_it = pt_obs_list.begin(); pt_it != pt_obs_list.end(); pt_it++ )
2412             {
2413                 int lm_idx_map = (*pt_it)(0);
2414                 int lm_idx_loc = (*pt_it)(1);
2415                 int lm_idx_obs = (*pt_it)(2);
2416                 int kf_idx_map = (*pt_it)(3);
2417                 int kf_idx_loc = (*pt_it)(4);
2418                 if( map_points[lm_idx_map] != NULL && map_keyframes[kf_idx_map] != NULL)
2419                 {
2420                     // grab 3D LM (Xwj)
2421                     Vector3d Xwj = X.block(6*Nkf+3*lm_idx_loc,0,3,1);
2422                     // grab 6DoF KF (Tiw)
2423                     Matrix4d Tiw;
2424                     if( kf_idx_loc != -1 )
2425                         Tiw = expmap_se3( X.block( 6*kf_idx_loc,0,6,1 ) );
2426                     else
2427                         Tiw = map_keyframes[kf_idx_map]->T_kf_w;
2428                     // projection error
2429                     Tiw = inverse_se3( Tiw );
2430                     Vector3d Xwi   = Tiw.block(0,0,3,3) * Xwj + Tiw.block(0,3,3,1);
2431                     Vector2d p_prj = cam->projection( Xwi );
2432                     Vector2d p_obs = map_points[lm_idx_map]->obs_list[lm_idx_obs];
2433                     Vector2d p_err    = p_obs - p_prj;
2434                     double p_err_norm = p_err.norm();
2435                     // useful variables
2436                     double gx   = Xwi(0);
2437                     double gy   = Xwi(1);
2438                     double gz   = Xwi(2);
2439                     double gz2  = gz*gz;
2440                     gz2         = 1.0 / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),gz2);
2441                     double fx   = cam->getFx();
2442                     double fy   = cam->getFy();
2443                     double dx   = p_err(0);
2444                     double dy   = p_err(1);
2445                     double fxdx = fx*dx;
2446                     double fydy = fy*dy;
2447                     // estimate Jacobian wrt KF pose
2448                     Vector6d Jij_Tiw = Vector6d::Zero();
2449                     Jij_Tiw << + gz2 * fxdx * gz,
2450                                + gz2 * fydy * gz,
2451                                - gz2 * ( fxdx*gx + fydy*gy ),
2452                                - gz2 * ( fxdx*gx*gy + fydy*gy*gy + fydy*gz*gz ),
2453                                + gz2 * ( fxdx*gx*gx + fxdx*gz*gz + fydy*gx*gy ),
2454                                + gz2 * ( fydy*gx*gz - fxdx*gy*gz );
2455                     Jij_Tiw = Jij_Tiw / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),p_err_norm);
2456                     // estimate Jacobian wrt LM
2457                     Vector3d Jij_Xwj = Vector3d::Zero();
2458                     Jij_Xwj << + gz2 * fxdx * gz,
2459                                + gz2 * fydy * gz,
2460                                - gz2 * ( fxdx*gx + fydy*gy );
2461                     Jij_Xwj = Jij_Xwj.transpose() * Tiw.block(0,0,3,3) / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),p_err_norm);
2462                     // if employing robust cost function
2463                     double  w = 1.0;
2464                     w = robustWeightCauchy(p_err_norm) ;
2465                     // update hessian, gradient, and error
2466                     int idx = 6 * kf_idx_loc;
2467                     int jdx = 6*Nkf + 3*lm_idx_loc;
2468                     if( kf_idx_loc == -1 )
2469                     {
2470                         err += p_err_norm * p_err_norm * w;
2471                         Vector3d gi;
2472                         Matrix3d Hjj;
2473                         Hjj = Jij_Xwj * Jij_Xwj.transpose() * w;
2474                         gi  = Jij_Xwj * p_err_norm * w;
2475                         for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
2476                         {
2477                             g.coeffRef(jdx+i) += gi(i);
2478                             for(int j = 0; j < 3; j++)
2479                                 H.coeffRef(i+jdx,j+jdx) += Hjj(i,j);
2480                         }
2481                     }
2482                     else
2483                     {
2484                         err += p_err_norm * p_err_norm * w;
2485                         Vector3d gj;
2486                         Vector6d gi;
2487                         Matrix6d Hii;
2488                         gi = Jij_Tiw * p_err_norm * w;
2489                         gj = Jij_Xwj * p_err_norm * w;
2490                         Hii = Jij_Tiw * Jij_Tiw.transpose() * w;
2491                         for(int i = 0; i < 6; i++)
2492                         {
2493                             g.coeffRef(i+idx) += gi(i);
2494                             for(int j = 0; j < 6; j++)
2495                                 H.coeffRef(i+idx,j+idx) += Hii(i,j);
2496                         }
2497                         Matrix3d Hjj;
2498                         Hjj = Jij_Xwj * Jij_Xwj.transpose() * w;
2499                         for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
2500                         {
2501                             g.coeffRef(i+jdx) += gj(i);
2502                             for(int j = 0; j < 3; j++)
2503                                 H.coeffRef(i+jdx,j+jdx) += Hjj(i,j);
2504                         }
2505                         MatrixXd Hij  = MatrixXd::Zero(3,6);
2506                         Hij = Jij_Xwj * Jij_Tiw.transpose() * w;
2507                         for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
2508                         {
2509                             for(int j = 0; j < 6; j++)
2510                             {
2511                                 H.coeffRef(i+jdx,j+idx) += Hij(i,j);
2512                                 H.coeffRef(j+idx,i+jdx) += Hij(i,j);
2513                             }
2514                         }
2515                     }
2516                 }
2517             }
2518             // - line segment observations
2519             for( vector<Vector6i>::iterator ls_it = ls_obs_list.begin(); ls_it != ls_obs_list.end(); ls_it++ )
2520             {
2521                 int lm_idx_map = (*ls_it)(0);
2522                 int lm_idx_loc = (*ls_it)(1);
2523                 int lm_idx_obs = (*ls_it)(2);
2524                 int kf_idx_map = (*ls_it)(3);
2525                 int kf_idx_loc = (*ls_it)(4);
2526                 if( map_lines[lm_idx_map] != NULL && map_keyframes[kf_idx_map] != NULL)
2527                 {
2528                     // grab 3D LM (Pwj and Qwj)
2529                     //Vector3d Pwj   = map_lines[lm_idx_map]->line3D.head(3);
2530                     //Vector3d Qwj   = map_lines[lm_idx_map]->line3D.tail(3);
2531                     Vector3d Pwj = X.block(6*Nkf+3*Npt+3*lm_idx_loc,0,3,1);
2532                     Vector3d Qwj = X.block(6*Nkf+3*Npt+3*lm_idx_loc,0,3,1);
2533                     // grab 6DoF KF (Tiw)
2534                     Matrix4d Tiw   = map_keyframes[kf_idx_map]->T_kf_w;
2535                     // projection error
2536                     Tiw = inverse_se3( Tiw );
2537                     Vector3d Pwi   = Tiw.block(0,0,3,3) * Pwj + Tiw.block(0,3,3,1);
2538                     Vector3d Qwi   = Tiw.block(0,0,3,3) * Qwj + Tiw.block(0,3,3,1);
2539                     Vector2d p_prj = cam->projection( Pwi );
2540                     Vector2d q_prj = cam->projection( Qwi );
2541                     Vector3d l_obs = map_lines[lm_idx_map]->obs_list[lm_idx_obs];
2542                     Vector2d l_err;
2543                     l_err(0) = l_obs(0) * p_prj(0) + l_obs(1) * p_prj(1) + l_obs(2);
2544                     l_err(1) = l_obs(0) * q_prj(0) + l_obs(1) * q_prj(1) + l_obs(2);
2545                     double l_err_norm = l_err.norm();
2546                     // start point
2547                     double gx   = Pwi(0);
2548                     double gy   = Pwi(1);
2549                     double gz   = Pwi(2);
2550                     double gz2  = gz*gz;
2551                     gz2         = 1.0 / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),gz2);
2552                     double fx   = cam->getFx();
2553                     double fy   = cam->getFy();
2554                     double lx   = l_err(0);
2555                     double ly   = l_err(1);
2556                     double fxlx = fx*lx;
2557                     double fyly = fy*ly;
2558                     // - jac. wrt. KF pose
2559                     Vector6d Jij_Piw = Vector6d::Zero();
2560                     Jij_Piw << + gz2 * fxlx * gz,
2561                                + gz2 * fyly * gz,
2562                                - gz2 * ( fxlx*gx + fyly*gy ),
2563                                - gz2 * ( fxlx*gx*gy + fyly*gy*gy + fyly*gz*gz ),
2564                                + gz2 * ( fxlx*gx*gx + fxlx*gz*gz + fyly*gx*gy ),
2565                                + gz2 * ( fyly*gx*gz - fxlx*gy*gz );
2566                     // - jac. wrt. LM
2567                     Vector3d Jij_Pwj = Vector3d::Zero();
2568                     Jij_Pwj << + gz2 * fxlx * gz,
2569                                + gz2 * fyly * gz,
2570                                - gz2 * ( fxlx*gx + fyly*gy );
2571                     Jij_Pwj = Jij_Pwj.transpose() * Tiw.block(0,0,3,3) * l_err(0) / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),l_err_norm);
2572                     // end point
2573                     gx   = Qwi(0);
2574                     gy   = Qwi(1);
2575                     gz   = Qwi(2);
2576                     gz2  = gz*gz;
2577                     gz2  = 1.0 / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),gz2);
2578                     // - jac. wrt. KF pose
2579                     Vector6d Jij_Qiw = Vector6d::Zero();
2580                     Jij_Qiw << + gz2 * fxlx * gz,
2581                                + gz2 * fyly * gz,
2582                                - gz2 * ( fxlx*gx + fyly*gy ),
2583                                - gz2 * ( fxlx*gx*gy + fyly*gy*gy + fyly*gz*gz ),
2584                                + gz2 * ( fxlx*gx*gx + fxlx*gz*gz + fyly*gx*gy ),
2585                                + gz2 * ( fyly*gx*gz - fxlx*gy*gz );
2586                     // - jac. wrt. LM
2587                     Vector3d Jij_Qwj = Vector3d::Zero();
2588                     Jij_Qwj << + gz2 * fxlx * gz,
2589                                + gz2 * fyly * gz,
2590                                - gz2 * ( fxlx*gx + fyly*gy );
2591                     Jij_Qwj = Jij_Qwj.transpose() * Tiw.block(0,0,3,3) * l_err(1) / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),l_err_norm);
2592                     // estimate Jacobian wrt KF pose
2593                     Vector6d Jij_Tiw = Vector6d::Zero();
2594                     Jij_Tiw = ( Jij_Piw * l_err(0) + Jij_Qiw * l_err(1) ) / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),l_err_norm);
2595                     // estimate Jacobian wrt LM
2596                     Vector6d Jij_Lwj = Vector6d::Zero();
2597                     Jij_Lwj.head(3) = Jij_Pwj;
2598                     Jij_Lwj.tail(3) = Jij_Qwj;
2599                     // if employing robust cost function
2600                     double  w = 1.0;
2601                     double s2 = map_lines[lm_idx_map]->sigma_list[lm_idx_obs];
2602                     //double w = 1.0 / ( 1.0 + l_err_norm * l_err_norm * s2 );
2603                     w = robustWeightCauchy(l_err_norm) ;
2604                     // update hessian, gradient, and error
2605                     VectorXd gi = VectorXd::Zero(N), gj = VectorXd::Zero(N);
2606                     int idx = 6 * kf_idx_loc;
2607                     int jdx = 6*Nkf + 3*Npt + 6*lm_idx_loc;
2608                     if( kf_idx_loc == -1 )
2609                     {
2610                         gj = Jij_Lwj * l_err_norm * w;
2611                         err += l_err_norm * l_err_norm * w;
2612                         Matrix6d Hjj;
2613                         Hjj = Jij_Lwj * Jij_Lwj.transpose() * w;
2614                         for(int i = 0; i < 6; i++)
2615                         {
2616                             g.coeffRef(jdx+i) += gj(i);
2617                             for(int j = 0; j < 6; j++)
2618                                 H.coeffRef(i+jdx,j+jdx) += Hjj(i,j);
2619                         }
2620                     }
2621                     else
2622                     {
2623                         gi = Jij_Tiw * l_err_norm * w;
2624                         gj = Jij_Lwj * l_err_norm * w;
2625                         err += l_err_norm * l_err_norm * w;
2626                         Matrix6d Hii, Hjj;
2627                         MatrixXd Hij   = MatrixXd::Zero(3,6);
2628                         Hii = Jij_Tiw * Jij_Tiw.transpose() * w;
2629                         Hjj = Jij_Lwj * Jij_Lwj.transpose() * w;
2630                         Hij = Jij_Lwj * Jij_Tiw.transpose() * w;
2631                         for(int i = 0; i < 6; i++)
2632                         {
2633                             g.coeffRef(i+idx) += gi(i);
2634                             g.coeffRef(i+jdx) += gj(i);
2635                             for(int j = 0; j < 6; j++)
2636                             {
2637                                 H.coeffRef(idx+i,idx+j) += Hii(i,j);
2638                                 H.coeffRef(jdx+i,jdx+j) += Hjj(i,j);
2639                                 H.coeffRef(idx+i,jdx+j) += Hij(i,j);
2640                                 H.coeffRef(jdx+j,idx+i) += Hij(j,i);
2641                             }
2642                         }
2643                     }
2644                 }
2645             }
2646             err /= (Npt_obs+Nls_obs);
2647             // if the difference is very small stop
2648             if( abs(err-err_prev) < numeric_limits<double>::epsilon() || err < numeric_limits<double>::epsilon() )
2649                 break;
2650             // add lambda to diagonal
2651             for(int i = 0; i < N; i++)
2652                 H.coeffRef(i,i) += lambda * H.coeffRef(i,i) ;
2653             // solve iteration
2654             H.makeCompressed();
2655             for( int i = 0; i < N; i++)
2656                 gdense(i) = g.coeffRef(i);
2657             SimplicialLDLT< SparseMatrix<double> > solver1(H);
2658             DX = solver1.solve( gdense );
2659             // update lambda
2660             if( err > err_prev ){
2661                 lambda /= lambda_k;
2662             }
2663             else
2664             {
2665                 lambda *= lambda_k;
2666                 // update KFs
2667                 for( int i = 0; i < Nkf; i++)
2668                 {
2669                     Matrix4d Tprev = expmap_se3( X.block(6*i,0,6,1) );
2670                     Matrix4d Tcurr = Tprev * inverse_se3( expmap_se3( DX.block(6*i,0,6,1) ) );
2671                     X.block(6*i,0,6,1) = logmap_se3( Tcurr );
2672                 }
2673                 // update LMs
2674                 for( int i = 6*Nkf; i < N; i++)
2675                     X(i) += DX(i);
2676             }
2677             // if the parameter change is small stop
2678             if( DX.norm() < numeric_limits<double>::epsilon() )
2679                 break;
2680             // update previous values
2681             err_prev = err;
2682         }
2683     
2684         // Update KFs and LMs
2685         //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2686         // update KFs
2687         for( int i = 0; i < Nkf; i++)
2688         {
2689             Matrix4d Test = expmap_se3( X.block( 6*i,0,6,1 ) );
2690             map_keyframes[ kf_list[i] ]->T_kf_w = Test;
2691         }
2692         // update point LMs
2693         for( int i = 0; i < Npt; i++)
2694         {
2695             map_points[ pt_list[i] ]->point3D(0) = X(6*Nkf+3*i);
2696             map_points[ pt_list[i] ]->point3D(1) = X(6*Nkf+3*i+1);
2697             map_points[ pt_list[i] ]->point3D(2) = X(6*Nkf+3*i+2);
2698         }
2699         // update line segment LMs
2700         for( int i = 0; i < Nls; i++)
2701         {
2702             map_lines[ ls_list[i] ]->line3D(0) = X(6*Nkf+3*Npt+6*i);
2703             map_lines[ ls_list[i] ]->line3D(1) = X(6*Nkf+3*Npt+6*i+1);
2704             map_lines[ ls_list[i] ]->line3D(2) = X(6*Nkf+3*Npt+6*i+2);
2705             map_lines[ ls_list[i] ]->line3D(3) = X(6*Nkf+3*Npt+6*i+3);
2706             map_lines[ ls_list[i] ]->line3D(4) = X(6*Nkf+3*Npt+6*i+4);
2707             map_lines[ ls_list[i] ]->line3D(5) = X(6*Nkf+3*Npt+6*i+5);
2708         }
2709     
2710     }
2711     
2712     // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2713     // Culling functions
2714     // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2715     
2716     void MapHandler::removeBadMapLandmarks()
2717     {
2718     
2719         // point features
2720         for( vector<MapPoint*>::iterator pt_it = map_points.begin(); pt_it != map_points.end(); pt_it++)
2721         {
2722             if( (*pt_it)!=NULL )
2723             {
2724                 if( (*pt_it)->local == false && max_kf_idx - (*pt_it)->kf_obs_list[0] > 10 )
2725                 {
2726                     if( (*pt_it)->inlier == false || (*pt_it)->obs_list.size() < SlamConfig::minLMObs() )
2727                     {
2728                         int kf_obs = (*pt_it)->kf_obs_list[0];
2729                         int lm_idx = (*pt_it)->idx;
2730                         // remove idx from KeyFrame stereo points
2731                         for(vector<PointFeature*>::iterator st_pt = map_keyframes[kf_obs]->stereo_frame->stereo_pt.begin();
2732                             st_pt != map_keyframes[kf_obs]->stereo_frame->stereo_pt.end(); st_pt++ )
2733                         {
2734                             if( (*st_pt)->idx == lm_idx )
2735                             {
2736                                 (*st_pt)->idx = -1;
2737                                 break;
2738                             }
2739                         }
2740                         // remove from map_points_kf_idx
2741                         int iter = 0;
2742                         for( auto it = map_points_kf_idx.at(kf_obs).begin(); it != map_points_kf_idx.at(kf_obs).end(); it++, iter++)
2743                         {
2744                             if( (*it) == lm_idx )
2745                             {
2746                                 map_points_kf_idx.at(kf_obs).erase( map_points_kf_idx.at(kf_obs).begin() + iter );
2747                                 break;
2748                             }
2749                         }
2750                         // remove LM
2751                         delete (*pt_it);
2752                         (*pt_it) = nullptr;
2753                     }
2754                 }
2755             }
2756         }
2757     
2758         // line features
2759         for( vector<MapLine*>::iterator ls_it = map_lines.begin(); ls_it != map_lines.end(); ls_it++)
2760         {
2761             if((*ls_it) != NULL)
2762             {
2763                 if( (*ls_it)->local == false && max_kf_idx-(*ls_it)->kf_obs_list[0] > 10 )
2764                 {
2765                     if( (*ls_it)->inlier == false || (*ls_it)->obs_list.size() < SlamConfig::minLMObs() )
2766                     {
2767                         int kf_obs = (*ls_it)->kf_obs_list[0];
2768                         int lm_idx = (*ls_it)->idx;
2769                         // remove idx from KeyFrame stereo points
2770                         for(vector<LineFeature*>::iterator st_ls = map_keyframes[kf_obs]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls.begin();
2771                             st_ls != map_keyframes[kf_obs]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls.end(); st_ls++ )
2772                         {
2773                             if( (*st_ls)->idx == lm_idx )
2774                             {
2775                                 (*st_ls)->idx = -1;
2776                                 break;
2777                             }
2778                         }
2779                         // remove from map_points_kf_idx
2780                         int iter = 0;
2781                         for( auto it = map_lines_kf_idx.at(kf_obs).begin(); it != map_lines_kf_idx.at(kf_obs).end(); it++, iter++)
2782                         {
2783                             if( (*it) == lm_idx )
2784                             {
2785                                 map_lines_kf_idx.at(kf_obs).erase( map_lines_kf_idx.at(kf_obs).begin() + iter );
2786                                 break;
2787                             }
2788                         }
2789     
2790                         // remove LM
2791                         delete (*ls_it);
2792                         (*ls_it) = nullptr;
2793                     }
2794                 }
2795             }
2796         }
2797     }
2798     
2799     void MapHandler::removeRedundantKFs()
2800     {
2801     
2802         // select which KFs are going to remove
2803         vector<int> kf_idxs;
2804         for( vector<KeyFrame*>::iterator kf_it = map_keyframes.begin(); kf_it != map_keyframes.end(); kf_it++)
2805         {
2806             if((*kf_it) != NULL)
2807             {
2808                 int kf_idx = (*kf_it)->kf_idx;
2809                 if( !(*kf_it)->local && kf_idx > 1 && kf_idx < max_kf_idx )
2810                 {
2811                     // estimate number of landmarks observed by this KF
2812                     int n_feats = 0;
2813                     for( vector<PointFeature*>::iterator pt_it = (*kf_it)->stereo_frame->stereo_pt.begin();
2814                          pt_it != (*kf_it)->stereo_frame->stereo_pt.end(); pt_it++ )
2815                     {
2816                         if( (*pt_it)->idx != -1 )
2817                             n_feats++;
2818                     }
2819                     for( vector<LineFeature*>::iterator ls_it = (*kf_it)->stereo_frame->stereo_ls.begin();
2820                          ls_it != (*kf_it)->stereo_frame->stereo_ls.end(); ls_it++)
2821                     {
2822                         if( (*ls_it)->idx != -1 )
2823                             n_feats++;
2824                     }
2825                     int max_n_feats = int( SlamConfig::maxCommonFtsKF() * double(n_feats) );
2826                     // check if the KF is redundant
2827                     int n_graph = full_graph.size();
2828                     for(int i = 0; i < n_graph-1, i != kf_idx; i++)
2829                     {
2830                         if( map_keyframes[i] != NULL )
2831                         {
2832                             if( full_graph[kf_idx][i] > n_feats )
2833                                 kf_idxs.push_back(kf_idx);
2834                         }
2835                     }
2836                 }
2837             }
2838         }
2839     
2840         // eliminate KFs, LMs observed only by this KFs, and all observations from this KF
2841         for( int i = 0; i < kf_idxs.size(); i++)
2842         {
2843             int kf_idx = kf_idxs[i];
2844             if( map_keyframes[kf_idx] != NULL )
2845             {
2846                 // delete observation from map_points_kf_idx
2847                 if( !(map_points_kf_idx.find(kf_idx) == map_points_kf_idx.end()) )
2848                 {
2849                     for( auto it = map_points_kf_idx.at(kf_idx).begin(); it != map_points_kf_idx.at(kf_idx).end(); it++)
2850                     {
2851                         if( map_points[(*it)] != NULL &&  map_points[(*it)]->kf_obs_list.size() <= 1 )
2852                         {
2853                             bool found = false;
2854                             for( int k = 1; k < map_points[(*it)]->kf_obs_list.size(); k++)
2855                             {
2856                                 map_points_kf_idx.find( map_points[(*it)]->kf_obs_list[k] );
2857                                 int new_kf_base = map_points[(*it)]->kf_obs_list[k];    // if the second dont exist...
2858                                 if( !(map_points_kf_idx.find(new_kf_base)==map_points_kf_idx.end()) )
2859                                 {
2860                                     map_points_kf_idx.at(new_kf_base).push_back( (*it) );
2861                                     found = true;
2862                                 }
2863                             }
2864                             if( !found )
2865                                 map_points[(*it)]->inlier = false;
2866                         }
2867                     }
2868                     map_points_kf_idx.erase(kf_idx);
2869                 }
2870     
2871                 // delete observation from map_lines_kf_idx
2872                 for( auto it = map_lines_kf_idx.at(kf_idx).begin(); it != map_lines_kf_idx.at(kf_idx).end(); it++)
2873                 {
2874                     if( map_points[(*it)]!= NULL )
2875                     {
2876                         int new_kf_base = map_lines[(*it)]->kf_obs_list[1];
2877                         map_lines_kf_idx.at(new_kf_base).push_back( (*it) );
2878                     }
2879                 }
2880                 map_lines_kf_idx.erase(kf_idx);
2881     
2882                 // iterate over point features
2883                 for( vector<PointFeature*>::iterator pt_it = map_keyframes[kf_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_pt.begin();
2884                      pt_it != map_keyframes[kf_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_pt.end(); pt_it++)
2885                 {
2886                     int pt_idx = (*pt_it)->idx;
2887                     if( pt_idx != -1 )
2888                     {
2889                         if( map_points[pt_idx] != NULL )
2890                         {
2891                             for( int j = 0; j < map_points[pt_idx]->obs_list.size(); j++)
2892                             {
2893                                 if( map_points[pt_idx]->kf_obs_list[j] == kf_idx )
2894                                 {
2895                                     // delete observation
2896                                     map_points[pt_idx]->desc_list.erase( map_points[pt_idx]->desc_list.begin() + j );
2897                                     map_points[pt_idx]->obs_list.erase( map_points[pt_idx]->obs_list.begin() + j );
2898                                     map_points[pt_idx]->dir_list.erase( map_points[pt_idx]->dir_list.begin() + j );
2899                                     map_points[pt_idx]->kf_obs_list.erase( map_points[pt_idx]->kf_obs_list.begin() + j );
2900                                     // update main descriptor and direction
2901                                     map_points[pt_idx]->updateAverageDescDir();
2902                                 }
2903                             }
2904                         }
2905                     }
2906                 }
2907     
2908                 // iterate over line segment features
2909                 for( vector<LineFeature*>::iterator ls_it = map_keyframes[kf_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls.begin();
2910                      ls_it != map_keyframes[kf_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls.end(); ls_it++)
2911                 {
2912                     int ls_idx = (*ls_it)->idx;
2913                     if( ls_idx != -1 )
2914                     {
2915                         if( map_lines[ls_idx] != NULL )
2916                         {
2917                             for( int j = 0; j < map_lines[ls_idx]->obs_list.size(); j++)
2918                             {
2919                                 if( map_lines[ls_idx]->kf_obs_list[j] == kf_idx )
2920                                 {
2921                                     // delete observation
2922                                     map_lines[ls_idx]->desc_list.erase( map_lines[ls_idx]->desc_list.begin() + j );
2923                                     map_lines[ls_idx]->obs_list.erase( map_lines[ls_idx]->obs_list.begin() + j );
2924                                     map_lines[ls_idx]->dir_list.erase( map_lines[ls_idx]->dir_list.begin() + j );
2925                                     map_lines[ls_idx]->kf_obs_list.erase( map_lines[ls_idx]->kf_obs_list.begin() + j );
2926                                     map_lines[ls_idx]->pts_list.erase( map_lines[ls_idx]->pts_list.begin() + j );
2927                                     // update main descriptor and direction
2928                                     map_lines[ls_idx]->updateAverageDescDir();
2929                                 }
2930                             }
2931                         }
2932                     }
2933                 }
2934     
2935                 // update full graph
2936                 for( int k = 0; k < full_graph.size()-1; k++ )
2937                 {
2938                     full_graph[kf_idx][k] = 0;
2939                     full_graph[k][kf_idx] = 0;
2940                 }
2941     
2942                 // erase KF
2943                 delete map_keyframes[kf_idx];
2944                 map_keyframes[kf_idx] = nullptr;
2945             }
2946         }
2947     }

2950     // Loop Closure functions
2951     // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2952     
2953     void MapHandler::loopClosure()
2954     {
2955     
2956         Timer timer;
2957     
2958         // look for loop closure candidates
2959         int kf_prev_idx, kf_curr_idx;
2960         kf_curr_idx = max_kf_idx;
2961         timer.start();
2962         bool is_lc_candidate = lookForLoopCandidates(kf_curr_idx,kf_prev_idx);
2963         time(4) = timer.stop(); // ms
2964     
2965         // compute relative transformation if it is LC candidate
2966         if( is_lc_candidate )
2967         {
2968             vector<Vector4i> lc_pt_idx, lc_ls_idx;
2969             vector<PointFeature*> lc_points;
2970             vector<LineFeature*>  lc_lines;
2971             Vector6d pose_inc;
2972             timer.start();
2973             bool isLC = isLoopClosure( map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx], map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx], pose_inc, lc_pt_idx, lc_ls_idx, lc_points, lc_lines );
2974             time(5) = timer.stop(); //ms
2975             // if it is loop closure, add information and update status
2976             if( isLC )
2977             {
2978                 lc_pt_idxs.push_back( lc_pt_idx );
2979                 lc_ls_idxs.push_back( lc_ls_idx );
2980                 lc_poses.push_back( pose_inc );
2981                 lc_pose_list.push_back( pose_inc );
2982                 Vector3i lc_idx;
2983                 lc_idx(0) = kf_prev_idx;
2984                 lc_idx(1) = kf_curr_idx;
2985                 lc_idx(2) = 1;
2986                 lc_idxs.push_back( lc_idx );
2987                 lc_idx_list.push_back(lc_idx);
2988                 if( lc_state == LC_IDLE )
2989                     lc_state = LC_ACTIVE;
2990             }
2991             else
2992             {
2993                 if( lc_state == LC_ACTIVE )
2994                     lc_state = LC_READY;
2995             }
2996     
2997             for (PointFeature* pt : lc_points)
2998                 delete pt;
2999             for (LineFeature* ls : lc_lines)
3000                 delete ls;
3001         }
3002         else
3003         {
3004             if( lc_state == LC_ACTIVE )
3005                 lc_state = LC_READY;
3006         }
3007     
3008         // LC computation
3009         if( lc_state == LC_READY )  // add condition indicating that the LC has finished
3010         {
3011             timer.start();
3012             loopClosureOptimizationCovGraphG2O();
3013             time(6) = timer.stop(); //ms
3014             lc_state = LC_IDLE;
3015         }
3016     }
3017     
3018     void MapHandler::insertKFBowVectorP( KeyFrame* kf  )
3019     {
3020     
3021         // transform Mat to vector<Mat>
3022         vector<Mat> curr_desc;
3023         curr_desc.reserve( kf->stereo_frame->pdesc_l.rows );
3024         for ( int i = 0; i < kf->stereo_frame->pdesc_l.rows; i++ )
3025             curr_desc.push_back( kf->stereo_frame->pdesc_l.row(i) );
3026         // transform to DBoW2::BowVector
3027         dbow_voc_p.transform( curr_desc, kf->descDBoW_P );
3028     
3029         // fill the confusion matrix for the new KF
3030         int idx = kf->kf_idx;
3031         for( int i = 0; i < idx; i++)
3032         {
3033             if( map_keyframes[i] != NULL )
3034             {
3035                 double score = dbow_voc_p.score( kf->descDBoW_P, map_keyframes[i]->descDBoW_P );
3036                 conf_matrix[idx][i] = score;
3037                 conf_matrix[i][idx] = score;
3038             }
3039         }
3040         conf_matrix[idx][idx] = dbow_voc_p.score( kf->descDBoW_P, kf->descDBoW_P );
3041     }
3042     
3043     void MapHandler::insertKFBowVectorL( KeyFrame* kf  )
3044     {
3045     
3046         // transform Mat to vector<Mat>
3047         vector<Mat> curr_desc;
3048         curr_desc.reserve( kf->stereo_frame->ldesc_l.rows );
3049         for ( int i = 0; i < kf->stereo_frame->ldesc_l.rows; i++ )
3050             curr_desc.push_back( kf->stereo_frame->ldesc_l.row(i) );
3051         // transform to DBoW2::BowVector
3052         dbow_voc_l.transform( curr_desc, kf->descDBoW_L );
3053     
3054         // fill the confusion matrix for the new KF
3055         int idx = kf->kf_idx;
3056         for( int i = 0; i < idx; i++)
3057         {
3058             if( map_keyframes[i] != NULL )
3059             {
3060                 double score = dbow_voc_l.score( kf->descDBoW_L, map_keyframes[i]->descDBoW_L );
3061                 conf_matrix[idx][i] = score;
3062                 conf_matrix[i][idx] = score;
3063             }
3064         }
3065         conf_matrix[idx][idx] = dbow_voc_l.score( kf->descDBoW_L, kf->descDBoW_L );
3066     }
3067     
3068     void MapHandler::insertKFBowVectorPL( KeyFrame* kf  )
3069     {
3070     
3071         // Point Features
3072         // --------------------------------------------------------------
3073         // transform Mat to vector<Mat>
3074         vector<Mat> curr_desc;
3075         curr_desc.reserve( kf->stereo_frame->pdesc_l.rows );
3076         for ( int i = 0; i < kf->stereo_frame->pdesc_l.rows; i++ )
3077             curr_desc.push_back( kf->stereo_frame->pdesc_l.row(i) );
3078         // transform to DBoW2::BowVector
3079         dbow_voc_p.transform( curr_desc, kf->descDBoW_P );
3080     
3081         // estimate dispersion of point features
3082         vector<double> pt_x, pt_y;
3083         for (PointFeature* pt : kf->stereo_frame->stereo_pt)
3084         {
3085             pt_x.push_back( pt->pl(0) );
3086             pt_y.push_back( pt->pl(1) );
3087         }
3088         double std_pt = vector_stdv( pt_x ) + vector_stdv( pt_y );
3089         int    n_pt   = pt_x.size();
3090     
3091         // Line Segment Features
3092         // --------------------------------------------------------------
3093         // transform Mat to vector<Mat>
3094         curr_desc.clear();
3095         curr_desc.reserve( kf->stereo_frame->ldesc_l.rows );
3096         for ( int i = 0; i < kf->stereo_frame->ldesc_l.rows; i++ )
3097             curr_desc.push_back( kf->stereo_frame->ldesc_l.row(i) );
3098         // transform to DBoW2::BowVector
3099         dbow_voc_l.transform( curr_desc, kf->descDBoW_L );
3100     
3101         // estimate dispersion of point features
3102         vector<double> ls_x, ls_y;
3103         for (LineFeature* ls : kf->stereo_frame->stereo_ls)
3104         {
3105             Vector2d mp;
3106             mp << (ls->spl + ls->epl)*0.5;
3107             ls_x.push_back( mp(0) );
3108             ls_y.push_back( mp(1) );
3109         }
3110         double std_ls = vector_stdv( ls_x ) + vector_stdv( ls_y );
3111         double std_pl = std_ls + std_pt;
3112         int    n_ls  = ls_x.size();
3113         int    n_pl  = n_pt + n_ls;
3114     
3115         // Combined Approach
3116         // --------------------------------------------------------------
3117         // fill the confusion matrix for the new KF
3118         double score, score_p, score_l;
3119         int idx = kf->kf_idx;
3120         for( int i = 0; i < idx; i++)
3121         {
3122             if( map_keyframes[i] != NULL )
3123             {
3124                 score_p = dbow_voc_p.score( kf->descDBoW_P, map_keyframes[i]->descDBoW_P );
3125                 score_l = dbow_voc_l.score( kf->descDBoW_L, map_keyframes[i]->descDBoW_L );
3126                 score = 0.0;
3127                 score += ( score_p * n_pt   + score_l * n_ls   ) / n_pl;    // strategy#1
3128                 score += ( score_p * std_pt + score_l * std_ls ) / std_pl;  // strategy#2
3129                 conf_matrix[idx][i] = score;
3130                 conf_matrix[i][idx] = score;
3131             }
3132         }
3133         score_p = dbow_voc_p.score( kf->descDBoW_P, kf->descDBoW_P );
3134         score_l = dbow_voc_l.score( kf->descDBoW_L, kf->descDBoW_L);
3135         score = 0.0;
3136         score += ( score_p * n_pt   + score_l * n_ls   ) / n_pl;    // strategy#1
3137         score += ( score_p * std_pt + score_l * std_ls ) / std_pl;  // strategy#2
3138         conf_matrix[idx][idx] = score;
3139     }
3140     
3141     bool MapHandler::lookForLoopCandidates( int kf_curr_idx, int &kf_prev_idx )
3142     {
3143         bool is_lc_candidate = false;
3144         kf_prev_idx = -1;
3145     
3146         // find the best matches
3147         vector<Vector2d> max_confmat;
3148         for(int i = 0; i < kf_curr_idx - SlamConfig::lcKFDist(); i++)
3149         {
3150             if( map_keyframes[i] != NULL )
3151             {
3152                 Vector2d aux;
3153                 aux(0) = i;
3154                 aux(1) = conf_matrix[i][kf_curr_idx];
3155                 max_confmat.push_back( aux );
3156             }
3157         }
3158     
3159         // if there are enough matches..
3160         if( max_confmat.size() > SlamConfig::lcKFMaxDist() )
3161         {
3162             sort( max_confmat.begin(), max_confmat.end(), sort_confmat_by_score() );
3163     
3164             // find the minimum score in the covisibility graph
3165             double lc_min_score = 1.0;
3166             for( int i = 0; i < kf_curr_idx; i++ )
3167             {
3168                 if( full_graph[i][kf_curr_idx] >= SlamConfig::minLMCovGraph() || kf_curr_idx - i <= SlamConfig::minKFLocalMap()+3 )
3169                 {
3170                     double score_i = conf_matrix[i][kf_curr_idx];
3171                     if( score_i < lc_min_score && score_i > 0.001 )
3172                         lc_min_score = score_i;
3173                 }
3174             }
3175     
3176             // the best match must has an score above lc_dbow_score_max
3177             int idx_max = int( max_confmat[0](0) );
3178             int Nkf_closest = 0;
3179             if( max_confmat[0](1) >= lc_min_score )
3180             {
3181                 // there must be at least lc_nkf_closest KFs conected to the LC candidate with a score above lc_dbow_score_min
3182                 for( int i = 1; i < max_confmat.size(); i++ )
3183                 {
3184                     int idx = int( max_confmat[i](0) );
3185                     // frame closest && connected by the cov_graph && score > lc_dbow_score_min
3186                     if( abs(idx-idx_max) <= SlamConfig::lcKFMaxDist() &&
3187                         max_confmat[i](1) >= lc_min_score * 0.8 )
3188                         Nkf_closest++;
3189                 }
3190     
3191                 // update in case of being loop closure candidate
3192                 if( Nkf_closest >= SlamConfig::lcNKFClosest() )
3193                 {
3194                     is_lc_candidate = true;
3195                     kf_prev_idx     = idx_max;
3196                 }
3197             }
3198         }
3199     
3200         return is_lc_candidate;
3201     }
3202     
3203     bool MapHandler::isLoopClosure( const KeyFrame* kf0, const KeyFrame* kf1, Vector6d &pose_inc,
3204                                     vector<Vector4i> &lc_pt_idx, vector<Vector4i> &lc_ls_idx,
3205                                     vector<PointFeature*> &lc_points, vector<LineFeature*>  &lc_lines)
3206     {
3207     
3208         // grab frame number
3209         int kf0_idx = kf0->kf_idx;
3210         int kf1_idx = kf1->kf_idx;
3211     
3212         // number of stereo matches
3213         int n_pt_0 = kf0->stereo_frame->stereo_pt.size();
3214         int n_pt_1 = kf1->stereo_frame->stereo_pt.size();
3215         int n_ls_0 = kf0->stereo_frame->stereo_ls.size();
3216         int n_ls_1 = kf1->stereo_frame->stereo_ls.size();
3217     
3218         // initial pose increment
3219         Matrix4d DT = Matrix4d::Identity();
3220     
3221         // structures to optimize camera drift
3222         lc_pt_idx.clear();
3223         lc_ls_idx.clear();
3224         lc_points.clear();
3225         lc_lines.clear();
3226     
3227         // find matches between both KFs
3228         // ---------------------------------------------------
3229         // points f2f tracking
3230         int common_pt = 0;
3231         if( SlamConfig::hasPoints() && !kf1->stereo_frame->stereo_pt.empty() && !kf0->stereo_frame->stereo_pt.empty() )
3232         {
3233             vector<int> matches_12;
3234             common_pt = match(kf0->stereo_frame->pdesc_l, kf1->stereo_frame->pdesc_l, SlamConfig::minRatio12P(), matches_12);
3235     
3236             for (int i1 = 0; i1 < matches_12.size(); ++i1) {
3237                 const int i2 = matches_12[i1];
3238                 if (i2 < 0) continue;
3239     
3240                 // save data for optimization
3241                 Vector3d P       = kf0->stereo_frame->stereo_pt[i1]->P;
3242                 Vector2d pl_obs  = kf1->stereo_frame->stereo_pt[i2]->pl;
3243                 PointFeature* pt = new PointFeature( P, pl_obs );
3244                 lc_points.push_back(pt);
3245                 // save indices for fusing LMs
3246                 Vector4i idx;
3247                 idx(0) = kf0->stereo_frame->stereo_pt[i1]->idx;
3248                 idx(1) = i1;
3249                 idx(2) = kf1->stereo_frame->stereo_pt[i2]->idx;
3250                 idx(3) = i2;
3251                 lc_pt_idx.push_back(idx);
3252             }
3253         }
3254     
3255         // line segments f2f tracking
3256         int common_ls = 0;
3257         if( SlamConfig::hasLines() && !kf1->stereo_frame->stereo_ls.empty() && !kf0->stereo_frame->stereo_ls.empty() )
3258         {
3259             vector<int> matches_12;
3260             common_ls = match(kf0->stereo_frame->ldesc_l, kf1->stereo_frame->ldesc_l, SlamConfig::minRatio12L(), matches_12);
3261     
3262             for (int i1 = 0; i1 < matches_12.size(); ++i1) {
3263                 const int i2 = matches_12[i1];
3264                 if (i2 < 0) continue;
3265     
3266                 // save data for optimization
3267                 Vector3d sP     = kf0->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[i1]->sP;
3268                 Vector3d eP     = kf0->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[i1]->eP;
3269                 Vector3d le_obs = kf1->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[i2]->le;
3270                 LineFeature* ls = new LineFeature( sP, eP, le_obs, kf1->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[i2]->spl, kf1->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[i2]->epl );
3271                 lc_lines.push_back(ls);
3272                 // save indices for fusing LMs
3273                 Vector4i idx;
