3274                 idx(0) = kf0->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[i1]->idx;
3275                 idx(1) = i1;
3276                 idx(2) = kf1->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[i2]->idx;
3277                 idx(3) = i2;
3278                 lc_ls_idx.push_back(idx);
3279             }
3280         }
3281     
3282         // estimate relative pose between both KFs
3283         // ---------------------------------------------------
3284         double inl_ratio_pt = max( 100.0 * common_pt / n_pt_0, 100.0 * common_pt / n_pt_1 );
3285         double inl_ratio_ls = max( 100.0 * common_ls / n_ls_0, 100.0 * common_ls / n_ls_1 );
3286         bool inl_ratio_condition = false;
3287     
3288         if( SlamConfig::hasPoints() && SlamConfig::hasLines() )
3289         {
3290             if( inl_ratio_pt > SlamConfig::lcInlierRatio() && inl_ratio_ls > SlamConfig::lcInlierRatio() )
3291                 inl_ratio_condition = true;
3292         }
3293         else if( SlamConfig::hasPoints() )
3294         {
3295             if( inl_ratio_pt > SlamConfig::lcInlierRatio() )
3296                 inl_ratio_condition = true;
3297         }
3298         else if( SlamConfig::hasLines() )
3299         {
3300             if( inl_ratio_ls > SlamConfig::lcInlierRatio() )
3301                 inl_ratio_condition = true;
3302         }
3303     
3304     
3305         //inl_ratio_condition = true;
3306         if( inl_ratio_condition )
3307             return computeRelativePoseRobustGN(lc_points,lc_lines,lc_pt_idx,lc_ls_idx,pose_inc);
3308         else
3309             return false;
3310     
3311     }
3312     
3313     bool MapHandler::computeRelativePoseGN( vector<PointFeature*> &lc_points, vector<LineFeature*> &lc_lines,
3314                                             vector<Vector4i>      &lc_pt_idx, vector<Vector4i>     &lc_ls_idx,
3315                                             Vector6d &pose_inc) const
3316     {
3317     
3318         // create GN variables
3319         Vector6d x_inc = Vector6d::Zero(), x_prev = Vector6d::Zero();
3320         Matrix4d T_inc = Matrix4d::Identity(), T_prev = Matrix4d::Zero();
3321         Matrix6d H_l, H_p, H;
3322         Vector6d g_l, g_p, g;
3323         H = Matrix6d::Zero();
3324         g = Vector6d::Zero();
3325         H_l = H; H_p = H;
3326         g_l = g; g_p = g;
3327         double   e_l = 0.0, e_p = 0.0, e = 0.0, S_l, S_p;
3328     
3329         // create GN parameters
3330         double err, err_prev = 999999999.9;
3331         int    max_iters_first = SlamConfig::maxIters(), max_iters = SlamConfig::maxItersRef();
3332     
3333         // GN iterations
3334         //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3335         for( int iters = 0; iters < max_iters_first; iters++)
3336         {
3337             H = Matrix6d::Zero(); H_l = H; H_p = H;
3338             g = Vector6d::Zero(); g_l = g; g_p = g;
3339             e = 0.0; e_p = 0.0; e_l = 0.0;
3340             // point observations
3341             int N_p = 0;
3342             for( vector<PointFeature*>::iterator pt_it = lc_points.begin(); pt_it != lc_points.end(); pt_it++ )
3343             {
3344                 if( (*pt_it)->inlier )
3345                 {
3346                     Vector3d P_ = T_inc.block(0,0,3,3) * (*pt_it)->P + T_inc.col(3).head(3);
3347                     Vector2d pl_proj = cam->projection( P_ );
3348                     // projection error
3349                     Vector2d err_i    = pl_proj - (*pt_it)->pl_obs;
3350                     double err_i_norm = err_i.norm();
3351                     double gx   = P_(0);
3352                     double gy   = P_(1);
3353                     double gz   = P_(2);
3354                     double gz2  = gz*gz;
3355                     double fgz2 = cam->getFx() / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),gz2);
3356                     double dx   = err_i(0);
3357                     double dy   = err_i(1);
3358                     // jacobian
3359                     Vector6d J_aux;
3360                     J_aux << + fgz2 * dx * gz,
3361                              + fgz2 * dy * gz,
3362                              - fgz2 * ( gx*dx + gy*dy ),
3363                              - fgz2 * ( gx*gy*dx + gy*gy*dy + gz*gz*dy ),
3364                              + fgz2 * ( gx*gx*dx + gz*gz*dx + gx*gy*dy ),
3365                              + fgz2 * ( gx*gz*dy - gy*gz*dx );
3366                     J_aux = J_aux / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),err_i_norm);
3367                     // if employing robust cost function
3368                     double  w = 1.0;
3369                     double s2 = (*pt_it)->sigma2;
3370                     //double w = 1.0 / ( 1.0 + err_i_norm * err_i_norm * s2 );
3371                     w = robustWeightCauchy(err_i_norm) ;
3372     
3373                     // update hessian, gradient, and error
3374                     H_p += J_aux * J_aux.transpose() * w;
3375                     g_p += J_aux * err_i_norm * w;
3376                     e_p += err_i_norm * err_i_norm * w;
3377                     N_p++;
3378                 }
3379             }
3380             // line segment features
3381             int N_l = 0;
3382             for( vector<LineFeature*>::iterator ls_it = lc_lines.begin(); ls_it != lc_lines.end(); ls_it++ )
3383             {
3384                 if( (*ls_it)->inlier )
3385                 {
3386                     Vector3d sP_ = T_inc.block(0,0,3,3) * (*ls_it)->sP + T_inc.col(3).head(3);
3387                     Vector2d spl_proj = cam->projection( sP_ );
3388                     Vector3d eP_ = T_inc.block(0,0,3,3) * (*ls_it)->eP + T_inc.col(3).head(3);
3389                     Vector2d epl_proj = cam->projection( eP_ );
3390                     Vector3d l_obs = (*ls_it)->le_obs;
3391                     // projection error
3392                     Vector2d err_i;
3393                     err_i(0) = l_obs(0) * spl_proj(0) + l_obs(1) * spl_proj(1) + l_obs(2);
3394                     err_i(1) = l_obs(0) * epl_proj(0) + l_obs(1) * epl_proj(1) + l_obs(2);
3395                     double err_i_norm = err_i.norm();
3396                     // start point
3397                     double gx   = sP_(0);
3398                     double gy   = sP_(1);
3399                     double gz   = sP_(2);
3400                     double gz2  = gz*gz;
3401                     double fgz2 = cam->getFx() / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),gz2);
3402                     double ds   = err_i(0);
3403                     double de   = err_i(1);
3404                     double lx   = l_obs(0);
3405                     double ly   = l_obs(1);
3406                     Vector6d Js_aux;
3407                     Js_aux << + fgz2 * lx * gz,
3408                               + fgz2 * ly * gz,
3409                               - fgz2 * ( gx*lx + gy*ly ),
3410                               - fgz2 * ( gx*gy*lx + gy*gy*ly + gz*gz*ly ),
3411                               + fgz2 * ( gx*gx*lx + gz*gz*lx + gx*gy*ly ),
3412                               + fgz2 * ( gx*gz*ly - gy*gz*lx );
3413                     // end point
3414                     gx   = eP_(0);
3415                     gy   = eP_(1);
3416                     gz   = eP_(2);
3417                     gz2  = gz*gz;
3418                     fgz2 = cam->getFx() / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),gz2);
3419                     Vector6d Je_aux, J_aux;
3420                     Je_aux << + fgz2 * lx * gz,
3421                               + fgz2 * ly * gz,
3422                               - fgz2 * ( gx*lx + gy*ly ),
3423                               - fgz2 * ( gx*gy*lx + gy*gy*ly + gz*gz*ly ),
3424                               + fgz2 * ( gx*gx*lx + gz*gz*lx + gx*gy*ly ),
3425                               + fgz2 * ( gx*gz*ly - gy*gz*lx );
3426                     // jacobian
3427                     J_aux = ( Js_aux * ds + Je_aux * de ) / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),err_i_norm);
3428                     // if employing robust cost function
3429                     double  w = 1.0;
3430                     w = robustWeightCauchy(err_i_norm) ;
3431                     // update hessian, gradient, and error
3432                     H_l += J_aux * J_aux.transpose() * w;
3433                     g_l += J_aux * err_i_norm * w;
3434                     e_l += err_i_norm * err_i_norm * w;
3435                     N_l++;
3436                 }
3437             }
3438             // sum H, g and err from both points and lines
3439             H = H_p + H_l;
3440             g = g_p + g_l;
3441             e = e_p + e_l;
3442             // normalize error
3443             e /= (N_l+N_p);
3444             // if the difference is very small stop
3445             if( abs(e-err_prev) < numeric_limits<double>::epsilon() || e < numeric_limits<double>::epsilon() )
3446                 break;
3447             // solve
3448             ColPivHouseholderQR<MatrixXd> solver(H);
3449             x_inc = solver.solve( g );
3450             T_inc = T_inc * inverse_se3( expmap_se3(x_inc) );
3451             // if the parameter change is small stop
3452             if( x_inc.norm() < numeric_limits<double>::epsilon() )
3453                 break;
3454             // update error
3455             err_prev = e;
3456         }
3457         x_inc = logmap_se3(T_inc);
3458     
3459         // Remove outliers
3460         //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3461         // point observations
3462         for( vector<PointFeature*>::iterator pt_it = lc_points.begin(); pt_it != lc_points.end(); pt_it++ )
3463         {
3464             if( (*pt_it)->inlier )
3465             {
3466                 Vector3d P_ = T_inc.block(0,0,3,3) * (*pt_it)->P + T_inc.col(3).head(3);
3467                 Vector2d pl_proj = cam->projection( P_ );
3468                 // projection error
3469                 Vector2d err_i    = pl_proj - (*pt_it)->pl_obs;
3470                 double s2 = (*pt_it)->sigma2;
3471                 if( err_i.norm() > sqrt(7.815) )
3472                     (*pt_it)->inlier = false;
3473             }
3474         }
3475         // line segments observations
3476         for( vector<LineFeature*>::iterator ls_it = lc_lines.begin(); ls_it != lc_lines.end(); ls_it++ )
3477         {
3478             if((*ls_it)->inlier)
3479             {
3480                 Vector3d sP_ = T_inc.block(0,0,3,3) * (*ls_it)->sP + T_inc.col(3).head(3);
3481                 Vector2d spl_proj = cam->projection( sP_ );
3482                 Vector3d eP_ = T_inc.block(0,0,3,3) * (*ls_it)->eP + T_inc.col(3).head(3);
3483                 Vector2d epl_proj = cam->projection( eP_ );
3484                 Vector3d l_obs = (*ls_it)->le_obs;
3485                 // projection error
3486                 Vector2d err_i;
3487                 err_i(0) = l_obs(0) * spl_proj(0) + l_obs(1) * spl_proj(1) + l_obs(2);
3488                 err_i(1) = l_obs(0) * epl_proj(0) + l_obs(1) * epl_proj(1) + l_obs(2);
3489                 double s2 = sqrt((*ls_it)->sigma2);
3490                 if( err_i.norm() > sqrt(7.815) )
3491                     (*ls_it)->inlier = false;
3492             }
3493         }
3494     
3495         // Check whether it is Loop Closure or not
3496         //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3497         // Residue value
3498         bool lc_res = ( e < SlamConfig::lcRes() );
3499     
3500         // Uncertainty value
3501         Matrix6d DT_cov;
3502         DT_cov = H.inverse();
3503         SelfAdjointEigenSolver<Matrix6d> eigensolver(DT_cov);
3504         Vector6d DT_cov_eig = eigensolver.eigenvalues();
3505         bool lc_unc = ( DT_cov_eig(5) < SlamConfig::lcUnc() );
3506     
3507         // Ratio of outliers
3508         int N = lc_points.size() + lc_lines.size(), N_inl = 0;
3509         for( vector<PointFeature*>::iterator pt_it = lc_points.begin(); pt_it != lc_points.end(); pt_it++ )
3510         {
3511             if( (*pt_it)->inlier )
3512                 N_inl++;
3513         }
3514         for( vector<LineFeature*>::iterator  ls_it = lc_lines.begin();  ls_it != lc_lines.end();  ls_it++ )
3515         {
3516             if( (*ls_it)->inlier )
3517                 N_inl++;
3518         }
3519         double ratio_inliers = double(N_inl) / double(N);
3520         bool lc_inl = ( ratio_inliers > SlamConfig::lcInl() );
3521         //lc_inl = true;
3522     
3523         // Geometry condition
3524         double t = x_inc.head(3).norm();
3525         double r = x_inc.tail(3).norm() * 180.f / CV_PI;
3526         bool lc_trs = ( t < SlamConfig::lcTrs() );
3527         bool lc_rot = ( r < SlamConfig::lcRot() );
3528     
3529         // Decision
3530         if( lc_res && lc_unc && lc_inl && lc_trs && lc_rot )
3531         {
3532             // erase outliers from lc_pt_idx & lc_ls_idx
3533             int iter = 0;
3534             vector<Vector4i> lc_pt_idx_, lc_ls_idx_;
3535             vector<PointFeature*> lc_points_;
3536             vector<LineFeature*>  lc_lines_;
3537             for( vector<PointFeature*>::iterator pt_it = lc_points.begin(); pt_it != lc_points.end(); pt_it++, iter++ )
3538             {
3539                 if( (*pt_it)!= NULL )
3540                 {
3541                     if( (*pt_it)->inlier )
3542                     {
3543                         lc_points_.push_back( (*pt_it) );
3544                         lc_pt_idx_.push_back( lc_pt_idx[iter] );
3545                     }
3546                 }
3547             }
3548             iter = 0;
3549             for( vector<LineFeature*>::iterator ls_it = lc_lines.begin(); ls_it != lc_lines.end(); ls_it++, iter++ )
3550             {
3551                 if( (*ls_it)!= NULL )
3552                 {
3553                     if( (*ls_it)->inlier )
3554                     {
3555                         lc_lines_.push_back( (*ls_it) );
3556                         lc_ls_idx_.push_back( lc_ls_idx[iter] );
3557                     }
3558                 }
3559             }
3560             lc_pt_idx.clear();
3561             lc_pt_idx = lc_pt_idx_;
3562             lc_ls_idx.clear();
3563             lc_ls_idx = lc_ls_idx_;
3564             lc_points.clear();
3565             lc_points = lc_points_;
3566             lc_lines.clear();
3567             lc_points = lc_points_;
3568             // assign pose increment
3569             pose_inc = logmap_se3( inverse_se3( T_inc ) );
3570             return true;
3571         }
3572         else
3573             return false;
3574     
3575     }
3576     
3577     bool MapHandler::computeRelativePoseRobustGN( vector<PointFeature*> &lc_points, vector<LineFeature*> &lc_lines,
3578                                             vector<Vector4i>      &lc_pt_idx, vector<Vector4i>     &lc_ls_idx,
3579                                             Vector6d &pose_inc) const
3580     {
3581     
3582         // create GN variables
3583         Vector6d x_inc = Vector6d::Zero(), x_prev = Vector6d::Zero();
3584         Matrix4d T_inc = Matrix4d::Identity(), T_prev = Matrix4d::Zero();
3585         Matrix6d H_l, H_p, H;
3586         Vector6d g_l, g_p, g;
3587         H = Matrix6d::Zero();
3588         g = Vector6d::Zero();
3589         H_l = H; H_p = H;
3590         g_l = g; g_p = g;
3591         double   e_l = 0.0, e_p = 0.0, e = 0.0, S_l, S_p;
3592     
3593         // create GN parameters
3594         double err, err_prev = 999999999.9;
3595         int    max_iters_first = SlamConfig::maxIters(), max_iters = SlamConfig::maxItersRef();
3596     
3597         // GN iterations
3598         //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3599         for( int iters = 0; iters < max_iters_first; iters++)
3600         {
3601             H = Matrix6d::Zero(); H_l = H; H_p = H;
3602             g = Vector6d::Zero(); g_l = g; g_p = g;
3603             e = 0.0; e_p = 0.0; e_l = 0.0;
3604             // point observations
3605             int N_p = 0;
3606             for( vector<PointFeature*>::iterator pt_it = lc_points.begin(); pt_it != lc_points.end(); pt_it++ )
3607             {
3608                 if( (*pt_it)->inlier )
3609                 {
3610                     Vector3d P_ = T_inc.block(0,0,3,3) * (*pt_it)->P + T_inc.col(3).head(3);
3611                     Vector2d pl_proj = cam->projection( P_ );
3612                     // projection error
3613                     Vector2d err_i    = pl_proj - (*pt_it)->pl_obs;
3614                     double err_i_norm = err_i.norm();
3615                     double gx   = P_(0);
3616                     double gy   = P_(1);
3617                     double gz   = P_(2);
3618                     double gz2  = gz*gz;
3619                     double fgz2 = cam->getFx() / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),gz2);
3620                     double dx   = err_i(0);
3621                     double dy   = err_i(1);
3622                     // jacobian
3623                     Vector6d J_aux;
3624                     J_aux << + fgz2 * dx * gz,
3625                              + fgz2 * dy * gz,
3626                              - fgz2 * ( gx*dx + gy*dy ),
3627                              - fgz2 * ( gx*gy*dx + gy*gy*dy + gz*gz*dy ),
3628                              + fgz2 * ( gx*gx*dx + gz*gz*dx + gx*gy*dy ),
3629                              + fgz2 * ( gx*gz*dy - gy*gz*dx );
3630                     J_aux = J_aux / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),err_i_norm);
3631                     // if employing robust cost function
3632                     double  w = 1.0;
3633                     double s2 = (*pt_it)->sigma2;
3634                     w = robustWeightCauchy(err_i_norm) ;
3635                     // update hessian, gradient, and error
3636                     H_p += J_aux * J_aux.transpose() * w;
3637                     g_p += J_aux * err_i_norm * w;
3638                     e_p += err_i_norm * err_i_norm * w;
3639                     N_p++;
3640                 }
3641             }
3642             // line segment features
3643             int N_l = 0;
3644             for( vector<LineFeature*>::iterator ls_it = lc_lines.begin(); ls_it != lc_lines.end(); ls_it++ )
3645             {
3646                 if( (*ls_it)->inlier )
3647                 {
3648                     Vector3d sP_ = T_inc.block(0,0,3,3) * (*ls_it)->sP + T_inc.col(3).head(3);
3649                     Vector2d spl_proj = cam->projection( sP_ );
3650                     Vector3d eP_ = T_inc.block(0,0,3,3) * (*ls_it)->eP + T_inc.col(3).head(3);
3651                     Vector2d epl_proj = cam->projection( eP_ );
3652                     Vector3d l_obs = (*ls_it)->le_obs;
3653                     // projection error
3654                     Vector2d err_i;
3655                     err_i(0) = l_obs(0) * spl_proj(0) + l_obs(1) * spl_proj(1) + l_obs(2);
3656                     err_i(1) = l_obs(0) * epl_proj(0) + l_obs(1) * epl_proj(1) + l_obs(2);
3657                     double err_i_norm = err_i.norm();
3658                     // start point
3659                     double gx   = sP_(0);
3660                     double gy   = sP_(1);
3661                     double gz   = sP_(2);
3662                     double gz2  = gz*gz;
3663                     double fgz2 = cam->getFx() / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),gz2);
3664                     double ds   = err_i(0);
3665                     double de   = err_i(1);
3666                     double lx   = l_obs(0);
3667                     double ly   = l_obs(1);
3668                     Vector6d Js_aux;
3669                     Js_aux << + fgz2 * lx * gz,
3670                               + fgz2 * ly * gz,
3671                               - fgz2 * ( gx*lx + gy*ly ),
3672                               - fgz2 * ( gx*gy*lx + gy*gy*ly + gz*gz*ly ),
3673                               + fgz2 * ( gx*gx*lx + gz*gz*lx + gx*gy*ly ),
3674                               + fgz2 * ( gx*gz*ly - gy*gz*lx );
3675                     // end point
3676                     gx   = eP_(0);
3677                     gy   = eP_(1);
3678                     gz   = eP_(2);
3679                     gz2  = gz*gz;
3680                     fgz2 = cam->getFx() / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),gz2);
3681                     Vector6d Je_aux, J_aux;
3682                     Je_aux << + fgz2 * lx * gz,
3683                               + fgz2 * ly * gz,
3684                               - fgz2 * ( gx*lx + gy*ly ),
3685                               - fgz2 * ( gx*gy*lx + gy*gy*ly + gz*gz*ly ),
3686                               + fgz2 * ( gx*gx*lx + gz*gz*lx + gx*gy*ly ),
3687                               + fgz2 * ( gx*gz*ly - gy*gz*lx );
3688                     // jacobian
3689                     J_aux = ( Js_aux * ds + Je_aux * de ) / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),err_i_norm);
3690                     // if employing robust cost function
3691                     double  w = 1.0;
3692                     double s2 = (*ls_it)->sigma2;
3693                     w = robustWeightCauchy(err_i_norm) ;
3694                     // update hessian, gradient, and error
3695                     H_l += J_aux * J_aux.transpose() * w;
3696                     g_l += J_aux * err_i_norm * w;
3697                     e_l += err_i_norm * err_i_norm * w;
3698                     N_l++;
3699                 }
3700             }
3701             // sum H, g and err from both points and lines
3702             H = H_p + H_l;
3703             g = g_p + g_l;
3704             e = e_p + e_l;
3705             // normalize error
3706             e /= (N_l+N_p);
3707     
3708             // if the difference is very small stop
3709             if( abs(e-err_prev) < numeric_limits<double>::epsilon() || e < numeric_limits<double>::epsilon() )
3710                 break;
3711     
3712             // solve
3713             ColPivHouseholderQR<MatrixXd> solver(H);
3714             x_inc = solver.solve( g );
3715             T_inc = T_inc * inverse_se3( expmap_se3(x_inc) );
3716     
3717             // if the parameter change is small stop
3718             if( x_inc.norm() < numeric_limits<double>::epsilon() )
3719                 break;
3720     
3721             // update error
3722             err_prev = e;
3723     
3724         }
3725     
3726         // Remove outliers
3727         //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3728         // point observations
3729         for( vector<PointFeature*>::iterator pt_it = lc_points.begin(); pt_it != lc_points.end(); pt_it++ )
3730         {
3731             if( (*pt_it)->inlier )
3732             {
3733                 Vector3d P_ = T_inc.block(0,0,3,3) * (*pt_it)->P + T_inc.col(3).head(3);
3734                 Vector2d pl_proj = cam->projection( P_ );
3735                 // projection error
3736                 Vector2d err_i    = pl_proj - (*pt_it)->pl_obs;
3737                 double s2 = (*pt_it)->sigma2;
3738                 if( err_i.norm() > sqrt(7.815) )
3739                     (*pt_it)->inlier = false;
3740             }
3741         }
3742         // line segments observations
3743         for( vector<LineFeature*>::iterator ls_it = lc_lines.begin(); ls_it != lc_lines.end(); ls_it++ )
3744         {
3745             if((*ls_it)->inlier)
3746             {
3747                 Vector3d sP_ = T_inc.block(0,0,3,3) * (*ls_it)->sP + T_inc.col(3).head(3);
3748                 Vector2d spl_proj = cam->projection( sP_ );
3749                 Vector3d eP_ = T_inc.block(0,0,3,3) * (*ls_it)->eP + T_inc.col(3).head(3);
3750                 Vector2d epl_proj = cam->projection( eP_ );
3751                 Vector3d l_obs = (*ls_it)->le_obs;
3752                 // projection error
3753                 Vector2d err_i;
3754                 err_i(0) = l_obs(0) * spl_proj(0) + l_obs(1) * spl_proj(1) + l_obs(2);
3755                 err_i(1) = l_obs(0) * epl_proj(0) + l_obs(1) * epl_proj(1) + l_obs(2);
3756                 double s2 = sqrt((*ls_it)->sigma2);
3757                 if( err_i.norm() > sqrt(7.815) )
3758                     (*ls_it)->inlier = false;
3759             }
3760         }
3761     
3762         // GN refinement
3763         //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3764         for( int iters = 0; iters < max_iters; iters++)
3765         {
3766             H = Matrix6d::Zero(); H_l = H; H_p = H;
3767             g = Vector6d::Zero(); g_l = g; g_p = g;
3768             e = 0.0; e_p = 0.0; e_l = 0.0;
3769             // point observations
3770             int N_p = 0;
3771             for( vector<PointFeature*>::iterator pt_it = lc_points.begin(); pt_it != lc_points.end(); pt_it++ )
3772             {
3773                 if( (*pt_it)->inlier )
3774                 {
3775                     Vector3d P_ = T_inc.block(0,0,3,3) * (*pt_it)->P + T_inc.col(3).head(3);
3776                     Vector2d pl_proj = cam->projection( P_ );
3777                     // projection error
3778                     Vector2d err_i    = pl_proj - (*pt_it)->pl_obs;
3779                     double err_i_norm = err_i.norm();
3780                     double gx   = P_(0);
3781                     double gy   = P_(1);
3782                     double gz   = P_(2);
3783                     double gz2  = gz*gz;
3784                     double fgz2 = cam->getFx() / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),gz2);
3785                     double dx   = err_i(0);
3786                     double dy   = err_i(1);
3787                     // jacobian
3788                     Vector6d J_aux;
3789                     J_aux << + fgz2 * dx * gz,
3790                              + fgz2 * dy * gz,
3791                              - fgz2 * ( gx*dx + gy*dy ),
3792                              - fgz2 * ( gx*gy*dx + gy*gy*dy + gz*gz*dy ),
3793                              + fgz2 * ( gx*gx*dx + gz*gz*dx + gx*gy*dy ),
3794                              + fgz2 * ( gx*gz*dy - gy*gz*dx );
3795                     J_aux = J_aux / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),err_i_norm);
3796                     // if employing robust cost function
3797                     double  w = 1.0;
3798                     w = robustWeightCauchy(err_i_norm) ;
3799                     // update hessian, gradient, and error
3800                     H_p += J_aux * J_aux.transpose() * w;
3801                     g_p += J_aux * err_i_norm * w;
3802                     e_p += err_i_norm * err_i_norm * w;
3803                     N_p++;
3804                 }
3805             }
3806             // line segment features
3807             int N_l = 0;
3808             for( vector<LineFeature*>::iterator ls_it = lc_lines.begin(); ls_it != lc_lines.end(); ls_it++ )
3809             {
3810                 if( (*ls_it)->inlier )
3811                 {
3812                     Vector3d sP_ = T_inc.block(0,0,3,3) * (*ls_it)->sP + T_inc.col(3).head(3);
3813                     Vector2d spl_proj = cam->projection( sP_ );
3814                     Vector3d eP_ = T_inc.block(0,0,3,3) * (*ls_it)->eP + T_inc.col(3).head(3);
3815                     Vector2d epl_proj = cam->projection( eP_ );
3816                     Vector3d l_obs = (*ls_it)->le_obs;
3817                     // projection error
3818                     Vector2d err_i;
3819                     err_i(0) = l_obs(0) * spl_proj(0) + l_obs(1) * spl_proj(1) + l_obs(2);
3820                     err_i(1) = l_obs(0) * epl_proj(0) + l_obs(1) * epl_proj(1) + l_obs(2);
3821                     double err_i_norm = err_i.norm();
3822                     // start point
3823                     double gx   = sP_(0);
3824                     double gy   = sP_(1);
3825                     double gz   = sP_(2);
3826                     double gz2  = gz*gz;
3827                     double fgz2 = cam->getFx() / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),gz2);
3828                     double ds   = err_i(0);
3829                     double de   = err_i(1);
3830                     double lx   = l_obs(0);
3831                     double ly   = l_obs(1);
3832                     Vector6d Js_aux;
3833                     Js_aux << + fgz2 * lx * gz,
3834                               + fgz2 * ly * gz,
3835                               - fgz2 * ( gx*lx + gy*ly ),
3836                               - fgz2 * ( gx*gy*lx + gy*gy*ly + gz*gz*ly ),
3837                               + fgz2 * ( gx*gx*lx + gz*gz*lx + gx*gy*ly ),
3838                               + fgz2 * ( gx*gz*ly - gy*gz*lx );
3839                     // end point
3840                     gx   = eP_(0);
3841                     gy   = eP_(1);
3842                     gz   = eP_(2);
3843                     gz2  = gz*gz;
3844                     fgz2 = cam->getFx() / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),gz2);
3845                     Vector6d Je_aux, J_aux;
3846                     Je_aux << + fgz2 * lx * gz,
3847                               + fgz2 * ly * gz,
3848                               - fgz2 * ( gx*lx + gy*ly ),
3849                               - fgz2 * ( gx*gy*lx + gy*gy*ly + gz*gz*ly ),
3850                               + fgz2 * ( gx*gx*lx + gz*gz*lx + gx*gy*ly ),
3851                               + fgz2 * ( gx*gz*ly - gy*gz*lx );
3852                     // jacobian
3853                     J_aux = ( Js_aux * ds + Je_aux * de ) / std::max(SlamConfig::homogTh(),err_i_norm);
3854                     // if employing robust cost function
3855                     double  w = 1.0;
3856                     double s2 = (*ls_it)->sigma2;
3857                     w = robustWeightCauchy(err_i_norm) ;
3858                     // update hessian, gradient, and error
3859                     H_l += J_aux * J_aux.transpose() * w;
3860                     g_l += J_aux * err_i_norm * w;
3861                     e_l += err_i_norm * err_i_norm * w;
3862                     N_l++;
3863                 }
3864             }
3865             // sum H, g and err from both points and lines
3866             H = H_p + H_l;
3867             g = g_p + g_l;
3868             e = e_p + e_l;
3869             // normalize error
3870             e /= (N_l+N_p);
3871             // if the difference is very small stop
3872             if( abs(e-err_prev) < numeric_limits<double>::epsilon() || e < numeric_limits<double>::epsilon() )
3873                 break;
3874             // solve
3875             ColPivHouseholderQR<MatrixXd> solver(H);
3876             x_inc = solver.solve( g );
3877             T_inc = T_inc * inverse_se3( expmap_se3(x_inc) );
3878             // if the parameter change is small stop
3879             if( x_inc.norm() < numeric_limits<double>::epsilon() )
3880                 break;
3881             // update error
3882             err_prev = e;
3883         }
3884     
3885         x_inc = logmap_se3(T_inc);
3886     
3887         // Check whether it is Loop Closure or not
3888         //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3889         // Residue value
3890         bool lc_res = ( e < SlamConfig::lcRes() );
3891     
3892         // Uncertainty value
3893         Matrix6d DT_cov;
3894         DT_cov = H.inverse();
3895         SelfAdjointEigenSolver<Matrix6d> eigensolver(DT_cov);
3896         Vector6d DT_cov_eig = eigensolver.eigenvalues();
3897         bool lc_unc = ( DT_cov_eig(5) < SlamConfig::lcUnc() );
3898     
3899         // Ratio of outliers
3900         int N = lc_points.size() + lc_lines.size(), N_inl = 0;
3901         for( vector<PointFeature*>::iterator pt_it = lc_points.begin(); pt_it != lc_points.end(); pt_it++ )
3902         {
3903             if( (*pt_it)->inlier )
3904                 N_inl++;
3905         }
3906         for( vector<LineFeature*>::iterator  ls_it = lc_lines.begin();  ls_it != lc_lines.end();  ls_it++ )
3907         {
3908             if( (*ls_it)->inlier )
3909                 N_inl++;
3910         }
3911         double ratio_inliers = double(N_inl) / double(N);
3912         bool lc_inl = ( ratio_inliers > SlamConfig::lcInl() );
3913     
3914         lc_inl = true;
3915     
3916         // Geometry condition
3917         double t = x_inc.head(3).norm();
3918         double r = x_inc.tail(3).norm() * 180.f / CV_PI;
3919         bool lc_trs = ( t < SlamConfig::lcTrs() );
3920         bool lc_rot = ( r < SlamConfig::lcRot() );
3921     
3922         // Decision
3923         if( lc_res && lc_unc && lc_inl && lc_trs && lc_rot )
3924         {
3925             // erase outliers from      lc_pt_idx & lc_ls_idx
3926             int iter = 0;
3927             vector<Vector4i> lc_pt_idx_, lc_ls_idx_;
3928             vector<PointFeature*> lc_points_;
3929             vector<LineFeature*>  lc_lines_;
3930             for( vector<PointFeature*>::iterator pt_it = lc_points.begin(); pt_it != lc_points.end(); pt_it++, iter++ )
3931             {
3932                 if( (*pt_it)!= NULL )
3933                 {
3934                     if( (*pt_it)->inlier )
3935                     {
3936                         lc_points_.push_back( (*pt_it) );
3937                         lc_pt_idx_.push_back( lc_pt_idx[iter] );
3938                     }
3939                 }
3940             }
3941             iter = 0;
3942             for( vector<LineFeature*>::iterator ls_it = lc_lines.begin(); ls_it != lc_lines.end(); ls_it++, iter++ )
3943             {
3944                 if( (*ls_it)!= NULL )
3945                 {
3946                     if( (*ls_it)->inlier )
3947                     {
3948                         lc_lines_.push_back( (*ls_it) );
3949                         lc_ls_idx_.push_back( lc_ls_idx[iter] );
3950                     }
3951                 }
3952             }
3953             lc_pt_idx.clear();
3954             lc_pt_idx = lc_pt_idx_;
3955             lc_ls_idx.clear();
3956             lc_ls_idx = lc_ls_idx_;
3957             lc_points.clear();
3958             lc_points = lc_points_;
3959             lc_lines.clear();
3960             lc_points = lc_points_;
3961             // assign pose increment
3962             pose_inc = logmap_se3( inverse_se3( expmap_se3(x_inc) ) );
3963             return true;
3964         }
3965         else
3966             return false;
3967     
3968     }
3969     
3970     bool MapHandler::loopClosureOptimizationEssGraphG2O()
3971     {
3972     
3973         // define G2O variables
3974         g2o::SparseOptimizer optimizer;
3975         optimizer.setVerbose(true);
3976         g2o::BlockSolver_6_3::LinearSolverType* linearSolver;
3977         linearSolver = new g2o::LinearSolverCholmod<g2o::BlockSolver_6_3::PoseMatrixType>();
3978         g2o::BlockSolver_6_3* solver_ptr = new g2o::BlockSolver_6_3(linearSolver);
3979         g2o::OptimizationAlgorithmLevenberg* solver = new g2o::OptimizationAlgorithmLevenberg(solver_ptr);
3980         solver->setUserLambdaInit(1e-10);
3981         optimizer.setAlgorithm(solver);
3982     
3983         // select min and max KF indices
3984         int kf_prev_idx =  2 * max_kf_idx;
3985         int kf_curr_idx = -1;
3986         for( auto it = lc_idxs.begin(); it != lc_idxs.end(); it++)
3987         {
3988             if( (*it)(0) < kf_prev_idx )
3989                 kf_prev_idx = (*it)(0);
3990             if( (*it)(1) > kf_curr_idx )
3991                 kf_curr_idx = (*it)(1);
3992         }
3993     
3994         // grab the KFs included in the optimization
3995         vector<int> kf_list;
3996         for( int i = kf_prev_idx; i <= kf_curr_idx; i++)
3997         {
3998             if( map_keyframes[i] != NULL )
3999             {
4000                 // check if it is a LC vertex
4001                 bool is_lc_i = false;
4002                 bool is_lc_j = false;
4003                 int id = 0;
4004                 for( auto it = lc_idxs.begin(); it != lc_idxs.end(); it++, id++ )
4005                 {
4006                     if( (*it)(0) == i )
4007                     {
4008                         is_lc_i = true;
4009                         break;
4010                     }
4011                     if( (*it)(1) == i )
4012                     {
4013                         is_lc_j = true;
4014                         break;
4015                     }
4016                 }
4017                 kf_list.push_back(i);
4018                 // create SE3 vertex
4019                 g2o::VertexSE3* v_se3 = new g2o::VertexSE3();
4020                 v_se3->setId(i);
4021                 v_se3->setMarginalized( false );
4022                 if( is_lc_j )
4023                 {
4024                     // update pose of LC vertex
4025                     v_se3->setFixed(true);
4026                     v_se3->setEstimate( g2o::SE3Quat::exp( reverse_se3(logmap_se3( (expmap_se3(lc_pose_list[id])) * map_keyframes[lc_idxs[id](0)]->T_kf_w )) ) );
4027                 }
4028                 else
4029                 {
4030                     v_se3->setEstimate( g2o::SE3Quat::exp( reverse_se3(map_keyframes[i]->x_kf_w) ) );
4031                     if( is_lc_i || i == 0 )
4032                         v_se3->setFixed(true);
4033                 }
4034                 optimizer.addVertex( v_se3 );
4035             }
4036         }
4037     
4038         // introduce edges
4039         for( int i = kf_prev_idx; i <= kf_curr_idx; i++ )
4040         {
4041             for( int j = i+1; j <= kf_curr_idx; j++ )
4042             {
4043                 if( map_keyframes[i] != NULL && map_keyframes[j] != NULL &&
4044                     ( full_graph[i][j] >= SlamConfig::minLMEssGraph() || abs(i-j) == 1  ) )
4045                 {
4046                     // kf2kf constraint
4047                     Matrix4d T_ji_constraint = inverse_se3( map_keyframes[i]->T_kf_w ) * map_keyframes[j]->T_kf_w;
4048                     // add edge
4049                     g2o::EdgeSE3* e_se3 = new g2o::EdgeSE3();
4050                     e_se3->setVertex( 0, optimizer.vertex(i) );
4051                     e_se3->setVertex( 1, optimizer.vertex(j) );
4052                     Vector6d x;
4053                     x = reverse_se3(logmap_se3(T_ji_constraint) );
4054                     e_se3->setMeasurement( g2o::SE3Quat::exp(x) );
4055                     e_se3->setInformation( Matrix6d::Identity() );
4056                     optimizer.addEdge( e_se3 );
4057                 }
4058             }
4059         }
4060     
4061         // introduce loop closure edges
4062         int id = 0;
4063         for( auto it = lc_idx_list.begin(); it != lc_idx_list.end(); it++, id++ )
4064         {
4065             // add edge
4066             g2o::EdgeSE3* e_se3 = new g2o::EdgeSE3();
4067             e_se3->setVertex( 0, optimizer.vertex((*it)(0)) );
4068             e_se3->setVertex( 1, optimizer.vertex((*it)(1)) );
4069             Vector6d x;
4070             x = reverse_se3( lc_pose_list[id] );
4071             e_se3->setMeasurement( g2o::SE3Quat::exp(x) );
4072             e_se3->information() = Matrix6d::Identity();
4073             optimizer.addEdge( e_se3 );
4074         }
4075     
4076         // optimize graph
4077         optimizer.initializeOptimization();
4078         optimizer.computeInitialGuess();
4079         optimizer.computeActiveErrors();
4080         optimizer.optimize(SlamConfig::maxItersPGO());
4081     
4082         // recover pose and update map
4083         Matrix4d Tkfw_corr;
4084         for( auto kf_it = kf_list.begin(); kf_it != kf_list.end(); kf_it++)
4085         {
4086             g2o::VertexSE3* v_se3 = static_cast<g2o::VertexSE3*>(optimizer.vertex( (*kf_it) ));
4087             g2o::SE3Quat Tiw_corr =  v_se3->estimateAsSE3Quat();
4088             Vector6d x;
4089             Matrix4d Tkfw, Tkfw_prev;
4090             x = reverse_se3(Tiw_corr.log());
4091             Tkfw = expmap_se3( x );
4092             Tkfw_prev = map_keyframes[ (*kf_it) ]->T_kf_w;
4093             map_keyframes[ (*kf_it) ]->T_kf_w = Tkfw;
4094             map_keyframes[ (*kf_it) ]->x_kf_w = logmap_se3(Tkfw);
4095             // update map
4096             Tkfw_corr = Tkfw * inverse_se3( Tkfw_prev );
4097             for( auto it = map_points_kf_idx.at((*kf_it)).begin(); it != map_points_kf_idx.at((*kf_it)).end(); it++ )
4098             {
4099                if( map_points[(*it)] != NULL )
4100                {
4101                    // update 3D position
4102                    Vector3d point3D = map_points[(*it)]->point3D;
4103                    map_points[(*it)]->point3D = Tkfw_corr.block(0,0,3,3) * point3D + Tkfw_corr.block(0,3,3,1);
4104                    // update direction of observation
4105                    Vector3d obs_dir = map_points[(*it)]->med_obs_dir;
4106                    map_points[(*it)]->med_obs_dir = Tkfw_corr.block(0,0,3,3) * obs_dir + Tkfw_corr.block(0,3,3,1);
4107                    // update direction of each observation
4108                    for( auto dir_it = map_points[(*it)]->dir_list.begin(); dir_it != map_points[(*it)]->dir_list.end(); dir_it++)
4109                    {
4110                        Vector3d dir_list_ = (*dir_it);
4111                        (*dir_it) = Tkfw_corr.block(0,0,3,3) * dir_list_ + Tkfw_corr.block(0,3,3,1);
4112                    }
4113                }
4114             }
4115             for( auto it = map_lines_kf_idx.at((*kf_it)).begin(); it != map_lines_kf_idx.at((*kf_it)).end(); it++ )
4116             {
4117                if( map_lines[(*it)] != NULL )
4118                {
4119                    // update 3D position
4120                    Vector3d sP3D = map_lines[(*it)]->line3D.head(3);
4121                    Vector3d eP3D = map_lines[(*it)]->line3D.tail(3);
4122                    map_lines[(*it)]->line3D.head(3) = Tkfw_corr.block(0,0,3,3) * sP3D + Tkfw_corr.block(0,3,3,1);
4123                    map_lines[(*it)]->line3D.tail(3) = Tkfw_corr.block(0,0,3,3) * eP3D + Tkfw_corr.block(0,3,3,1);
4124                    // update direction of observation
4125                    Vector3d obs_dir = map_lines[(*it)]->med_obs_dir;
4126                    map_lines[(*it)]->med_obs_dir = Tkfw_corr.block(0,0,3,3) * obs_dir + Tkfw_corr.block(0,3,3,1);
4127                    // update direction of each observation
4128                    for( auto dir_it = map_lines[(*it)]->dir_list.begin(); dir_it != map_lines[(*it)]->dir_list.end(); dir_it++)
4129                    {
4130                        Vector3d dir_list_ = (*dir_it);
4131                        (*dir_it) = Tkfw_corr.block(0,0,3,3) * dir_list_ + Tkfw_corr.block(0,3,3,1);
4132                    }
4133                }
4134             }
4135         }
4136     
4137         // update pose and map of the rest of frames
4138         for( int i = kf_curr_idx + 1; i < map_keyframes.size(); i++ )
4139         {
4140             // update pose
4141             map_keyframes[i]->T_kf_w = Tkfw_corr * map_keyframes[i]->T_kf_w;
4142             map_keyframes[i]->x_kf_w = logmap_se3(map_keyframes[i]->T_kf_w);
4143             // update landmarks
4144             for( auto it = map_points_kf_idx.at(i).begin(); it != map_points_kf_idx.at(i).end(); it++ )
4145             {
4146                if( map_points[(*it)] != NULL )
4147                {
4148                    // update 3D position
4149                    Vector3d point3D = map_points[(*it)]->point3D;
4150                    map_points[(*it)]->point3D = Tkfw_corr.block(0,0,3,3) * point3D + Tkfw_corr.block(0,3,3,1);
4151                    // update direction of observation
4152                    Vector3d obs_dir = map_points[(*it)]->med_obs_dir;
4153                    map_points[(*it)]->med_obs_dir = Tkfw_corr.block(0,0,3,3) * obs_dir + Tkfw_corr.block(0,3,3,1);
4154                    // update direction of each observation
4155                    for( auto dir_it = map_points[(*it)]->dir_list.begin(); dir_it != map_points[(*it)]->dir_list.end(); dir_it++)
4156                    {
4157                        Vector3d dir_list_ = (*dir_it);
4158                        (*dir_it) = Tkfw_corr.block(0,0,3,3) * dir_list_ + Tkfw_corr.block(0,3,3,1);
4159                    }
4160                }
4161             }
4162             for( auto it = map_lines_kf_idx.at(i).begin(); it != map_lines_kf_idx.at(i).end(); it++ )
4163             {
4164                if( map_lines[(*it)] != NULL )
4165                {
4166                    // update 3D position
4167                    Vector3d sP3D = map_lines[(*it)]->line3D.head(3);
4168                    Vector3d eP3D = map_lines[(*it)]->line3D.tail(3);
4169                    map_lines[(*it)]->line3D.head(3) = Tkfw_corr.block(0,0,3,3) * sP3D + Tkfw_corr.block(0,3,3,1);
4170                    map_lines[(*it)]->line3D.tail(3) = Tkfw_corr.block(0,0,3,3) * eP3D + Tkfw_corr.block(0,3,3,1);
4171                    // update direction of observation
4172                    Vector3d obs_dir = map_lines[(*it)]->med_obs_dir;
4173                    map_lines[(*it)]->med_obs_dir = Tkfw_corr.block(0,0,3,3) * obs_dir + Tkfw_corr.block(0,3,3,1);
4174                    // update direction of each observation
4175                    for( auto dir_it = map_lines[(*it)]->dir_list.begin(); dir_it != map_lines[(*it)]->dir_list.end(); dir_it++)
4176                    {
4177                        Vector3d dir_list_ = (*dir_it);
4178                        (*dir_it) = Tkfw_corr.block(0,0,3,3) * dir_list_ + Tkfw_corr.block(0,3,3,1);
4179                    }
4180                }
4181             }
4182         }
4183     
4184         // mark as optimized the lc_idx_list edges
4185         for( auto it = lc_idx_list.begin(); it != lc_idx_list.end(); it++)
4186             (*it)(2) = 0;
4187     
4188         // fuse local map from both sides of the loop and update graphs
4189         loopClosureFuseLandmarks();
4190     
4191         lc_state = LC_IDLE;
4192     
4193         return true;
4194     }
4195     
4196     bool MapHandler::loopClosureOptimizationCovGraphG2O()
4197     {
4198     
4199         // define G2O variables
4200         g2o::SparseOptimizer optimizer;
4201         optimizer.setVerbose(false);
4202         g2o::BlockSolver_6_3::LinearSolverType* linearSolver;
4203         linearSolver = new g2o::LinearSolverCholmod<g2o::BlockSolver_6_3::PoseMatrixType>();
4204         g2o::BlockSolver_6_3* solver_ptr = new g2o::BlockSolver_6_3(linearSolver);
4205         g2o::OptimizationAlgorithmLevenberg* solver = new g2o::OptimizationAlgorithmLevenberg(solver_ptr);
4206         solver->setUserLambdaInit(1e-10);
4207         optimizer.setAlgorithm(solver);
4208     
4209         // select min and max KF indices
4210         int kf_prev_idx =  2 * max_kf_idx;
4211         int kf_curr_idx = -1;
4212         for( auto it = lc_idx_list.begin(); it != lc_idx_list.end(); it++)
4213         {
4214             if( (*it)(0) < kf_prev_idx )
4215                 kf_prev_idx = (*it)(0);
4216             if( (*it)(1) > kf_curr_idx )
4217                 kf_curr_idx = (*it)(1);
4218         }
4219         kf_prev_idx = 0;
4220     
4221         // grab the KFs included in the optimization
4222         vector<int> kf_list;
4223         for( int i = kf_prev_idx; i <= kf_curr_idx; i++)
4224         {
4225             if( map_keyframes[i] != NULL )
4226             {
4227                 // check if it is a LC vertex
4228                 bool is_lc_i = false;
4229                 bool is_lc_j = false;
4230                 int id = 0;
4231                 for( auto it = lc_idx_list.begin(); it != lc_idx_list.end(); it++, id++ )
4232                 {
4233                     if( (*it)(0) == i )
4234                     {
4235                         is_lc_i = true;
4236                         break;
4237                     }
4238                     if( (*it)(1) == i )
4239                     {
4240                         is_lc_j = true;
4241                         break;
4242                     }
4243                 }
4244                 kf_list.push_back(i);
4245                 // create SE3 vertex
4246                 g2o::VertexSE3* v_se3 = new g2o::VertexSE3();
4247                 v_se3->setId(i);
4248                 v_se3->setMarginalized( false );
4249                 if( is_lc_j )
4250                 {
4251                     // update pose of LC vertex
4252                     v_se3->setFixed(false);
4253                     v_se3->setEstimate( g2o::SE3Quat::exp( reverse_se3(logmap_se3( (expmap_se3(lc_pose_list[id])) * map_keyframes[lc_idx_list[id](0)]->T_kf_w )) ) );
4254                 }
4255                 else
4256                 {
4257                     v_se3->setEstimate( g2o::SE3Quat::exp( reverse_se3(map_keyframes[i]->x_kf_w) ) );
4258                     if( i == 0 )
4259                         v_se3->setFixed(true);
4260                 }
4261                 optimizer.addVertex( v_se3 );
4262             }
4263         }
4264     
4265         // introduce edges
4266         for( int i = kf_prev_idx; i <= kf_curr_idx; i++ )
4267         {
4268             for( int j = i+1; j <= kf_curr_idx; j++ )
4269             {
4270                 if( map_keyframes[i] != NULL && map_keyframes[j] != NULL &&
4271                     ( full_graph[i][j] >= SlamConfig::minLMEssGraph() || full_graph[i][j] >= SlamConfig::minLMCovGraph() || abs(i-j) == 1  ) )
4272                 {
4273                     // kf2kf constraint
4274                     Matrix4d T_ji_constraint = inverse_se3( map_keyframes[i]->T_kf_w ) * map_keyframes[j]->T_kf_w;
4275                     // add edge
4276                     g2o::EdgeSE3* e_se3 = new g2o::EdgeSE3();
4277                     e_se3->setVertex( 0, optimizer.vertex(i) );
4278                     e_se3->setVertex( 1, optimizer.vertex(j) );
4279                     Vector6d x;
4280                     x = reverse_se3(logmap_se3(T_ji_constraint) );
4281                     e_se3->setMeasurement( g2o::SE3Quat::exp(x) );
4282                     e_se3->setInformation( Matrix6d::Identity() );
4283                     optimizer.addEdge( e_se3 );
4284                 }
4285             }
4286         }
4287     
4288         // introduce loop closure edges
4289         int id = 0;
4290         for( auto it = lc_idx_list.begin(); it != lc_idx_list.end(); it++, id++ )
4291         {
4292             // add edge
4293             g2o::EdgeSE3* e_se3 = new g2o::EdgeSE3();
4294             e_se3->setVertex( 0, optimizer.vertex((*it)(0)) );
4295             e_se3->setVertex( 1, optimizer.vertex((*it)(1)) );
4296             Vector6d x;
4297             x = reverse_se3( lc_pose_list[id] );
4298             e_se3->setMeasurement( g2o::SE3Quat::exp(x) );
4299             e_se3->information() = Matrix6d::Identity();
4300             optimizer.addEdge( e_se3 );
4301         }
4302     
4303         // optimize graph
4304         optimizer.initializeOptimization();
4305         optimizer.computeInitialGuess();
4306         optimizer.computeActiveErrors();
4307         optimizer.optimize(SlamConfig::maxItersPGO());
4308     
4309         // recover pose and update map
4310         Matrix4d Tkfw_corr;
4311         for( auto kf_it = kf_list.begin(); kf_it != kf_list.end(); kf_it++)
4312         {
4313             g2o::VertexSE3* v_se3 = static_cast<g2o::VertexSE3*>(optimizer.vertex( (*kf_it) ));
4314             g2o::SE3Quat Tiw_corr =  v_se3->estimateAsSE3Quat();
4315             Vector6d x;
4316             Matrix4d Tkfw, Tkfw_prev;
4317             x = reverse_se3(Tiw_corr.log());
4318             Tkfw = expmap_se3( x );
4319             Tkfw_prev = map_keyframes[ (*kf_it) ]->T_kf_w;
4320             map_keyframes[ (*kf_it) ]->T_kf_w = Tkfw;
4321             map_keyframes[ (*kf_it) ]->x_kf_w = logmap_se3(Tkfw);
4322             // update map
4323             Tkfw_corr = Tkfw * inverse_se3( Tkfw_prev );
4324             for( auto it = map_points_kf_idx.at((*kf_it)).begin(); it != map_points_kf_idx.at((*kf_it)).end(); it++ )
4325             {
4326                if( map_points[(*it)] != NULL )
4327                {
4328                    // update 3D position
4329                    Vector3d point3D = map_points[(*it)]->point3D;
4330                    map_points[(*it)]->point3D = Tkfw_corr.block(0,0,3,3) * point3D + Tkfw_corr.block(0,3,3,1);
4331                    // update direction of observation
4332                    Vector3d obs_dir = map_points[(*it)]->med_obs_dir;
4333                    map_points[(*it)]->med_obs_dir = Tkfw_corr.block(0,0,3,3) * obs_dir + Tkfw_corr.block(0,3,3,1);
4334                    // update direction of each observation
4335                    for( auto dir_it = map_points[(*it)]->dir_list.begin(); dir_it != map_points[(*it)]->dir_list.end(); dir_it++)
4336                    {
4337                        Vector3d dir_list_ = (*dir_it);
4338                        (*dir_it) = Tkfw_corr.block(0,0,3,3) * dir_list_ + Tkfw_corr.block(0,3,3,1);
4339                    }
4340                }
4341             }
4342             for( auto it = map_lines_kf_idx.at((*kf_it)).begin(); it != map_lines_kf_idx.at((*kf_it)).end(); it++ )
4343             {
4344                if( map_lines[(*it)] != NULL )
4345                {
4346                    // update 3D position
4347                    Vector3d sP3D = map_lines[(*it)]->line3D.head(3);
4348                    Vector3d eP3D = map_lines[(*it)]->line3D.tail(3);
4349                    map_lines[(*it)]->line3D.head(3) = Tkfw_corr.block(0,0,3,3) * sP3D + Tkfw_corr.block(0,3,3,1);
4350                    map_lines[(*it)]->line3D.tail(3) = Tkfw_corr.block(0,0,3,3) * eP3D + Tkfw_corr.block(0,3,3,1);
4351                    // update direction of observation
4352                    Vector3d obs_dir = map_lines[(*it)]->med_obs_dir;
4353                    map_lines[(*it)]->med_obs_dir = Tkfw_corr.block(0,0,3,3) * obs_dir + Tkfw_corr.block(0,3,3,1);
4354                    // update direction of each observation
4355                    for( auto dir_it = map_lines[(*it)]->dir_list.begin(); dir_it != map_lines[(*it)]->dir_list.end(); dir_it++)
4356                    {
4357                        Vector3d dir_list_ = (*dir_it);
4358                        (*dir_it) = Tkfw_corr.block(0,0,3,3) * dir_list_ + Tkfw_corr.block(0,3,3,1);
4359                    }
4360                }
4361             }
4362         }
4363     
4364         // update pose and map of the rest of frames
4365         for( int i = kf_curr_idx + 1; i < map_keyframes.size(); i++ )
4366         {
4367             // update pose
4368             map_keyframes[i]->T_kf_w = Tkfw_corr * map_keyframes[i]->T_kf_w;
4369             map_keyframes[i]->x_kf_w = logmap_se3(map_keyframes[i]->T_kf_w);
4370             // update landmarks
4371             for( auto it = map_points_kf_idx.at(i).begin(); it != map_points_kf_idx.at(i).end(); it++ )
4372             {
4373                if( map_points[(*it)] != NULL )
4374                {
4375                    // update 3D position
4376                    Vector3d point3D = map_points[(*it)]->point3D;
4377                    map_points[(*it)]->point3D = Tkfw_corr.block(0,0,3,3) * point3D + Tkfw_corr.block(0,3,3,1);
4378                    // update direction of observation
4379                    Vector3d obs_dir = map_points[(*it)]->med_obs_dir;
4380                    map_points[(*it)]->med_obs_dir = Tkfw_corr.block(0,0,3,3) * obs_dir + Tkfw_corr.block(0,3,3,1);
4381                    // update direction of each observation
4382                    for( auto dir_it = map_points[(*it)]->dir_list.begin(); dir_it != map_points[(*it)]->dir_list.end(); dir_it++)
4383                    {
4384                        Vector3d dir_list_ = (*dir_it);
4385                        (*dir_it) = Tkfw_corr.block(0,0,3,3) * dir_list_ + Tkfw_corr.block(0,3,3,1);
4386                    }
4387                }
4388             }
4389             for( auto it = map_lines_kf_idx.at(i).begin(); it != map_lines_kf_idx.at(i).end(); it++ )
4390             {
4391                if( map_lines[(*it)] != NULL )
4392                {
4393                    // update 3D position
4394                    Vector3d sP3D = map_lines[(*it)]->line3D.head(3);
4395                    Vector3d eP3D = map_lines[(*it)]->line3D.tail(3);
4396                    map_lines[(*it)]->line3D.head(3) = Tkfw_corr.block(0,0,3,3) * sP3D + Tkfw_corr.block(0,3,3,1);
4397                    map_lines[(*it)]->line3D.tail(3) = Tkfw_corr.block(0,0,3,3) * eP3D + Tkfw_corr.block(0,3,3,1);
4398                    // update direction of observation
4399                    Vector3d obs_dir = map_lines[(*it)]->med_obs_dir;
4400                    map_lines[(*it)]->med_obs_dir = Tkfw_corr.block(0,0,3,3) * obs_dir + Tkfw_corr.block(0,3,3,1);
4401                    // update direction of each observation
4402                    for( auto dir_it = map_lines[(*it)]->dir_list.begin(); dir_it != map_lines[(*it)]->dir_list.end(); dir_it++)
4403                    {
4404                        Vector3d dir_list_ = (*dir_it);
4405                        (*dir_it) = Tkfw_corr.block(0,0,3,3) * dir_list_ + Tkfw_corr.block(0,3,3,1);
4406                    }
4407                }
4408             }
4409         }
4410     
4411         // mark as optimized the lc_idx_list edges
4412         for( auto it = lc_idx_list.begin(); it != lc_idx_list.end(); it++)
4413             (*it)(2) = 0;
4414     
4415         // fuse local map from both sides of the loop and update graphs
4416         loopClosureFuseLandmarks();
4417     
4418         lc_state = LC_IDLE;
4419     
4420         return true;
4421     }
4422     
4423     void MapHandler::loopClosureFuseLandmarks()
4424     {
4425     
4426         // point matches
4427         int lc_idx = 0;
4428         for( auto idx_it = lc_pt_idxs.begin(); idx_it != lc_pt_idxs.end(); idx_it++, lc_idx++ )
4429         {
4430             if( lc_idx_list[lc_idx](2) == 1 )   // if not already optimized
4431             {
4432                 int kf_prev_idx = lc_idx_list[lc_idx](0);
4433                 int kf_curr_idx = lc_idx_list[lc_idx](1);
4434                 for( auto lm_it = (*idx_it).begin(); lm_it != (*idx_it).end(); lm_it++ )
4435                 {
4436                     // grab indices
4437                     int lm_idx0  = (*lm_it)(0);
4438                     int lm_ldx0  = (*lm_it)(1); // lr_qdx
4439                     int lm_idx1  = (*lm_it)(2);
4440                     int lm_ldx1  = (*lm_it)(3); // lr_tdx
4441                     // if the LM exists just once, add observation
4442                     if( lm_idx0 == -1 && lm_idx1 != -1 )
4443                     {
4444                         if( map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_pt[lm_ldx0] != NULL && map_points[lm_idx1] != NULL )
4445                         {
4446                             map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_pt[lm_ldx0]->idx = lm_idx1;
4447                             Vector3d dir  = map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_pt[lm_ldx0]->P / map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_pt[lm_ldx0]->P.norm();
4448                             map_points[lm_idx1]->addMapPointObservation( map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->stereo_frame->pdesc_l.row(lm_ldx0), map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->kf_idx, map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_pt[lm_ldx0]->pl, dir );
4449                             // increase full graph for each KF that has already observed this LM
4450                             for( auto kf_it = map_points[lm_idx1]->kf_obs_list.begin(); kf_it != map_points[lm_idx1]->kf_obs_list.end(); kf_it++)
4451                             {
4452                                 full_graph[(*kf_it)][kf_curr_idx]++;
4453                                 full_graph[kf_curr_idx][(*kf_it)]++;
4454                             }
4455                         }
4456                     }
4457                     if( lm_idx0 != -1 && lm_idx1 == -1 )
4458                     {
4459                         if( map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_pt[lm_ldx1] != NULL && map_points[lm_idx0] != NULL )
4460                         {
4461                             map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_pt[lm_ldx1]->idx = lm_idx0;
4462                             Vector3d dir  = map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_pt[lm_ldx1]->P / map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_pt[lm_ldx1]->P.norm();
4463                             map_points[lm_idx0]->addMapPointObservation( map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->stereo_frame->pdesc_l.row(lm_ldx1),
4464                                                                          map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->kf_idx,
4465                                                                          map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_pt[lm_ldx1]->pl, dir );
4466                             // increase full graph for each KF that has already observed this LM
4467                             for( auto kf_it = map_points[lm_idx0]->kf_obs_list.begin(); kf_it != map_points[lm_idx0]->kf_obs_list.end(); kf_it++)
4468                             {
4469                                 full_graph[(*kf_it)][kf_prev_idx]++;
4470                                 full_graph[kf_prev_idx][(*kf_it)]++;
4471                             }
4472                         }
4473                     }
4474                     // if not, create LM and add both observations
4475                     if( lm_idx0 == -1 && lm_idx1 == -1 )
4476                     {
4477                         if( map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_pt[lm_ldx0] != NULL && map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_pt[lm_ldx1] != NULL )
4478                         {
4479                             // assign indices
4480                             map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_pt[lm_ldx0]->idx = max_pt_idx;
4481                             map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_pt[lm_ldx1]->idx = max_pt_idx;
4482                             // create new 3D landmark with the observation from previous KF
4483                             Matrix4d Tfw = ( map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->T_kf_w );
4484                             Vector3d P3d = Tfw.block(0,0,3,3) * map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_pt[lm_ldx0]->P + Tfw.col(3).head(3);
4485                             Vector3d dir = P3d / P3d.norm();
4486                             MapPoint* map_point = new MapPoint(max_pt_idx,P3d,map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->stereo_frame->pdesc_l.row(lm_ldx0),map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->kf_idx,map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_pt[lm_ldx0]->pl,dir);
4487                             // add new 3D landmark to kf_idx where it was first observed
4488                             map_points_kf_idx.at( kf_prev_idx ).push_back( max_pt_idx );
4489                             // add observation of the 3D landmark from current KF
4490                             P3d = map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->T_kf_w.block(0,0,3,3) *  map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_pt[lm_ldx1]->P + map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->T_kf_w.col(3).head(3);
4491                             dir = P3d / P3d.norm();
4492                             map_point->addMapPointObservation(map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->stereo_frame->pdesc_l.row(lm_ldx1),map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->kf_idx,map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_pt[lm_ldx1]->pl,dir);
4493                             // add 3D landmark to map
4494                             map_points.push_back(map_point);
4495                             // update full graph (new feature)
4496                             max_pt_idx++;
4497                             full_graph[kf_prev_idx][kf_curr_idx]++;
4498                             full_graph[kf_curr_idx][kf_prev_idx]++;
4499                         }
4500                     }
4501                     // if the LM observed is different in each KF, then fuse them and erase the old one
4502                     if( lm_idx0 != -1 && lm_idx1 != -1 )
4503                     {
4504                         if( map_points[lm_idx0] != NULL && map_points[lm_idx1] != NULL
4505                             && map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_pt[lm_ldx1] != NULL )
4506                         {
4507                             int Nobs_lm_prev = map_points[lm_idx0]->kf_obs_list.size();
4508                             // fuse LMs while updating the full graph
4509                             int iter = 0;
4510                             for( auto it = map_points[lm_idx1]->desc_list.begin(); it != map_points[lm_idx1]->desc_list.end(); it++, iter++)
4511                             {
4512                                 // concatenate desc, obs, dir, and kf_obs lists
4513                                 map_points[lm_idx0]->desc_list.push_back(   (*it) );
4514                                 map_points[lm_idx0]->obs_list.push_back(    map_points[lm_idx1]->obs_list[iter]    );
4515                                 map_points[lm_idx0]->dir_list.push_back(    map_points[lm_idx1]->dir_list[iter]    );
4516                                 map_points[lm_idx0]->kf_obs_list.push_back( map_points[lm_idx1]->kf_obs_list[iter] );
4517                                 // update full graph
4518                                 int jdx = map_points[lm_idx1]->kf_obs_list[iter];
4519                                 for( int i = 0; i < Nobs_lm_prev; i++ )
4520                                 {
4521                                     int idx = map_points[lm_idx0]->kf_obs_list[i];
4522                                     full_graph[idx][jdx]++;
4523                                     full_graph[jdx][idx]++;
4524                                 }
4525                                 // update average descriptor and direction of observation
4526                                 map_points[lm_idx0]->updateAverageDescDir();
4527                                 // change idx in stereo_pt
4528                                 map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_pt[lm_ldx1]->idx = lm_idx0;
4529                             }
4530                             // remove from map_points_kf_idx
4531                             iter = 0;
4532                             int kf_lm_obs = map_points[lm_idx1]->kf_obs_list[0];
4533                             for( auto it = map_points_kf_idx.at(kf_lm_obs).begin(); it != map_points_kf_idx.at(kf_lm_obs).end(); it++, iter++)
4534                             {
4535                                 if( (*it) == lm_idx1 )
4536                                 {
4537                                     map_points_kf_idx.at(kf_lm_obs).erase( map_points_kf_idx.at(kf_lm_obs).begin() + iter );
4538                                     break;
4539                                 }
4540                             }
4541                             // erase old landmark
4542                             delete map_points[lm_idx1];
4543                             map_points[lm_idx1] = nullptr;
4544                         }
4545                     }
4546                 }
4547             }
4548         }
4549     
4550         // line segment matches
4551         lc_idx = 0;
4552         for( auto idx_it = lc_ls_idxs.begin(); idx_it != lc_ls_idxs.end(); idx_it++, lc_idx++ )
4553         {
4554             if( lc_idx_list[lc_idx](2) == 1 )   // if not already optimized
4555             {
4556                 int kf_prev_idx = lc_idx_list[lc_idx](0);
4557                 int kf_curr_idx = lc_idx_list[lc_idx](1);
4558                 for( auto lm_it = (*idx_it).begin(); lm_it != (*idx_it).end(); lm_it++ )
4559                 {
4560                     // grab indices
4561                     int lm_idx0  = (*lm_it)(0);
4562                     int lm_ldx0  = (*lm_it)(1); // lr_qdx
4563                     int lm_idx1  = (*lm_it)(2);
4564                     int lm_ldx1  = (*lm_it)(3); // lr_tdx
4565                     // if the LM exists just once, add observation
4566                     if( lm_idx0 == -1 && lm_idx1 != -1 )
4567                     {
4568                         if( map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[lm_ldx0] != NULL && map_lines[lm_idx1] != NULL )
4569                         {
4570                             map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[lm_ldx0]->idx = lm_idx1;
4571                             Vector3d dir  = ( map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[lm_ldx0]->sP + map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[lm_ldx0]->eP )
4572                                           / ( map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[lm_ldx0]->sP + map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[lm_ldx0]->eP ).norm();
4573                             Vector4d pts;
4574                             pts.head(2) = map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[lm_ldx0]->spl_obs;
4575                             pts.tail(2) = map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[lm_ldx0]->epl_obs;
4576                             map_lines[lm_idx1]->addMapLineObservation( map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->stereo_frame->ldesc_l.row(lm_ldx0),
4577                                                                        map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->kf_idx,
4578                                                                        map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[lm_ldx0]->le,
4579                                                                        dir, pts );
4580                             // increase full graph for each KF that has already observed this LM
4581                             for( auto kf_it = map_lines[lm_idx1]->kf_obs_list.begin(); kf_it != map_lines[lm_idx1]->kf_obs_list.end(); kf_it++)
4582                             {
4583                                 full_graph[(*kf_it)][kf_curr_idx]++;
4584                                 full_graph[kf_curr_idx][(*kf_it)]++;
4585                             }
4586                         }
4587                     }
4588                     if( lm_idx0 != -1 && lm_idx1 == -1 )
4589                     {
4590                         if( map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[lm_ldx1] != NULL && map_lines[lm_idx0] != NULL )
4591                         {
4592                             map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[lm_ldx1]->idx = lm_idx0;
4593                             Vector3d dir  = (map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[lm_ldx1]->sP + map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[lm_ldx1]->eP)
4594                                     / (map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[lm_ldx1]->sP+map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[lm_ldx1]->eP).norm();
4595                             Vector4d pts;
4596                             pts.head(2) = map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[lm_ldx1]->spl_obs;
4597                             pts.tail(2) = map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[lm_ldx1]->epl_obs;
4598                             map_lines[lm_idx0]->addMapLineObservation( map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->stereo_frame->ldesc_l.row(lm_ldx1),
4599                                                                        map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->kf_idx,
4600                                                                        map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[lm_ldx1]->le, dir, pts );
4601                             // increase full graph for each KF that has already observed this LM
4602                             for( auto kf_it = map_lines[lm_idx0]->kf_obs_list.begin(); kf_it != map_lines[lm_idx0]->kf_obs_list.end(); kf_it++)
4603                             {
4604                                 full_graph[(*kf_it)][kf_prev_idx]++;
4605                                 full_graph[kf_prev_idx][(*kf_it)]++;
4606                             }
4607                         }
4608                     }
4609                     // if not, create LM and add both observations
4610                     if( lm_idx0 == -1 && lm_idx1 == -1 )
4611                     {
4612                         if( map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[lm_ldx0] != NULL && map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[lm_ldx1] != NULL )
4613                         {
4614                             // assign indices
4615                             map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[lm_ldx0]->idx = max_ls_idx;
4616                             map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[lm_ldx1]->idx = max_ls_idx;
4617                             // create new 3D landmark with the observation from previous KF
4618                             Matrix4d Tfw  = ( map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->T_kf_w );
4619                             Vector3d sP3d = Tfw.block(0,0,3,3) * map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[lm_ldx0]->sP + Tfw.col(3).head(3);
4620                             Vector3d eP3d = Tfw.block(0,0,3,3) * map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[lm_ldx0]->eP + Tfw.col(3).head(3);
4621                             Vector3d mP3d = 0.5 * ( sP3d + eP3d );
4622                             Vector3d dir = mP3d / mP3d.norm();
4623                             Vector6d L3D; L3D.head(3) = sP3d; L3D.tail(3) = eP3d;
4624                             Vector4d pts;
4625                             pts.head(2) = map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[lm_ldx0]->spl;
4626                             pts.tail(2) = map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[lm_ldx0]->epl;
4627                             MapLine* map_line = new MapLine(max_ls_idx,L3D,map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->stereo_frame->ldesc_l.row(lm_ldx0),map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->kf_idx,
4628                                                             map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[lm_ldx0]->le,dir,pts);
4629                             // add new 3D landmark to kf_idx where it was first observed
4630                             map_lines_kf_idx.at( kf_prev_idx ).push_back( max_ls_idx );
4631                             // add observation of the 3D landmark from current KF
4632                             sP3d = map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->T_kf_w.block(0,0,3,3) *  map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[lm_ldx1]->sP + map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->T_kf_w.col(3).head(3);
4633                             eP3d = map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->T_kf_w.block(0,0,3,3) *  map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[lm_ldx1]->eP + map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->T_kf_w.col(3).head(3);
4634                             mP3d = 0.5 * ( sP3d + eP3d );
4635                             dir = mP3d / mP3d.norm();
4636                             pts.head(2) = map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[lm_ldx1]->spl;
4637                             pts.tail(2) = map_keyframes[kf_prev_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[lm_ldx1]->epl;
4638                             map_line->addMapLineObservation(map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->stereo_frame->ldesc_l.row(lm_ldx1),map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->kf_idx,
4639                                                             map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[lm_ldx1]->le,dir,pts);
4640                             // add 3D landmark to map
4641                             map_lines.push_back(map_line);
4642                             // update full graph (new feature)
4643                             max_ls_idx++;
4644                             full_graph[kf_prev_idx][kf_curr_idx]++;
4645                             full_graph[kf_curr_idx][kf_prev_idx]++;
4646                         }
4647                     }
4648                     // if the LM observed is different in each KF, then fuse them and erase the old one
4649                     if( lm_idx0 != -1 && lm_idx1 != -1 )
4650                     {
4651                         if( map_lines[lm_idx0] != NULL && map_lines[lm_idx1] != NULL
4652                             && map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[lm_ldx1] != NULL )
4653                         {
4654                             int Nobs_lm_prev = map_lines[lm_idx0]->kf_obs_list.size();
4655                             // fuse LMs while updating the full graph
4656                             int iter = 0;
4657                             for( auto it = map_lines[lm_idx1]->desc_list.begin(); it != map_lines[lm_idx1]->desc_list.end(); it++, iter++)
4658                             {
4659                                 // concatenate desc, obs, dir, pts, and kf_obs lists
4660                                 map_lines[lm_idx0]->desc_list.push_back(   (*it) );
4661                                 map_lines[lm_idx0]->obs_list.push_back(    map_lines[lm_idx1]->obs_list[iter]    );
4662                                 map_lines[lm_idx0]->dir_list.push_back(    map_lines[lm_idx1]->dir_list[iter]    );
4663                                 map_lines[lm_idx0]->pts_list.push_back(    map_lines[lm_idx1]->pts_list[iter]    );
4664                                 map_lines[lm_idx0]->kf_obs_list.push_back( map_lines[lm_idx1]->kf_obs_list[iter] );
4665                                 // update full graph
4666                                 int jdx = map_lines[lm_idx1]->kf_obs_list[iter];
4667                                 for( int i = 0; i < Nobs_lm_prev; i++ )
4668                                 {
4669                                     int idx = map_lines[lm_idx0]->kf_obs_list[i];
4670                                     full_graph[idx][jdx]++;
4671                                     full_graph[jdx][idx]++;
4672                                 }
4673                                 // update average descriptor and direction of observation
4674                                 map_lines[lm_idx0]->updateAverageDescDir();
4675                                 // change idx in stereo_ls
4676                                 map_keyframes[kf_curr_idx]->stereo_frame->stereo_ls[lm_ldx1]->idx = lm_idx0;
4677                             }
4678                             // remove from map_points_kf_idx
4679                             iter = 0;
4680                             int kf_lm_obs = map_lines[lm_idx1]->kf_obs_list[0];
4681                             for( auto it = map_lines_kf_idx.at(kf_lm_obs).begin(); it != map_lines_kf_idx.at(kf_lm_obs).end(); it++, iter++)
4682                             {
4683                                 if( (*it) == lm_idx1 )
4684                                 {
4685                                     map_lines_kf_idx.at(kf_lm_obs).erase( map_lines_kf_idx.at(kf_lm_obs).begin() + iter );
4686                                     break;
4687                                 }
4688                             }
4689                             // erase old landmark
4690                             delete map_lines[lm_idx1];
4691                             map_lines[lm_idx1] = nullptr;
4692                         }
4693                     }
4694                 }
4695             }
4696         }
4697     
4698     }
4699     
4700     void MapHandler::print_msg(const std::string &msg) {
4701     
4702         {
4703             std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(cout_mutex);
4704             cout << msg << endl;
4705         }
4706     }
